title: Create simple Web App for taxi business for customers to book trips online using escrow payment
description:
Web App Development: Online Taxi Booking System  

Overview
We need a simple yet efficient Web App for a small taxi business, allowing passengers to book trips online seamlessly. The application should provide a user-friendly interface for customers to enter trip details, calculate fares, make payments, and enable admins to manage bookings efficiently.



Core Features & Functionality

1. Customer Booking Form  
Customers should be able to enter the following details:  
- Customer Name  
- Customer mobile number
- Pick-up Address (Google Maps integration for accurate input & auto-complete)  
- Drop-off Address (Google Maps integration for accurate input & auto-complete)  
- Number of Passengers
- Add Stop/Multiple Destinations Option (if required)  
- Date & Time Selection:
  - Book Now (immediate trip request)  
  - Schedule for Later (calendar-based date & time selection)  

2. Fare Calculation & Payment Processing  
- The system will calculate the trip fare based on a formula that we will provide later.  
- Customers proceed with payment, which will be held in escrow (or any better alternative recommended by the developer).  

3. Booking Approval Process (Admin Panel)  
- Admin receives a notification for each booking request.  
- Admin can Accept or Reject the booking.  
- If Rejected: Payment is automatically refunded, and the customer is notified with the reason (e.g., "No driver available").  
- If Accepted:  
  - Admin is prompted to assign the ride to a driver from a predefined driver list.  
  - Customer receives booking confirmation text with driver details  

4. Ride Completion & Cancellation Handling
- Once a ride is accepted, admin is prompted with:  
  - End Ride (indicating the trip was successfully completed).  
  - Ride Cancelled (if a cancellation occurs).  
- If the ride is cancelled after being accepted, the payment is refunded back to the customer automatically.  

5. Driver Management (Admin Panel)  
- Ability to maintain a list of drivers in the system.  
- Assign drivers to accepted rides.  
- Show assigned driver details to customers upon booking confirmation.  



Technical Considerations
- Google Maps API for location inputs and fare estimation.  
- Escrow-based payment solution (or developer‚Äôs recommendation for an alternative secure transaction system).  
- Admin Panel for managing bookings and drivers.  
- Responsive UI (desktop & mobile-friendly). We can provide this if needed.
- Scalability for future mobile app development (Android & iOS).  

We look forward to a long-term collaboration for future improvements and eventually mobile app development.  Looking forward to working with the right developer to help grow our small passenger transport business! üôè
skills: ['Web Application', 'C#', 'JavaScript', 'PHP', 'Python', 'Square', 'Web Development', 'Haskell', 'Java', 'Payment Gateway Integration']

title: Develop AI Bots for a Poker Game (Unity, C#)
description:
Project Description:
I am looking for an experienced Unity developer proficient in C# to enhance the AI of bots in my Texas Hold'em poker game. The game is already developed, but the bots do not perform automatic actions, and their decision-making system needs improvement. Additionally, turn management should be improved to ensure smooth gameplay.

Main Tasks:

Fix Basic Issues

Ensure turns pass correctly between players.

Update tblBetAmt so that it updates correctly after every bet.

Verify that isBot is correctly assigned to bots in the game.

Enhance AI System for Bots

Make bots perform actions (Check, Call, Raise, Fold) based on board state and hand strength.

Implement a probability-based decision-making system (e.g., bluffing mechanics).

Add timers for bots to simulate human behavior.

Implement Full Hand Ranking System

Develop a system to detect the strongest hands (Straight, Flush, Full House, etc.).

Compare hands to determine the winner at the end of each round (Showdown).

Handle tie cases (Split Pot).

Manage Side Pots for All-in Scenarios

Handle multiple side pots based on players' bet amounts.

Distribute winnings correctly according to Texas Hold'em rules.

Improve User Experience (UX) & Animations

Display real-time game notifications ("Player X went All-in!").

Add animations for bot actions.

Improve the display of the winning hand with explanations.

Bug Fixes & Testing

Conduct comprehensive logic testing to ensure smooth gameplay.

Optimize code performance to prevent lag or freezing.

Requirements:

Strong experience in Unity and C#.

Prior experience with card games or AI systems is a plus.

Ability to modify existing code without changing the project structure.

Availability for communication and code sharing via Git or Unity Collaborate.

Project Details:

Platform: Unity 2019.4+ (Android)

Tech Stack: C#, Unity Engine

Payment: Hourly rate or fixed price per project stage

How to Apply?
Please submit your bid along with examples of similar projects you have worked on. Mention any relevant experience in poker games or turn-based systems.

Thank you and good luck!
skills: ['C#', 'Game Development', 'MySQL', 'iOS', 'Unity', 'Android']

title: Reverse Engineering an Android App | üöÄ URGENT
description:
I need assistance in reverse engineering an Android app for DutchBros (https://www.dutchbros.com/). The goal is to uncover the hidden API endpoints that the app communicates with.

Problem:

    I can see some of the requests from the app, but other requests are not being tracked. It seems like there is an SSL pinning issue preventing the capture of these requests.

Requirements:

    Expertise in reverse engineering Android applications.
    Ability to bypass SSL pinning for the app.
    Identify and extract all API endpoints used by the app, including those not visible due to SSL pinning.
    Experience with tools like Frida, Objection, or any other methods for bypassing SSL pinning in Android apps.

Deliverables:

    A setup that bypasses the SSL pinning and allows full interception of the app's API requests.
    A list of all API endpoints the app communicates with.

If you're experienced in SSL pinning bypass and reverse engineering Android apps, please reach out and provide details of similar work you have done.

üöÄURGENT HELP NEED

2. Resolve issues with Aadhar Card Notification/Update:

3. Develop the Student Fees Payment module:

    - Payment for single or multiple fees.

    - Display of pending and paid fee structures.

Technical Requirements



- The project will be developed using Kotlin, MySQL, and PHP 5.6.

- The freelancer will work on our laptop using Team Viewer.

- Access to APIs, web sub-admin, and payment gateway admin will be provided.



Payment and Terms

READ ATTACHED DOCUMENT PROPERLY BEFORE SUBMITTING BID

Additional Requirements

title: Glide App Developer Needed for Construction Punch List Tracking App
description:
Job Overview:
I am developing a mobile app using Glide to track and document punch list items for construction projects. I have already started the project but have hit my capacity, so I am looking for an experienced Glide App developer to help bring it to the finish line.

This app will allow multiple types of users to create, manage, and track punch list items, ensuring quality work is completed before project closeout. The app will include photo/video documentation, user role-based permissions, status updates, reporting, and PDF export features.

I need a Glide expert who understands app development using relational databases, user permissions, file storage, and structured workflows.



***Project Scope & Key Requirements***
User Roles & Permissions:
- Admins ‚Äì Manage all projects, oversee construction phases, assign users, and have the exclusive ability to delete projects and users.
- Construction Managers ‚Äì Create projects, rooms, and punch list items; update item statuses with required photo/video documentation.
- Design Managers ‚Äì Create punch list items but cannot update statuses.
- Clients ‚Äì Temporary access (1-week) to add punch list items to an assigned project; cannot edit after submission.

Project & Room Structure:
- Projects contain multiple rooms.
- Each room can have multiple punch list items.

Punch List Item Workflow:
- Users create items by selecting project ‚Üí room ‚Üí "Add Item" button.
- Form entry includes Title, Description, and at least 1 Photo or Video (required).
- Default status on creation = OPEN.
- Each item includes date stamps for tracking updates.

Status Management & Updates:
- 4 Statuses: Open, In Progress, Needs Meeting, Completed.
- Construction Managers/Admins can update statuses via a dropdown.
- Each update requires at least one new photo or video for documentation.
- Status updates are recorded with timestamps for reporting.

Admin-Specific Privileges:
- Only Admins can delete projects and users.
- Admins can assign Design Managers to specific projects.
- Admins can create and assign Client users with a countdown timer for access expiration.

User Interface & Reporting:
- Users need a dashboard summary displaying all items by status.
- Ability to filter items based on project, room, or status.
- At project completion, export a PDF report with:
         - Project Address
         - All completed items
         - Initial and updated status photos/videos
         - Final completion status with timestamp

What I Need From You:
- Glide App development expertise (experience with complex relational data structures).
- Ability to structure and optimize data tables for performance (e.g., managing multiple photos/videos per item).
- Experience implementing conditional user permissions and filtering views.
- Knowledge of PDF report generation and email automation within Glide.
- Ability to implement Admin-only deletion controls for projects and users.
- Problem-solving skills to refine existing workflows where needed.

Project Deliverables:
- Fully functional Glide app with all user roles, permissions, and workflows.
- Status-based filtering system for easy navigation of punch list items.
- Proper data structure for storing multiple photos/videos per item.
- PDF report generation and email functionality.
- Admin-only controls for deleting projects and users.
- Testing & debugging to ensure a smooth user experience.



***How to Apply***
Please include:
- Your experience with Glide Apps and similar mobile development projects.
- Examples of database-heavy Glide apps you have built.
- Your estimated timeframe for completing this project.

Looking forward to collaborating with a skilled developer to finalize this app!

title: Mobile App Developer for Android & iOS - Bluetooth Integration
description:
We are looking for an experienced mobile app developer for both Android and iOS operating systems that can develop a sample application and pre-compiled library for communicating with a custom Bluetooth Low Energy device. The application should use the native Bluetooth features on both operating systems and be compatible with all versions of each operating system currently in circulation. We will provide full documentation of the Bluetooth services and characteristics for the custom device. The application must include a single screen with a button that initiates a BLE connection to the device, subscribes to certain characteristics, and sends pre-defined commands to other characteristics. The pre-compiled library must allow third party applications that import the library to call a minimal number of class methods to do the same. Further details will be provided upon job acceptance. An ideal candidate will be able to complete this project for both Android and iOS, but exceptional candidates that specialize in a single operating system will also be considered.

Key Responsibilities:
‚Ä¢ Develop an iOS SDK using CoreBluetooth in Swift to handle BLE connectivity to the custom device.
‚Ä¢ Develop an Android SDK using Android's Bluetooth LE API in Kotlin to handle BLE connectivity to the custom device.
‚Ä¢ Create a sample iOS application in Swift that showcases the integration of the iOS SDK.
‚Ä¢ Create a sample Android application in Kotlin that demonstrates the Android SDK.
‚Ä¢ Implement BLE protocols to manage device advertisement, connection, bonding, and data exchange.
‚Ä¢ Ensure proper handling of BLE commands, responses, and notifications based on the device's specifications.
‚Ä¢ Produce comprehensive documentation for both SDKs, including setup, integration guidelines, and troubleshooting.

Deliverables:
1. iOS SDK: A pre-compiled SDK utilizing CoreBluetooth in Swift for robust BLE communication.
2. Sample iOS Application: A fully functional iOS app in Swift that demonstrates the use of the iOS SDK.
3. Android SDK: A pre-compiled SDK utilizing Android's Bluetooth LE API in Kotlin to ensure seamless BLE interactions.
4. Sample Android Application: A fully functional Android app in Kotlin showcasing the integration of the Android SDK.
5. Documentation: Describing how to integrate the SDKs into existing mobile applications and how to use the sample applications.

Technical Requirements:
‚Ä¢ Proven experience in developing native mobile applications for both iOS and Android.
‚Ä¢ Strong understanding of BLE protocols and hands-on experience with CoreBluetooth for iOS and Android's Bluetooth LE API.
‚Ä¢ Swift for iOS development and Kotlin for Android development.
‚Ä¢ Ability to produce clear, developer-friendly documentation for SDK integration and sample app usage.

title: Senior Mobile QA Automation Engineer (Appium / Java)
description:
We are seeking a highly skilled QA Automation Engineer with Appium and Java expertise to develop, maintain, and scale our mobile automation framework. The project involves creating robust test scripts, managing multiple device instances, and ensuring accurate, high-volume testing for advanced features‚Äîspanning complex login flows, content management, and secure interactions. You will audit our existing codebase, address gaps left by a previous engineer, and help push our automation suite to handle large-scale concurrency without sacrificing reliability.


Responsibilities
1. Test Automation Architecture & Maintenance
‚Ä¢ Take ownership of our existing Appium/Java framework, reviewing code, fixing issues, and refactoring for better performance and maintainability.
‚Ä¢ Build new automated scripts and test scenarios that handle advanced user flows (e.g., login, media uploads, content interactions, etc.).
‚Ä¢ Implement best practices for scalability, ensuring tests can run reliably across multiple devices or emulators.
2. Device & Environment Management
‚Ä¢ Oversee mobile device farms or emulators (Android focus) to run parallel tests at scale.
‚Ä¢ Manage capabilities and configurations (ADB, proxies, network settings) to optimize automation reliability and reduce detection or blocking issues.
3. Test Coverage & Scenario Planning
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with the product team to identify critical test cases, corner cases, and user journeys.
‚Ä¢ Develop strategies for regression testing, performance testing, and edge-case coverage.
4. Continuous Integration & Reporting
‚Ä¢ Integrate automated tests within a CI/CD pipeline (e.g., Jenkins, GitLab CI).
‚Ä¢ Provide detailed test reports (logs, screenshots, or videos) to highlight failures, track coverage, and guide fixes.
5. Framework Enhancements & Best Practices
‚Ä¢ Suggest and implement improvements to the automation architecture (e.g., Page Object Model, BDD, data-driven tests).
‚Ä¢ Ensure robust handling of dynamic UI elements, timeouts, and synchronization for stable test runs.
6. Collaboration & Knowledge Transfer
‚Ä¢ Work closely with developers, PMs, and other QA engineers to clarify requirements and triage issues.
‚Ä¢ Document the automation framework thoroughly, guiding team members on test execution and maintenance.

Required Skills & Qualifications
1. Strong Appium & Java Expertise
‚Ä¢ 2+ years dedicated experience in Appium with Java.
‚Ä¢ Familiar with Android test automation (ADB commands, emulator/device management).
2. Mobile Test Automation
‚Ä¢ Proven track record creating or maintaining automation frameworks for mobile apps.
‚Ä¢ Experience handling large-scale or complex test scenarios (multiple user accounts, concurrency, etc.).
3. CI/CD & Version Control
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with continuous integration (Jenkins, GitLab, or similar) and version control workflows (GitHub, GitLab).
‚Ä¢ Ability to set up test pipelines, environment variables, and triggers for automated builds.
4. Debugging & Reporting
‚Ä¢ Strong debugging skills, investigating failing tests, diagnosing UI flakiness or environment issues.
‚Ä¢ Comfortable generating and interpreting logs/snapshots for quick resolution.
5. Agile Mindset & Communication
‚Ä¢ Team player who can communicate effectively with developers and stakeholders.
‚Ä¢ Open to iterative feedback, daily standups or sprint reviews.
6. Bonus / Nice-to-Have
‚Ä¢ iOS automation experience (XCUITest)
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of API testing (Postman, RestAssured)
‚Ä¢ Proxy / Advanced Networking for more complex automation environments
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with test management tools (TestRail, Zephyr)

Project Scope & Timeline
1. Phase 1: Audit & Stabilize
‚Ä¢ Review existing scripts, fix major issues.
‚Ä¢ Establish robust baseline tests (login, core features) with stable pass rates.
2. Phase 2: Expand Coverage
‚Ä¢ Add test scenarios for advanced features, concurrency, or specialized user flows.
‚Ä¢ Integrate fully with CI/CD (Jenkins or similar) to generate nightly or on-demand runs.
3. Phase 3: Scale & Optimize
‚Ä¢ Leverage device farms or additional emulators to run tests in parallel.
‚Ä¢ Fine-tune performance, reduce flakiness, and ensure consistent test outcomes.
We are open to both hourly or milestone-based engagements, depending on experience and proposed approach. You will coordinate with our internal dev team (or other QAs) via Slack/Jira/GitHub for tickets, code reviews, and overall project tracking.

title: Mobile app development
description:
We are seeking an experienced mobile app developer (or development team) to build a cross-platform mobile application using Vue.js integrated with Ionic Framework, targeting both iOS and Android platforms, with a planned launch this summer. The app will serve as an extension of our existing platform and must integrate seamlessly with our website and MySQL database via a RESTful API (developed in-house).

Project Scope & Key Features:

User Registration & Authentication:
Implement sign-up and login functionalities using our existing system (email/username + password) to ensure a unified experience between the website and mobile app.

Real-Time One-on-One Chat:
Develop a secure chat feature for direct communication between users and therapists. The chat should leverage WebSockets combined with AWS Lambda for real-time interactions, while chat sessions and messages are stored in AWS RDS.

Push Notifications:
Integrate push notifications for new chat messages and scheduled reminders, ensuring users remain engaged even when not actively using the app.

Diary Functionality:
Enable users to create, edit, and sync diary entries directly from the app. All entries will be stored in the MySQL database via our API.

Guided Exercises via WebView:
Display existing therapeutic exercises through an in-app WebView, utilizing our current responsive web pages to save on development time.

Resource Library & Search:
Provide access to a searchable library of cached texts. While the library content can be cached on the device, synchronization with the server is essential to keep data up-to-date.

Technical Requirements:

Framework & Tools:

Develop the mobile app using Vue.js integrated with Ionic Framework.
Leverage Ionic‚Äôs tools and Capacitor to package and deploy a single codebase as native apps on both iOS and Android.
API Integration:

Consume RESTful API endpoints (authentication, diary, library content) developed by our internal team.
Real-Time Communication & Cloud Integration:

Implement a real-time chat system using AWS Lambda, API Gateway (WebSockets), and AWS RDS.
Integrate push notifications using services like Firebase Cloud Messaging (FCM) for Android and Apple Push Notification service (APNs) for iOS.

title: Media Compression Fix - Mobile Dev
description:
Technical Issue Description:
Our mobile application (available on both iOS and Android) is experiencing intermittent crashes when users attempt to upload media files larger than 10MB. The crash occurs specifically during the compression process before upload begins. Our analytics show this affects approximately 8% of our user base, primarily on devices running iOS 16+ and Android 11+.
The issue appears to be related to memory management during the compression algorithm execution. The app successfully handles smaller files but fails to properly allocate resources for larger media. Debug logs show "OutOfMemoryError" exceptions on Android and "Memory Warning" followed by termination on iOS.

Requirements:

Strong experience with both iOS (Swift) and Android (Kotlin) development
Expertise in media handling, compression algorithms, and memory optimization
Familiarity with troubleshooting crash reports and performance issues
Ability to quickly navigate unfamiliar codebases
Experience implementing cross-platform solutions

Responsibilities:

Review existing compression implementation and identify the root cause
Develop and implement an optimized solution that works across both platforms
Test the fix across multiple device configurations
Document the changes made and provide recommendations for future improvements
Submit working code with proper comments by end of day

title: DJI Cloud APi Developer
description:
We are seeking an experienced Android developer to build an application that leverages the DJI Mobile SDK v5 to enable remote drone control via gRPC. The goal of this project is to create a proxy between gRPC and the DJI Mobile SDK, allowing a server to issue commands‚Äîsuch as take-off, landing, and virtual stick movements‚Äîto the drone in real time.

Project Responsibilities:
‚Ä¢‚Å†  ‚Å†Develop an Android application using the DJI Mobile SDK v5.
‚Ä¢‚Å†  ‚Å†Implement functionality to control a DJI drone via a bi-directional gRPC channel.
‚Ä¢‚Å†  ‚Å†Relay take-off, landing, and virtual stick commands from a remote server to the drone.
‚Ä¢‚Å†  ‚Å†Provide realtime video feed back o er grpc to the server.
‚Ä¢‚Å†  ‚Å†Integrate gRPC and Protobuf definitions provided for the communication protocol.
‚Ä¢‚Å†  ‚Å†Create a user interface that allows the configuration of an IP address/DNS name for the drone to connect to.
‚Ä¢‚Å†  ‚Å†Ensure reliable and low-latency communication between the server and the drone.
‚Ä¢‚Å†  ‚Å†Collaborate with our team to test and refine the application for optimal performance and stability.
‚Ä¢‚Å†  ‚Å†Optionally support gRPC connections over SSL for security.
‚Ä¢‚Å†  ‚Å†There is no need to implement any authentication.
‚Ä¢‚Å†  ‚Å†The commands can be called at any rate from the server. Each command has a TTL of 100ms. Expired commands will move the sticks to the neutral position making the drone hover in place.
‚Ä¢‚Å†  ‚Å†A new command coming in should be executed immediately replacing the current command.
‚Ä¢‚Å†  ‚Å†Realtime video from the drone should be sent through the gRPC connection to the server.

Please include the following in your proposal:
‚Ä¢‚Å†  ‚Å†A brief summary of your relevant experience, specifically highlighting any projects involving DJI SDK or gRPC.
‚Ä¢‚Å†  ‚Å†Examples of previous Android applications you have developed.
‚Ä¢‚Å†  ‚Å†Your approach and estimated timeline for completing this project.
‚Ä¢‚Å†  ‚Å†Any questions you might have about the project requirements.

P.S: ONLY INDEPENDENT CONTRACTORS, NO AGENCIES. THANK YOU

We are looking for an experienced app developer to bring our fully designed Adobe XD UI to life by developing a cross-platform mobile app (iOS & Android) that integrates with our existing IoT device over WiFi.

Experience integrating third-party APIs

Note we are open to working with individual developers or development studios

Deliverables:

Well-documented code and technical documentation

How to Apply:

title: Develop a P2P Car Park App for iOS and Android
description:
We are seeking an experienced mobile app developer to create a peer-to-peer car parking application for both iOS and Android platforms.When someone is ready to unpark his car then he will send a notification on the system. The system will then pair this user with another one that seeks for parking on the same location. Then he will send GPS coordinates in order to find the parking spot. The user that seeks for parking will send coins on the user that will wait before unpark. The app should enable users to list, discover, and book parking spaces in a user-friendly manner. It will require integration of payment systems, user profiles, and location services. If you have a strong background in mobile app development and a portfolio showcasing similar projects, we want to hear from you!
Data Sources:

User Profiles:
Fields: User ID (unique), Name, Phone Number (verified), Email (verified), GPS Coordinates (current), Coin Balance, Rating (average).
Data Source: Internal Lovable.dev database.
Parking Spot Listings:
Fields: Listing ID (unique), User ID (who is leaving), GPS Coordinates (parking spot), Time Created, Status (available, claimed, completed), Coin Reward, Geofence Area ID.
Data Source: Internal Lovable.dev database.
Geofence Areas:
Fields: Geofence ID (unique), GPS Coordinates (center), Radius (meters).
Data Source: Internal Lovable.dev database.
Transactions:
Fields: Transaction ID (unique), Sender User ID, Receiver User ID, Coin Amount, Time Stamp.
Data Source: Internal Lovable.dev Database.
User Roles:

Driver Leaving:
Functionality:
Create a parking spot listing:
Capture current GPS coordinates.
Set a coin reward.
Select a geofence area.
Must confirm spot availability before listing is active.
Confirm parking spot transfer.
Receive coins.
Rate the other user.
Driver Seeking:
Functionality:
View available parking spot listings within a selected geofence.
Claim a parking spot listing.
Send coins.
Receive GPS coordinates of the parking spot.
Rate the other user.
Key Features and Logic:

Geofencing:
Implement geofencing to define parking areas.
Users can only view listings within their selected geofence.
Use a mapping component to display geofence areas.
Proximity Matching:
Match drivers seeking parking with drivers leaving spots within the same geofence.
Prioritize listings based on proximity and time created.
Real-Time Notifications:
Use Lovable.dev's notification system to send:
Notifications to drivers seeking when a spot becomes available.
Notifications to drivers leaving when a spot is claimed.
Confirmation notifications.
Implement an in app notification log.
Coin/Payment System:
Integrate Stripe or PayPal for secure coin transactions.
Implement a secure database to track coin balances.
Add a transaction history page for each user.
User Verification:
Require phone number and email verification during signup.
Implement user rating system.
GPS Accuracy:
Use a mapping component to display GPS coordinates.
Provide clear instructions on how to improve GPS accuracy.
Add a manual location input option.
Parking Spot Confirmation:
Add a ‚Äúconfirm spot leaving‚Äù button.
Add a timer to this button. If not pressed, the spot listing is deleted.
Legal Considerations:
Add a terms of service and privacy policy page.
Include a disclaimer stating that the app is a tool and that parking is the user's responsibility.
Battery Optimization:
Optimize GPS tracking to minimize battery usage.
Provide options to adjust location tracking frequency.
Specific Instructions:

Use Lovable.dev's drag-and-drop interface to create the app's UI.
Use Lovable.dev's database integration to connect to the data sources.
Use Lovable.dev's API integrations to connect to Stripe/PayPal and mapping services.
Thoroughly test all features and workflows.
Create a help/FAQ page.
Create a report button for users to report misuse.
Error Handling:

Implement error messages for invalid inputs and failed transactions.
Handle GPS signal loss gracefully.
Implement a dispute resolution process for coin disputes.
UI/UX:

Design a clean and intuitive user interface.
Use clear and concise language.
Provide helpful tooltips and instructions.

title: Update of our App
description:
We are a labor hire company that provides skilled workers to clients on demand. Our workers use a custom-built app to log their timesheets daily, and these records form the basis for payroll processing and client invoicing. However, our current system is inefficient because the backend database is on a separate platform from Google Sheets. As a result, our bookkeeper must manually copy and paste data between systems, slowing down operations.

Our goal is to integrate Google Sheets as the backend database to automate processes, streamline payroll, and eventually integrate AI-driven features for further efficiency.

Project Overview

We need an experienced developer to update our existing app while keeping the current functionality intact. The focus is on integrating Google Sheets as the backend database. We want to ensure that:

All worker, client, and timesheet data is stored and managed via Google Sheets.

The app frontend allows workers to sign up, log timesheets, and view payroll details.

Google Sheets remains fully synchronized with the app, allowing two-way data updates.

Our bookkeeper can manually update the Google Sheets database, and changes should be reflected in the app in real time.

If updating the existing app proves too difficult, we are open to developing a new version based on the current functionality, but with an improved and optimized backend using Google Sheets.

Scope of Work

Phase 1: Google Sheets Integration & App Update

Migrate the current app backend to Google Sheets.

Maintain current functionality while improving performance and stability.

Ensure that all app data (workers, clients, timesheets) is stored in structured Google Sheets tables.

Implement two-way synchronization between Google Sheets and the app.

Maintain existing timesheet calculations (overtime, night shifts, etc.) without rebuilding formulas.

Ensure payroll calculations and invoicing processes remain intact but operate directly from Google Sheets.

Optimize existing automation to reduce manual copy-pasting by our bookkeeper.

Phase 2: Future Developments (Optional, Long-Term Collaboration)

Email Automation: Implement MailerLite API integration for automated email sequences.

Contract Automation: Use SignNow API to automate contract submissions.

AI Agent Deployment: Develop AI agents to analyze worker data and assist in decision-making.

Chatbot Integration: Integrate with Chatbase or another chatbot that can read data in real time and provide workers with relevant information.

Further System Enhancements: Additional automation features to streamline labor hire operations.

Requirements

Proven experience in app development and backend integration.

Strong knowledge of Google Sheets API and real-time data synchronization.

Experience using AI tools for coding efficiency.

Ability to optimize processes while maintaining quality.

Experience with API integrations (MailerLite, SignNow, Chatbase, etc.).

Ability to work with our current designs or adapt to a Figma template.

How to Apply

If you‚Äôre interested in this project, please provide:

Examples of previous work relevant to app development and database integration.

Confirmation that you have the required skills.

Confirmation that you will use AI tools to optimize development speed and cost-effectiveness.

Your estimated timeline and pricing for Phase 1 (Google Sheets integration and app update).

Optional: Your thoughts on future developments and long-term collaboration.

This project offers a long-term opportunity for the right candidate, as we plan to continuously improve and expand the system.

title: Mobile app attribution expert needed for Fintech
description:
Lopay is a fast-growing payment platform operating across multiple countries with iOS and Android apps. We acquire new merchants through various ad channels (Meta, Google, etc.), but we lack precise attribution on where each new signup comes from‚Äîespecially at the ad and campaign level.

We are looking for freelancers with expertise in tracking, analytics, and attribution to help us implement a robust tracking solution that accurately links merchant signups to specific ad sources.

We need 1:1 accurate attribution to work out where all signups and further in-app actions come from.

Customer journey:
install
register
submit KYC documents
take their first payment

Please only apply if you can fix this issue

üõ†Ô∏è Scope of Work (let us know if you have another idea)

1Ô∏è‚É£ Pre-Signup Tracking (Click ‚Üí App Install ‚Üí Signup)
‚Ä¢ Implement UTM-based tracking for web and mobile journeys.
‚Ä¢ Set up deep linking (e.g., using Branch.io, AppsFlyer, Adjust, or Firebase) to attribute mobile app installs to specific ads.
‚Ä¢ Ensure data is stored and passed through the signup process.

2Ô∏è‚É£ Backend Attribution (Signup ‚Üí CRM Matching)
‚Ä¢ Store UTM parameters or referral sources within the Lopay signup flow.
‚Ä¢ Match signup data with ad campaign details in the backend.
‚Ä¢ Build a dashboard/reporting system to view attribution metrics.

3Ô∏è‚É£ Post-Signup Attribution (Meta & Google Ads Matching)
‚Ä¢ Implement Facebook Conversion API (CAPI) & Google Enhanced Conversions for server-side event tracking.
‚Ä¢ Set up offline conversion tracking‚Äîupload hashed emails to Meta & Google Ads for improved attribution.

4Ô∏è‚É£ Alternative Tracking Solutions
‚Ä¢ Create unique promo codes or referral links for different campaigns to track conversions manually.
‚Ä¢ Explore QR code tracking for offline/alternative marketing channels.

üîé Ideal Freelancer Profile

‚úÖ Expertise in Attribution & Tracking (Google Analytics, Facebook CAPI, Google Enhanced Conversions, UTMs)
‚úÖ Experience with Mobile Tracking (AppsFlyer, Branch.io, Adjust, or Firebase)
‚úÖ Knowledge of CRM Integration (HubSpot, Salesforce, or custom databases)
‚úÖ Ability to Build Dashboards & Reports (Google Data Studio, Looker, or custom BI tools)
‚úÖ Strong Communication & Documentation Skills

title: Senior React Native/Expo Developer - Immediate Start
description:
Project Overview and Company Background
- The project involves creating an application for a company that provides software to local auctioneers and auction houses.
- The application's primary use case is inventory ingestion for heavy equipment brought to auction yards.
- The app aims to bridge the connection between inventory ingestion and catalog availability for online bidding.
- The company lacks expertise in React and React Native, despite having broad software experience.

Technical Challenges and Requirements
- The application must be offline-first due to poor connectivity in remote auction yards and warehouse locations.
- Data synchronization with the cloud is crucial and must be resilient to connection interruptions.
- The app uses Realm as a NoSQL database for local storage.
- Initial hydration of the application involves SSO-based or SAML 2 compliant authentication.
- Delta synchronization strategies are employed for new inventory and changes to existing inventory.
- The API is idempotent, allowing repeated application of changes without harming server-side data structures.
- Memory requirements on Android devices are more stringent due to the variety in device quality.

Current Implementation and Issues
- The application assumes entities are Realm entities, with persistence directly queried in some locations.
- Realm is used for both key-value and deeper level storage, including authentication, user data, and SAML 2 tokens.
- During beta testing, only 7 out of 67 pictures taken of one piece of equipment were successfully uploaded to storage.
- The developer suspects issues with object listening or state invalidation that require expertise in React Native to resolve.

Proposed Solutions and Development Approach
- The new developer suggests implementing a sync queue to store pending changes of Realm objects.
- Each entry in the sync queue will track its status (pending, in progress, failed).
- The sync logic will process the queue when the network is available, marking items as successful or retrying with a backoff strategy.
- Realm transactions will ensure data integrity during synchronization.
- Component lifecycles will be tied to Realm objects via subscriptions to prevent React Native errors when objects are deleted.

Work Style and Communication
- The developer typically works on an EST schedule, available from 9 AM to 5 or 6 PM.
- Daily updates and progress videos will be provided.
- The project uses an Expo system for receiving changes and providing new builds.
- Commits should be small and targeted, avoiding large refactors with numerous changes.
- Code reviews will be conducted throughout the day.
- The developer will work primarily on weekdays, aiming for a 30-hour work week.
- Fluent in English

title: Build a Small Agile Development Team for a New App
description:
We are seeking an experienced React Native developer to build a hybrid mobile app for Gigspot, a music event ticketing platform connecting fans, artists, and venues. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in mobile development with a focus on hybrid frameworks, payment integrations, and user-friendly UI/UX. You will be responsible for creating a seamless, scalable, and high-performance application while collaborating with our existing web development efforts. If you have experience in developing event or marketplace apps, optimizing performance, and deploying to both iOS and Android, we‚Äôd love to hear from you.

Gigspot is a next-generation event ticketing platform designed to empower independent artists, venues, and fans. It provides a seamless experience for discovering live events, purchasing tickets, and managing performances, all while offering a fair and transparent marketplace for the live music industry. Unlike traditional ticketing platforms, Gigspot prioritizes accessibility, data-driven insights, and artist-first revenue models to create a thriving ecosystem where music professionals can connect, grow, and monetize their craft. With features like tier-based venue access, artist trend capture, personal artist/venue profiles with subscription based tiering systems, an Artist bank. Automated tour route and cost planning, auto-promo features (scheduled) promoting based on analytics, integrated ticket sales, and fan engagement tools, Gigspot aims to revolutionize how live music is booked, promoted, and experienced.

Gigspot ‚Äì Hybrid Mobile App Development
Job Title:
Full-Stack Mobile Developer (React Native) ‚Äì Event Ticketing & Artist Booking Platform

Project Overview:
Gigspot is a music event ticketing and booking platform designed to connect fans, artists, and venues. The platform will allow artists to self-book performances, manage tours, and receive payments, while venues can approve artist bookings and sell tickets directly to fans.

We are looking for an experienced React Native developer or full-stack team to build a hybrid mobile application for iOS and Android, along with an admin panel for platform management. The ideal candidate should have experience with event ticketing, payment integrations such as Stripe and PayPal, real-time data handling, and subscription models.

Scope of Work

Core Features (MVP ‚Äì Required for Initial Launch)
User authentication using Firebase/Auth0, including email/password login, social login, and password reset
User profiles for artists, venues, and fans with profile creation, editing, and verification system
Event listings and search functionality where users can browse and filter events by date, genre, and location
Artist self-booking system allowing artists to apply for events and venues to approve or reject requests
Ticket sales and payment processing through Stripe and PayPal, including automated revenue splitting between artists and venues
QR code ticketing and check-in system for venue entry
Push notifications using Firebase Cloud Messaging or OneSignal for event reminders, ticket confirmations, and booking updates
Basic admin panel for managing users, events, and financial transactions

Additional Features (Required for Full Platform Functionality)
Subscription tiers for artists and venues with paid membership options
Artist bank and revenue management to track earnings and request payouts
Automated tour planning system that suggests routes for artists
Auto-promotion tools to boost event visibility based on analytics and ticket demand
Social media integrations allowing event promotions across platforms like Facebook and Instagram

Technical Requirements
Frontend: React Native (Expo preferred)
Backend: Firebase (Firestore & Realtime Database) or Node.js with Express
Authentication: Firebase Auth or Auth0
Payments: Stripe API, PayPal SDK
Notifications: Firebase Cloud Messaging or OneSignal
Hosting & Deployment: Google Cloud (Firebase Hosting) or DigitalOcean
Version Control: GitHub or GitLab
Expected Deliverables
Fully functional hybrid mobile app for iOS and Android
Responsive admin panel for managing events and user activity
Secure payment system with automated revenue distribution
Scalable database structure to support growth
Deployment to App Store and Google Play
Budget and Timeline
Fixed Budget
Estimated Completion: 6‚Äì8 weeks
We are looking for a developer or a small team who can work efficiently within this budget while delivering a high-quality, functional MVP that can scale.

How to Apply
Please provide:

Your experience with event ticketing, booking platforms, or payment integrations
Links to past projects, especially mobile apps related to events or e-commerce
Your estimated timeline and approach to development
A breakdown of how you would structure the project milestones
We look forward to working with a dedicated developer who understands the event and music industry and can help bring Gigspot to life.

title: Mobile app developer needed to create a kid-friendly reading/audio story mobile application
description:
Mobile App Developer Needed for a Beautiful and Simple Kids' Reading & Audio App  

I am looking for an experienced app developer to create a sleek, user-friendly reading and audio app for kids. The app should be simple, lightweight, and designed to engage young readers while providing a seamless experience.  

Features:
1. Read & Listen: Kids can read stories or listen to audio versions. If listening to audio version, is it possible to have the text being spoken highlighted so kids can follow? Also, it should have a feature that kids can click some boldened words to show their meanings, like a vocabulary glossary.
2. Progress Tracking: Ability to track where they left off and continue anytime.
3. use account/Library: parents/Kids should be able to create an account and save books to their favorite, currently reading, etc.
4. Back end: Easy to navigate backend for us to upload stories, images and audio seamlessly and easily.
5. Simple UI/UX: A clean, intuitive design optimized for kids and parents. We can work together to figure out color palette, we will provide artwork and design ideas.
6. Lightweight & Efficient: No unnecessary bloat; should run smoothly on various devices (ios, android ohone and tablet. We are open to discussing a website version later for those who use computers).  

Optional: Ability to take small notes, highlight text, I am open to more ideas to make it engaging for kids.

Our ideal candidate:
- Experience in mobile app development (iOS & Android).  
- Strong UI/UX design skills for child-friendly applications.  
- Experience with audio integration and progress-tracking features.  
- Knowledge of cloud storage for hosting stories

We are an independent creator so we are looking for someone who can help us deliver a high-quality, efficient but small MVP which can be scalable as we have more resources.

Budget: Open to proposals. Please share estimated cost and timeline in your application. We can chat about these things.  

If you're interested, please share your portfolio and any relevant experience with similar apps. Looking forward to working with you!

title: NFC programming and consulting using USB and Andriod Tablet
description:
We are looking for an experienced Flutter developer with expertise in NFC reader integration, USB serial communication, and payment systems. The selected candidate will be responsible for implementing a bank-certified NFC payment flow using a USB-connected NFC reader in a Flutter-based tablet application.
Our system consists of a tablet (Android) and an NFC reader (USB-connected).
The NFC reader follows a specific protocol (Multi-Message Protocol - MMP) documented by the bank.
The Flutter app needs to communicate with the NFC reader, send initialization commands, and process payments securely.
The bank‚Äôs payment processing API is already built-in, but correct command handling and response processing are required.

title: Developer needed to build a productivity app (ios android)
description:
The app aims to enhance productivity by reducing social media usage and encouraging focus through gamification. It combines elements from Forest app and Focus Tree, with a more streamlined interface. Users can block social media apps and engage in focus sessions using timers, stopwatches, or the Pomodoro technique. During these sessions, they plant virtual flowers on hexagonal plots in their garden. The hexagonal tiles represent honeycomb cells. Successful focus sessions earn users virtual coins, which can be used to unlock new flowers and background sounds. In-app purchases allow users to buy a necatr that triples their coin earnings.

The app includes social features similar to Instagram, where users can follow others, like and comment on their gardens, and invite friends to group planting sessions. If users lose focus, their flowers wither, but these can be removed using coins. The app displays daily motivational quotes upon opening.

The interface should be clean and intuitive, addressing the complexity issues found in similar apps. Users can track their progress daily, weekly, or monthly, viewing how their garden grows and diversifies. Rare flowers are more expensive to unlock.

Monetization options include a one-time purchase for lifetime access (approximately $9 USD) or a free version where users earn fewer coins per focus session. The paid version offers significantly more coins per session, enhancing the user's ability to unlock content.

The UI will be sent and ready after application.

title: Evidence Camera for capturing detailed layouts for telecommunications
description:
I am hoping to develop an app to document telecommunications infrastructure, such as manholes  and pits.

The app needs to prompt users to capture all required information, one photo at a time.

For example, the amount of ducts/pipes at each end of the pit/manhole.

On top of capturing this information in the photo, there will be check boxes to identify specific information.

On top of this, I would like the app to generate a sheet that documents and draws up that information, providing an overall pit/manhole layout.

I have sample sheets to show how these final sheets should look, and ideas on how we could capture this information accurately and easily.

The photos would need to save directly onto the phone being used, on the app, and potentially directly  onto a selected folder.

If you see the attached, you will see the required information and the samples of the Manhole Sheets.

I have ideas on how I would see this being a useful tool, but I'm open to suggestions.

Is it possible to take a photo of the end of a pit or manhole, then have options to select certain ducts on the pit wall, and flag them as a certain size, and also what remaining capacity they have?

If you look at the photo attached, you will see the side of a manhole with multiple ducts. These vary in size and remaining capacity.  

I imagine being able to click a duct on the photo, then click a check box that specifies a size and another that specifies a remaining capacity (what can still fit in the duct, with what's already there)

By doing this, the collected info can be generated onto a Manhole Sheet as per the attached example?

You would also need to be available for any further updates or issues into the future, and quite likely other similar projects.
skills: ['Smartphone', 'Web Development', 'CSS', 'iPadOS', 'Android', 'Mobile App Design', 'iOS', 'Web Design', 'JavaScript', 'Prototyping']

title: Web App Developer for Travel Challenge Platform
description:
I am interested in developing a travel challenge web app, similar to Polarsteps.com, but focused on location-based challenges. The platform should allow users to complete geolocated challenges, earn points and badges, and see their ranking on a global leaderboard.
I understand that a web app is more cost-effective than a native mobile app (Android/iOS), but if possible, I would love to receive a quotation for both. My priority is to start with the web app, and if it gains traction, I would like to complement it with a mobile app.
üîπ Main Requirements:
‚úÖ User Registration/Login: Email, Google, Facebook, TikTok.
‚úÖ User Profile: Photo, name, counter of completed challenges, points, earned badges, and a summary of transportation methods used (car, bus, motorcycle, motorhome, bicycle, etc.).
‚úÖ Challenge System: A predefined list of challenges created by me or premium users, categorized by type and location.
‚úÖ Statistics Section: Similar to Polarsteps, users should be able to see personalized travel stats, including:
‚Ä¢ Number of challenges completed
‚Ä¢ % of each open challenge completed
‚Ä¢ Total locations visited
‚Ä¢ Distance traveled
‚Ä¢ Number of different transportation methods used
‚Ä¢ Most visited countries/cities
‚Ä¢ Etc.
‚úÖ Bulk Challenge Upload: I already have 1,000 challenge locations in Mexico, and the system must allow easy mass uploads, as the number of locations will continue to grow with each new country and challenge category I add. This should be considered in terms of database scalability and performance.
‚úÖ Challenge Proof Submission: Users must upload at least one photo per challenge location.
‚úÖ Automatic Approval: Challenges should be auto-approved, but with an option for manual moderation if necessary.
‚úÖ Points and Badges: Each destination will grant points, and upon reaching specific milestones, users will earn collectible badges.
‚úÖ Open Check-in: Users should be able to check in at any location on the map, but badges can only be earned by completing the predefined challenges.
‚úÖ Ranking and Gamification: A global and city-based leaderboard based on earned points.
‚úÖ Geolocated Challenges: Users must physically visit designated locations to complete challenges.
‚úÖ Challenges Without a Specific Location: I need the ability to add challenges that don‚Äôt require a fixed location, such as:
‚Ä¢ Trying a specific dish
‚Ä¢ Skydiving
‚Ä¢ Rafting
‚Ä¢ Hiking or trekking
‚úÖ Transport Mode Selection: Users should specify how they arrived at the location (car, bus, motorcycle, motorhome, bicycle, etc.).
‚úÖ Monetization:
‚Ä¢ Phase 1: Integration with AdSense and premium subscriptions.
‚Ä¢ Phase 2: Expansion to sponsorships, collaborations, and merchandise.
‚úÖ Responsive Design: Optimized for both mobile and desktop, with an adventurous style similar to Polarsteps.
‚úÖ Multilanguage Support: The platform should support multiple languages from the start.
‚úÖ Easy Management: I need to be able to add new challenges, moderate content, and manage basic daily operations.
‚úÖ Training: I will need assistance learning how to manage the platform after launch.
‚úÖ International Expansion: I already have example challenges in Mexico, but I am preparing challenges for other countries.
üîπ Example Challenge Categories (Mexico):
These will serve as a model for expanding challenges to other countries:
1. Pueblos M√°gicos ‚Äì Culturally and historically significant towns.
2. Pre-Hispanic Mexico ‚Äì Archaeological sites and pre-Hispanic heritage zones.
3. Mexico‚Äôs Beaches & Coasts ‚Äì Popular coastal destinations.
4. Blue Mexico ‚Äì Lagoons, rivers, lakes, and other water bodies.
5. Green Mexico ‚Äì Natural reserves, mountains, forests, and ecological parks.
6. Mexico‚Äôs Capital Cities ‚Äì Major state capitals.
7. Famous Roads ‚Äì Iconic travel routes, especially for motorcyclists.
8. Mexican Landmarks ‚Äì Monuments and emblematic sites across cities.
9. Gastronomy ‚Äì Destinations famous for their traditional food.
10. Scenic Routes ‚Äì Roads with breathtaking views ideal for road trips.

üîπ Quotation Request:
I would like to know:
‚Ä¢ Your development proposal (recommended technologies and approach).
‚Ä¢ Estimated delivery time for the project.
‚Ä¢ Total cost based on the described functionalities.
‚Ä¢ Your post-launch support options (if available).
‚Ä¢ Payment terms: How would payments be structured (upfront, milestone-based, upon completion, etc.)?
‚Ä¢ Quotation for a mobile app (Android/iOS) in case I decide to complement the web app in the future.
Please send me a detailed quotation along with any recommendations you might have.
Looking forward to your response and the possibility of working together! üöÄ
Regards

title: FlutterFlow Developer Needed for API Fixes & App Optimization
description:
Job Description:

We are looking for a skilled FlutterFlow app developer to help us resolve minor API errors and optimize our existing app on FlutterFlow (https://www.flutterflow.io/). The app is functioning well but requires improvements in loading times, UI behavior, and push notifications before being deployed to the App Store and Play Store.

Scope of Work:
1. Optimize Explore Page & Messages Tab:
‚Ä¢ The Explore Page currently refreshes every time the user navigates away and returns, causing longer loading times. We need to change this to swipe-down-to-refresh to improve performance.
‚Ä¢ The Messages Tab takes 10+ seconds to load, even with minimal messages. This needs to be optimized for faster performance.
2. Fix API Issues & Push Notifications:
‚Ä¢ Address any API errors impacting performance.
‚Ä¢ Ensure push notifications are functioning correctly across devices.
3. Remove Unnecessary Pages:
‚Ä¢ Clean up unused or redundant pages to improve app navigation and performance.
‚Ä¢ Convert 1-2 web pages to app pages if needed
4. App Deployment:
‚Ä¢ Once all fixes are completed, we need the app to be successfully published on Apple App Store and Google Play Store.

Our website is built on Wordpress.

Ideal Candidate:

‚úîÔ∏è Proficient in FlutterFlow
‚úîÔ∏è Strong debugging & app optimization skills
‚úîÔ∏è Experience with API integration & performance improvements
‚úîÔ∏è Proven experience in publishing apps on App Store & Play Store
‚úîÔ∏è Quick turnaround time (We need this done ASAP)

If you are fast, reliable, and experienced, we‚Äôd love to work with you. Please share your past FlutterFlow projects when applying.

Looking forward to your proposals!

Additional Features:

For Users:

‚Ä¢ AI-powered recommendations: Recommend businesses based on a user's past reviews, location, and other preferences.
‚Ä¢ Lists and collections: Allow users to create and share their own curated lists of businesses (e.g., "Best date night spots" or "Kid-friendly restaurants").
‚Ä¢ Interactive forums and Q&A sections: Connect users with other reviewers and business owners to ask questions and share experiences.
‚Ä¢ Verification badges: Verify reviewers based on purchase history, social media, or other criteria to increase trust in reviews.

For Businesses:
‚Ä¢ Reputation management tools: Track reviews and analyze sentiment to identify trends and improve customer satisfaction.

‚Ä¢ Targeted advertising: Promote your business to specific user segments based on their review activity and preferences.

‚Ä¢ Employee recognition: Highlight top-performing employees based on positive mentions in reviews.
‚Ä¢ Advanced analytics dashboard: Get detailed insights into review trends, customer demographics, and competitor analysis.
Additional Features:

‚Ä¢ Event listings and promotions: Allow businesses to post upcoming events and promotional offers.
‚Ä¢ Fact-checking and misinformation detection: Combat fake news and unreliable information in reviews.
‚Ä¢ Integration with other platforms: Integrate with booking platforms, delivery services, or social media for a seamless user experience.

title: Fix the error of the camera UVCAndroid library, UVCCamera
description:
We use UVCAndroid library to connect external camera. We can see and record video on different tablets and smartphones, but it is impossible and on tablets with a diagonal of 8.7 "this library does not work, black screen and when I start and finish recording the screen I see the error "The file has no video key frame"

we have tested this application - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=net.usb.usby4&hl=en_US  and it also uses UVCAndroid library and it works on these tablets

tablets:
SAMSUNG Galaxy Tab A9 8.7‚Äù OS 14
Xiaomi Redmi Pad Se WiFi 8.7" OS 14
Samsung Galaxy Tab A7

You can use any USB camera and USB - Type C adapter for testing

We have investigated this problem a little and came to the conclusion:
Image Decodiong errors:
I First few bytes of frame: 0 0 0 0 0 0
E Invalid MJPEG frame SOI. size: 2688 SOI: 00

Valid MJPEG frame SOI. size: 336288 SOI: ffd8 - output to pixel 7 everything works here
Invalid MJPEG frame SOI. size: 1768 SOI: 00 - display on Samsung Galaxy Tab A7 Lite does not work here

other errors:
E set:488 set: Unset optional value from type CTA861_3
E set:488 set: Unset optional value from type SMPTE2086

https://issuetracker.google.com/issues/288828159?hl=ko&pli=1
https://community.infineon.com/t5/USB-superspeed-peripherals/CX3-UVC-video-streaming-OK-on-some-devices-but-failed-with-DMA-RESET-on-others/td-p/772075#

The MJPEG frame does not contain the correct SOI (Start of Image) ‚Äî the first two bytes, which should be 0xFF and 0xD8 respectively. In our case, SOI: 00 means that the first byte points to an incorrect SO

Sometimes a frame can be corrupted due to unstable communication or other factors that can corrupt its structure. It will be necessary to buffer several frames and only then pass them for decoding. This can help to assemble the frame from several parts.

Below I attach a screenshot of the error and the apk file of the UVCAndroid library, please run this apk on any device and connect any camera via type c. Then run this apk on an 8.7" tablet and try to play, you should see the error "The file has no video key frame".

It is necessary to fix this and enable UVCAndroid to record video on tablets with a diagonal of 8.7"

Fix the error of the camera UVCAndroid library, UVCCamera

you can check the code base here https://github.com/shiyinghan/UVCAndroid or use the archive in the attachment, or apk to get the error

title: iOS & Web App Developer Needed to Accelerate Development of RealMetric Analytics App
description:
About RealMetric Analytics & The App
RealMetric Analytics is a cutting-edge football data analytics company, providing elite clubs, scouts, and decision-makers with powerful insights through advanced player scouting, team analysis, and data-driven decision-making tools. See the full design here:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zP2IW9a2RFE&t=1s

Our RealMetric Analytics App is a high-performance scouting and analytics platform designed to:
‚úÖ Deliver in-depth player insights based on advanced data analytics
‚úÖ Provide real-time player alerts and customized watchlists
‚úÖ Enable advanced scouting tools for identifying transfer opportunities
‚úÖ Offer team analysis and comparative performance metrics
‚úÖ Support clubs and agencies in making data-driven recruitment decisions

The app is already in active development, with 1/3 of the pages completed and live, but we need to accelerate progress significantly while maintaining top-tier quality.

Project Context & Scope
1Ô∏è‚É£ Designs Are Ready ‚Äì No New Work Required

The UI/UX for version 1.0 is fully finalized and implemented.
Version 2.0 designs are being finalized, and there is no need for major design work‚Äîonly small adjustments during development as needed.
2Ô∏è‚É£ Development Progress & Need for Speed

1/3 of the app is developed and live, but the current development speed is too slow.
We need a developer who can rapidly execute the remaining work while maintaining code quality.
Speedy delivery is the #1 priority for version 1.0 and 2.0.
3Ô∏è‚É£ Firebase Backend ‚Äì Infrastructure is Fully Set Up

The app is fully integrated with Firebase, so no backend work is required.
You‚Äôll be working primarily on front-end implementation and Firebase integration, ensuring seamless connectivity with Firestore, Authentication, Cloud Functions, and Firebase Storage.
The role requires collaboration with our current developer to maintain consistency and ensure smooth transitions.
4Ô∏è‚É£ App Platforms & Web Integration

The app is being developed for iOS (mobile & tablet) using Swift & SwiftUI.
We also want to integrate a web app version in the future, so experience with React, Next.js, or similar frameworks is a plus.
5Ô∏è‚É£ Quality & Speed are Critical

Version 1.0 is already halfway done‚Äîwe need faster progress without sacrificing quality.
Version 2.0 development will start soon, and we want a structured, high-quality approach.
6Ô∏è‚É£ Long-Term Opportunities

Beyond this project, we have ambitious plans for future updates (Version 3.0+), an Android version, and additional advanced scouting and analytics features.
If you deliver high-quality work efficiently, this could lead to a long-term role in shaping the future of our platform.
Who We‚Äôre Looking For
Required Skills & Experience
üîπ iOS Development (Swift, SwiftUI, Objective-C)
üîπ Strong experience integrating Firebase (Firestore, Authentication, Cloud Functions, Firebase Storage)
üîπ Experience with mobile UI/UX implementation based on pre-designed layouts
üîπ Ability to integrate Firebase APIs seamlessly with a mobile app
üîπ Familiarity with web app development (React, Next.js, or similar) is a plus
üîπ Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail
üîπ Ability to work collaboratively with the existing developer
üîπ Efficient coding skills‚Äîwe need fast progress without compromising quality
üîπ Experience working in fast-paced, high-performance projects

Ideal Candidate
‚úÖ Can jump into an ongoing project and quickly pick up the work
‚úÖ Delivers fast results while ensuring top-tier quality
‚úÖ Comfortable working with pre-existing designs & Firebase backend
‚úÖ Takes ownership and proactively solves problems
‚úÖ Open to long-term collaboration for future updates & expansion

How to Apply
To be considered for this role, you must:
1Ô∏è‚É£ Confirm that you have read and fully understood this job description.
2Ô∏è‚É£ Explain how you would approach speeding up development while maintaining quality.
3Ô∏è‚É£ Provide examples of past iOS projects using Firebase you've worked on.
4Ô∏è‚É£ Share your experience working with an existing development team and collaborating on ongoing projects.

üö® Automated applications will NOT be considered. Only personalized applications that directly address the job details will be reviewed. Your application must be supplemented by your similar previous projects and a specific cover letter, explaining why you're the best candidate for this projectüö®

If you are ready to move fast, deliver high-quality code, and work on a cutting-edge football data platform, we want to hear from you! üöÄ

title: Experienced Mobile App Developer Needed for AI-Powered Expense Tracking App
description:
We are seeking a skilled mobile app developer to build a feature-rich expense tracking app tailored for the Chinese market. The app must seamlessly integrate with WeChat Pay and Alipay, automatically recording transactions (date, amount, merchant, time, etc.) when users make payments.

This app should support multiple account books, AI-powered categorization, advanced search, tagging, and collaborative expense management.

Key Features:

1. Payment Integration (WeChat Pay & Alipay)

‚úÖ Automatically logs transactions when users pay via WeChat Pay or Alipay.
‚úÖ Captures essential details: transaction date, amount, merchant, time, etc.
‚úÖ Ensures high accuracy in data retrieval and categorization.

2. Multiple Account Books & Sharing

‚úÖ Users can create multiple expense books (e.g., Personal, Business, Family).
‚úÖ Ability to share specific books with other users for collaborative tracking.

3. AI-Powered Auto-Categorization

‚úÖ AI automatically categorizes expenses into relevant spending categories.
‚úÖ Users can manually adjust categories if needed.

4. Smart Expense Input for Other Payment Methods

‚úÖ If a user pays with cash, bank transfer, credit card, the app automatically prompts them to enter transaction details immediately.

5. Import & Export Transactions

‚úÖ Users can import transactions (CSV, bank statements).
‚úÖ Export expense reports in Excel, PDF, or other formats.

6. AI-Based Insights & Reports

‚úÖ Visual reports & analytics on spending trends.
‚úÖ Optional AI-powered text analysis for financial insights and recommendations.

7. Search Transactions Feature üîç

‚úÖ Users can search transactions by:
‚Ä¢ Date
‚Ä¢ Merchant
‚Ä¢ Payment method
‚Ä¢ Amount
‚Ä¢ Notes
‚Ä¢ Tags

8. Tagging System üè∑Ô∏è

‚úÖ Users can add custom tags to transactions for easier tracking (e.g., #Business, #Food, #Shopping).
‚úÖ Filter transactions by tags for better expense organization.

9. Editable Transactions & Attachments

‚úÖ Users can edit transaction records anytime.
‚úÖ Attach receipts, invoices, or photos to transactions.

10. AI Customer Support
‚úÖ User contact customer support if needed

Technical Requirements:

üîπ Experience with WeChat Pay & Alipay API integration.
üîπ Proficiency in iOS & Android app development (React Native, Flutter, or Native).
üîπ Strong backend development skills (Node.js, Firebase, or other relevant stacks).
üîπ Experience with AI/ML for auto-categorization and text analysis.
üîπ Knowledge of data encryption & security best practices to protect financial data.
üîπ Familiarity with cloud storage & real-time database synchronization for shared expense books.

Additional Details:

üìå The app should have a user-friendly UI optimized for the Chinese market.
üìå Must comply with Chinese data privacy regulations.
üìå Developers with experience in Chinese fintech applications are preferred.

üöÄ If you have expertise in WeChat Pay & Alipay integration and are excited to develop an AI-powered finance app, we‚Äôd love to hear from you!

üîπ Please provide:
1Ô∏è‚É£ Portfolio of similar projects
2Ô∏è‚É£ Your estimated timeline & budget proposal

title: IOS and Android APP Developers to work on a "Reservation System" for an online food delivery APP
description:
Seeking two (2) IOS and Android APP Developers to work with our Development Team to complete a Reservation System on our Customer APP for an online food delivery application.

Must have experience in building a reservation system and expertise in the areas listed below. Estimating work required to be up to ~80 manhours for each Application with work to be completed on an URGENT basis e.g. +/- 1 week.

For Android Developer:

### 1. **Knowledge and Skills:**
   - **Programming Languages:**
     - **Java** or **Kotlin** (Kotlin is now the preferred language for Android development).
   - **Android SDK (Software Development Kit):** Understanding of the Android SDK is essential to build apps.
   - **Android Studio:** The official IDE (Integrated Development Environment) for Android app development.
   - **XML (Extensible Markup Language):** Used for designing the UI (User Interface) of the app.
   - **API Integration:** Knowledge of working with APIs to handle data exchange between apps and external services.
   - **Version Control:** Familiarity with Git for managing code versioning and collaboration.

### 2. **Development Tools:**
   - **Android Studio:** A powerful IDE for building Android apps, providing features like a code editor, emulators, and debugging tools.
   - **Gradle:** A build automation tool used for managing dependencies, building, and packaging the app.
   - **Android Emulator:** For testing the app without needing a physical device.
   - **Firebase:** For backend services like authentication, databases, and cloud storage.

### 3. **Knowledge of Android Frameworks and Libraries:**
   - **Jetpack Components:** Libraries for UI and app architecture (e.g., LiveData, ViewModel, Navigation, Room, etc.).
   - **Material Design:** Google's design system for creating user-friendly, beautiful UIs.
   - **Retrofit/Volley:** Libraries for making HTTP requests.
   - **Room:** An SQLite database library to manage local data storage.

### 4. **App Architecture:**
   - **MVVM (Model-View-ViewModel)** or **MVP (Model-View-Presenter):** Popular architectural patterns in Android development.
   - **Clean Architecture:** Helps structure code in a way that's maintainable and scalable.

### 5. **Testing:**
   - **Unit Testing:** Tools like JUnit for testing the logic of your app.
   - **UI Testing:** Espresso for UI testing, ensuring the user interface works as expected.
   - **Mockito:** For mocking objects in unit tests.

### 6. **Understanding of Android Lifecycle:**
   - **Activity Lifecycle:** Knowing the different stages in an app‚Äôs lifecycle (e.g., `onCreate()`, `onResume()`, etc.).
   - **Fragment Lifecycle:** Managing fragments properly to ensure proper behavior and performance.

### 7. **Knowledge of Databases:**
   - **SQLite:** A lightweight relational database engine used to store data locally in Android apps.
   - **Firebase Firestore/Realtime Database:** For cloud-based real-time databases.

### 8. **Publishing & Distribution:**
   - **Google Play Console:** Understanding how to publish an app to the Google Play Store, including handling app versions, updates, and pricing.
   - **App Signing:** Ensuring the app is securely signed with a private key before uploading to the Play Store.

### 9. **Security:**
   - **Secure Storage:** Knowledge of how to securely store sensitive information such as user data and passwords (e.g., using Android Keystore).
   - **Data Encryption:** Implementing encryption for sensitive data.
   - **Permissions:** Managing and requesting permissions for various device features like camera, location, etc.

### 10. **Additional Skills:**
   - **Understanding of RESTful APIs** for connecting to web services.
   - **Knowledge of GitHub or other Git-based platforms** for collaboration and code management.
   - **Experience with Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD)** pipelines to automate testing and deployment.

----------------------------------
IOS Developer requirements:

### 1. **Knowledge and Skills:**
   - **Programming Languages:**
     - **Swift**: The primary language for modern iOS development.
     - **Objective-C**: Older codebases might require familiarity with Objective-C, although Swift is now preferred.
   - **iOS SDK (Software Development Kit)**: Understanding the iOS SDK, which provides the necessary tools and APIs for app development.
   - **Xcode**: The official IDE for iOS development, containing a suite of tools for building, testing, and deploying iOS apps.
   - **Auto Layout**: Essential for building responsive UIs that adapt to different screen sizes and orientations.
   - **UIKit**: The framework for building the user interface in iOS apps.
   - **SwiftUI**: An alternative to UIKit, SwiftUI is a declarative framework for building UIs using Swift.
   
### 2. **Development Tools:**
   - **Xcode**: The integrated development environment (IDE) for iOS development, which includes a code editor, interface builder, simulator, and debugging tools.
   - **CocoaPods** or **Swift Package Manager (SPM)**: Dependency managers for adding third-party libraries or frameworks to your iOS projects.
   - **Simulator**: iOS simulators within Xcode for testing apps without requiring a physical device.
   - **TestFlight**: A platform for distributing beta versions of apps to testers.

### 3. **App Design & User Interface:**
   - **Human Interface Guidelines (HIG)**: Apple‚Äôs design principles that ensure your app follows best practices and provides an excellent user experience.
   - **SwiftUI**: A framework for building modern UIs in a declarative way, which is gaining popularity for new iOS projects.
   - **Storyboards and XIBs**: Legacy UI design tools that still play a role in many iOS projects.

### 4. **Knowledge of iOS Frameworks and Libraries:**
   - **UIKit**: For building and managing interfaces and responding to user interactions.
   - **Core Data**: Apple‚Äôs framework for managing app data and persistence.
   - **Core Animation**: Used for handling animations and transitions.
   - **Core Location**: For accessing the device‚Äôs location data.
   - **Push Notifications (APNs)**: To send notifications to users.
   - **MapKit**: For displaying maps and adding location-based features.
   - **CloudKit**: Apple‚Äôs framework for managing cloud-based data storage.

### 5. **App Architecture:**
   - **MVC (Model-View-Controller)**: The traditional design pattern for iOS apps, though newer patterns like **MVVM (Model-View-ViewModel)** and **VIPER** are gaining traction.
   - **Clean Architecture**: Helps structure your app's codebase for maintainability and scalability.
   - **Combine Framework**: A framework for reactive programming and managing asynchronous events in a declarative way.

### 6. **Testing:**
   - **Unit Testing**: Familiarity with **XCTest** for testing business logic.
   - **UI Testing**: **XCUITest** for automating UI tests to ensure the interface behaves as expected.
   - **Mocking**: Tools like **Cedar** or **OCMock** for mocking objects in unit tests.

### 7. **Understanding of iOS Lifecycle:**
   - **View Controller Lifecycle**: Managing the states of view controllers in the app (e.g., `viewDidLoad()`, `viewWillAppear()`).
   - **App Lifecycle**: Understanding how apps transition between foreground and background states, managing resources, and handling interruptions (e.g., phone calls).

### 8. **App Distribution:**
   - **App Store Connect**: The platform for managing app submissions, updates, and analytics.
   - **App Store Guidelines**: Familiarity with Apple's guidelines for app approval.
   - **Code Signing and Provisioning Profiles**: Essential for building and distributing apps through the App Store or for internal distribution.
   - **TestFlight**: To distribute beta versions of apps and get feedback before releasing the final version.

### 9. **Security:**
   - **Keychain Services**: For storing sensitive information securely, such as passwords or authentication tokens.
   - **Data Encryption**: Knowledge of how to encrypt sensitive data stored locally on the device.
   - **App Transport Security (ATS)**: Understanding of security protocols for ensuring secure network connections.

### 10. **Additional Skills:**
   - **Git and Version Control**: Familiarity with Git for source code management, collaborating with teams, and version control.
   - **Networking (REST APIs)**: Knowledge of how to work with APIs (e.g., JSON, REST) to connect the app to back-end services.
   - **Core Animation and 3D**: For more advanced UI effects and animations.
   - **Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD)**: Automating the build, testing, and deployment processes with tools like **Jenkins**, **CircleCI**, or **GitHub Actions**.
   
### 11. **Deployment & Maintenance:**
   - **App Store Review Process**: Understanding the submission and approval process to get your app published.
   - **App Analytics**: Using **Firebase Analytics**, **Mixpanel**, or **Apple Analytics** to track user behavior and app performance.
   - **App Updates**: How to push updates to apps and handle app versioning.

### 12. **Additional Considerations:**
   - **Push Notifications**: Implementing Apple Push Notification Service (APNs) for sending push notifications.
   - **Cloud Storage**: Using Apple‚Äôs **CloudKit** or third-party services (e.g., Firebase, AWS) for cloud storage.
   - **SwiftUI** vs. UIKit: Deciding whether to use the traditional UIKit or newer SwiftUI depending on project requirements.
   - **App Monetization**: Knowledge of monetization techniques like in-app purchases, subscriptions, or ads (e.g., using AdMob or iAd).

### 13. **Keeping Up-to-Date:**
   - **Apple Developer Program**: Access to documentation, beta software, and other resources.
   - **WWDC (Apple Worldwide Developers Conference)**: Attending (or following) the annual conference for new updates on iOS development and platform changes.

title: Mobile App Development for Nightlife Experience
description:
We are seeking a skilled developer to create NextUp, a web-based mobile application designed to enhance young adults' nightlife and event-going experiences. The ideal candidate will have experience in mobile app development, UI/UX design, and integrating social features. You will be responsible for building a user-friendly interface and ensuring seamless functionality across various devices. If you are passionate about nightlife and technology, we want to hear from you!

Project Overview:

Objective: Create a polished, user-friendly MVP that allows users to search for, discover, and RSVP to events while interacting with features such as crowdsourced playlists and real-time social engagement.

Core Features:
User Registration & Authentication: Support for email/phone sign-up and social logins (Google, Facebook, Apple).

Event Discovery: Searchable event listings with filters (e.g., event type, music played, location, time).
Event Details & Social Feed: Display event details, host profiles, and live updates (RSVPs, song requests, etc.).

Interactive Features: A crowdsourced DJ experience where users can vote on songs they'd like to hear the most and influence the playlist. During-event features like voting on snacks, which song should play next, etc.

Basic Analytics: For hosts to track event engagement.

Technical Requirements:
Ideally built using a cross-platform framework (React Native, Flutter, or similar).
Responsive design for mobile, tablet, and desktop.
Integration with third-party APIs (e.g., for social logins, possibly music streaming services).

Project Timeline:

You will be required to sign a non-disclosure and work-for-hire agreement ensuring all intellectual property rights are transferred to us.

Candidate Requirements:
Proven experience in mobile/web app development, particularly for social or event-based platforms.
Strong portfolio demonstrating end-to-end project development.
Excellent communication skills and ability to work collaboratively.
Familiarity with integrating real-time features and third-party APIs.
Experience with agile development and milestone delivery.

Further details to be provided after response.
