title: Mobile-Friendly Progressive Web App (PWA) to Replace Chrome Extension for Text Input Workflow
description:
We are seeking an experienced web developer to transform our existing Chrome extension-based app into a mobile-friendly Progressive Web App (PWA) with a bookmarklet integration. The app supports users by streamlining text documentation for a third-party web system. The current app records notes via our website, transcribes them using the Deepgram API, processes them with OpenAI GPT prompts for formatting, and imports the text into the third-party system‚Äôs web fields via a Chrome extension. We need this functionality to work on mobile devices (iPhone, Android, tablets) that don‚Äôt support Chrome extensions, while retaining all features, including automated field imports and a secondary "starter phrases" tool.

Current Workflow:

Recording & Processing: Users record notes on our website. The audio is transcribed via Deepgram API, then processed by OpenAI GPT (via multiple prompts) to sort and rewrite the text for compatibility with the target system. Processed texts are saved and organized by date for users to import.
Text Import: On the third-party web system, users click the Chrome extension icon in the browser toolbar, opening a popup with a sorted list of transcribed texts. Selecting an entry auto-fills relevant text fields, and based on the text content, it may interact with checkboxes or dropdowns (e.g., checking an option or selecting from a list).
Starter Phrases: With the extension installed, small icons appear in the system‚Äôs text boxes. Users click these to save or insert pre-defined "starter phrases" for rapid input.
Project Goals:

Build a PWA that replicates the recording, transcription, and processing workflow.
Replace the Chrome extension with a bookmarklet that works on mobile browsers (Safari, Chrome), displaying a floating overlay with sorted transcribed texts for import into the target system‚Äôs fields.
Ensure the bookmarklet can auto-fill multiple text fields, trigger checkboxes, and select dropdowns based on text content.
Adapt the "starter phrases" feature for mobile, either via the bookmarklet overlay or a similar mechanism.
Optimize for affordability, reliability, and mobile usability (iPhone, Android, tablets).
Key Features:

PWA Interface:
Mobile-friendly UI for recording audio notes (via browser mic access).
Integrate Deepgram API for transcription and OpenAI API for text processing (existing prompts provided).
Store and display processed texts, sorted by date (e.g., "March 2, 2025: 10:15 AM").
Cloud syncing (e.g., Firebase) for cross-device access.
Bookmarklet Integration:
On the third-party web system, users trigger a bookmarklet to show a floating overlay with the sorted text list.
Selecting an entry auto-fills text fields (e.g., identified by "notes") and interacts with checkboxes or dropdowns (e.g., identified by "stable").
Handle the system‚Äôs HTML structure (will provide sample pages or field IDs if needed).
Starter Phrases:
Replicate the text box icons as a mobile-friendly feature (e.g., overlay buttons or a separate bookmarklet mode).
Allow saving and inserting phrases into the system‚Äôs fields.
Compatibility:
Works on iOS (Safari) and Android (Chrome), with testing on both.
Fallback to clipboard copy/paste if the system blocks DOM manipulation.
Deliverables:

Fully functional PWA hosted on a platform like Vercel or Firebase.
Bookmarklet script with overlay UI for integration with the target system.
Documentation for setup, usage, and maintenance.
Testing report confirming functionality on iPhone and Android with the third-party system.

Skills Required:

Web Development: Strong proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript (ES6+), and modern frameworks (e.g., React, Vue, or vanilla JS).
PWA Experience: Proven experience building Progressive Web Apps with responsive design, Service Workers, and offline capabilities.
Bookmarklet/DOM Manipulation: Familiarity with writing bookmarklets or scripts to interact with third-party website DOMs (e.g., querySelector, event triggers).
API Integration: Experience with REST APIs (e.g., Deepgram, OpenAI) for audio transcription and text processing.
Mobile Browser Compatibility: Knowledge of Safari (iOS) and Chrome (Android) quirks, including Clipboard API and mic access.
Database/Storage: Basic experience with cloud storage (e.g., Firebase, Supabase) or local storage (IndexedDB).
Debugging: Ability to troubleshoot cross-browser issues and security restrictions (e.g., CSP).

title: React Native Developer Needed to Build Macronutrient Tracking with AI
description:
### **Project Overview:**

A GERD-friendly calorie tracking mobile app designed to help users manage their dietary needs while avoiding trigger foods. The app will feature food logging, GERD-safe food identification, and dietary alignment indicators, ensuring users can make informed food choices. The UI will be modern, clean, and intuitive, with a focus on wellness rather than medical themes.

**Designs for the app have been attached.**

### **What is GERD?**

Gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD) is a chronic condition where stomach acid frequently flows back into the esophagus, causing discomfort and potential damage over time. Common symptoms include heartburn, regurgitation, and difficulty swallowing. Managing GERD often involves dietary adjustments to avoid trigger foods that can worsen symptoms. This app helps users make informed food choices to support their digestive health and overall well-being.

### **Technology Stack:**

- **Framework:** React Native (for cross-platform compatibility)
- **Backend:** Supabase (for authentication, database management, and API services)
- **AI Integration:** OpenAI API (for personalized food suggestions and GERD-friendly recommendations)
- **Styling:** Tailwind Native (or an equivalent style system for consistency and responsiveness)
- **External APIs:**
    - **USDA FoodData Central API** (for accurate nutritional information)
    - **OpenFoods API** (for barcode scanning and product data retrieval)
    - **OpenAI API** (for AI-powered dietary recommendations)

### **Core Features:**

1. **User Authentication:** Sign-up, login, and profile management using Supabase authentication.
2. **Food Logging:** Users can search and log food entries, tracking calories and nutritional data.
3. **GERD-Friendly Tagging:** A distinct tagging system that highlights GERD-safe and trigger foods.
4. **Dietary Alignment Indicators:** A custom visual system showing how well foods align with GERD dietary needs.
5. **AI-Powered Insights:** Personalized meal recommendations and GERD-related dietary tips powered by OpenAI.
6. **Analytics Dashboard:** Users can view trends, caloric intake, and symptom correlations.
7. **Favorites & Meal Planning:** Save favorite foods and create meal plans based on GERD-friendly options.
8. **Settings & Customization:** Allow users to adjust dietary preferences, notification settings, and tracking goals.
9. **Offline Support:** Enable food logging and basic app functionality without an internet connection.
10. **Push Notifications:** Reminders for meal logging and GERD-specific dietary guidance.
11. **Menu & Barcode Scanning:** Users can scan restaurant menus or packaged food barcodes to quickly identify GERD-friendly options and retrieve nutritional information using USDA and OpenFoods APIs.

### *Write helicopter in the first sentence of your application.

### **Deliverables:**

- Fully functional **React Native app** adhering to the outlined features.
- **Supabase backend** setup with authentication, data storage, and API integration.
- **AI-powered features** using OpenAI API for dietary recommendations.
- Integration with **USDA FoodData Central API** and **OpenFoods API** for food-related data.
- Complete **UI styling** with Tailwind Native or equivalent.
- Source code with proper **documentation** and modular components.
- Deployment guidance and basic post-launch support.

### **Requirements:**

- **Proficiency in React Native** and related libraries.
- **Experience with backend technologies** (e.g., Node.js, Python, etc.).
- **Knowledge of database systems** (SQL/NoSQL).
- **Familiarity with version control** (Git) and CI/CD workflows.
- **Strong problem-solving skills** and attention to detail.
- **Excellent communication skills** and ability to work in a team.

### **You Should Have:**

1. **Use AI code generation daily**, ideally with Cursor IDE.
2. **Experience with complex pixel-perfect UI designs** from Figma to React Native.
3. **Participated in or launched** your own apps on the iOS and Android app stores.

title: Flutter Developer for Feed Bin Tracking App (Simple Prototype)
description:
We are a family-owned hog farm looking to develop a simple mobile app prototype using Flutter to track feed bin levels and mortalities. The app will be tested on our farm initially, with potential for future expansion. We need a skilled Flutter developer to build a functional version with a specific interface design (see details below) and a basic web dashboard. Most of our team uses iPhones, so iOS support is required. Different sites have different bin sizes, and the app must allow users to choose the appropriate bin capacity. The home screen will list sites for selection, with administrators having the ability to edit or add new sites, including the number of bins and bin sizes, which remain static unless changed by the admin.

Mobile App (Employee View):
‚Ä¢ Home Screen: A list of existing sites (e.g., custom names) for employees to select when reporting feed levels and mortalities.
‚Ä¢ Reporting Screen:
o Single screen after site selection with a simple animated conical bin shape (based on a feed bin design, adjustable for different capacities, e.g., 15-ton default per site configuration).
o 3 drag points (red dots) to adjust the feed level interactively, with a yellow shaded area indicating the feed level.
o Real-time calculation of feed tons (e.g., 1.5T) and remaining capacity (e.g., 13.5T) based on the site‚Äôs configured bin size.
o Text display: Bin Name (e.g., Bin #1), selected Capacity (e.g., 15T), and calculations (e.g., "Empty Space: 1.5T, Remaining Feed: 13.5T").
o Dropdowns for Line (e.g., Line 1) specific to the selected site.
o Date field (auto-filled) and optional Notes text box.
o Mortality Tracking: Below the bin, a dropdown menu for mortality types (e.g., chronic illness, respiratory, flu) and a text box to enter the number of mortalities (e.g., "1" for 1 pig).
o Green "Submit" button.
‚Ä¢ Support for iOS (primary) and Android (secondary).
Mobile App (Administrator View):
‚Ä¢ Home Screen: Same list of sites as employees, plus an "Admin" button or option.
‚Ä¢ Admin Screen:
o Option to edit existing sites (e.g., update Barn Name, number of bins, bin sizes like 10T, 15T, 20T).
o Option to add new sites with configurable number of bins and bin sizes.
o Changes to bin sizes and numbers remain static unless updated by the admin.
o Simple form with save functionality, syncing to Firebase.
‚Ä¢ Admin access restricted (e.g., password or role-based login).
Web Dashboard (Farm Owner View):
‚Ä¢ Basic table listing submissions (Barn Name, Line, Date, Feed Tons, Remaining Tons, Status, Mortality Details) with thumbnails of the bin graphic, reflecting the site‚Äôs configured bin size.
‚Ä¢ Clickable details to view the adjusted bin shape, notes, mortality type, number of deaths, and status.
‚Ä¢ Status toggle (Pending/Ordered).
‚Ä¢ Admin option to edit site configurations (same as mobile admin screen).
Technical Details:
‚Ä¢ Use Firebase for real-time data syncing between mobile and web.
‚Ä¢ Target iOS primarily (delivered as .ipa file), with Android (.apk) as a secondary option.
‚Ä¢ Simple, functional design based on the attached reference image (conical bin with 3 drag points).
‚Ä¢ Implement a site setup feature to assign different bin sizes (e.g., 10T, 15T, 20T) and number of bins per site, editable only by admins.
‚Ä¢ Store site configurations, bin data, and mortality data in Firebase.
Deliverables:
‚Ä¢ Working mobile app (iOS .ipa and Android .apk) with employee and admin modes.
‚Ä¢ Web dashboard.
‚Ä¢ Source code with comments.
‚Ä¢ Basic testing and bug fixes on iOS.
Timeline
‚Ä¢ Estimated 70-100 hours over 3-4 weeks.
‚Ä¢ Milestones:
o 25% upfront upon contract signing.
o 50% after mobile app completion (iOS focus).
o 25% after web dashboard and final testing.
Budget
‚Ä¢ $3,500 - $5,000 total, negotiable based on experience and timeline.
‚Ä¢ Prefer fixed-price, but open to hourly (max $50/hour).
How to Apply
‚Ä¢ Submit a proposal with:
o Brief overview of your Flutter experience.
o Link to portfolio (e.g., GitHub, app demos).
o Estimated timeline and cost within the budget.
o Any questions or suggestions for the project.
‚Ä¢ Attach or reference the provided image for design inspiration.
Notes
‚Ä¢ This is a prototype for internal testing. Future phases may include additional features (e.g., feed mill integration, Spanish language support).
‚Ä¢ Ownership and Confidentiality: The client will own all intellectual property rights to the deliverables upon full payment. The freelancer agrees to transfer all rights and keep project details confidential, with no reuse or disclosure without prior written consent. A formal contract with these terms will be required before starting.

title: Develop a Mobile App for an Express and Logistic Company
description:
UR EXPRESS Mobile App ‚Äì Full Project Description
1. Overview:
App Name: UR EXPRESS
Tagline: Your Online Shopping Assistant
Purpose:
UR EXPRESS is an innovative ‚Äúbuy for me‚Äù service designed to enable individuals, small businesses, and large corporations in Kurdistan and Iraq to shop online with cash. The app simplifies online shopping, tracking, and delivery by acting as an intermediary that allows users to purchase products from global online stores and have them delivered to their locations. The app streamlines the user experience for both individual consumers and business owners who need access to international products not available locally.
Target Audience:
Individuals: Consumers who wish to buy products from international stores.
Small Businesses: Resellers purchasing inventory from international e-commerce platforms.
Large Companies: Organizations procuring bulk items like stationery or industrial supplies from global markets.
Supported Platforms: iOS, Android, and web-based admin panel.
Languages Supported:
Kurdish (RTL support)
Arabic (RTL support)
English
Founded: 2019 by Source Tech

2. Mobile App Features for End-Users:
2.1 Home Screen:
The home screen is the central hub of the UR EXPRESS app, where users can access essential features and quickly navigate through the app.
Personalized Welcome Message:
Upon logging in, users are greeted with a personalized welcome message that includes their name and account details for a more customized experience.
Balance Display:
A prominent section shows the user‚Äôs account balance, which is the remaining funds in their wallet that can be used for orders.
Zone Selection:
Users can select their preferred shipping zone (USA, UAE, Turkey, UK, Europe, Global) via a dropdown menu, customizing their shopping experience by selecting the region they want to shop from.
Account Summary:
This section provides a quick snapshot of the user's activity:
Purchased Orders: Total number of orders made by the user.
Arrived Orders: Number of items that have reached the warehouse in the selected shipping zone.
Delivered Orders: Number of items delivered to the user‚Äôs address.
Total Orders: Total number of orders processed by the user.
Promotional Banner:
Dynamic promotional banners will be displayed here, showcasing offers, discounts, new arrivals, or upcoming sales events.

2.2 Orders Screen:
The orders screen allows users to view and manage their past and present purchases.
Order List:
Displays a comprehensive list of the user‚Äôs orders, showing essential details such as:
Order ID
Product Name
Order Status (e.g., Pending, Shipped, Delivered)
Shipping Zone (where the order was shipped from)
Search & Filter:
The user can filter orders by criteria such as:
Date Range
Zone of purchase
Order Status (e.g., completed, pending, shipped)
Users can also search for orders by their Order ID or Product Name.
Order Details:
Clicking on any order will show detailed information, such as:
Product Name, Description, Quantity, and Zone
Payment Status (whether it‚Äôs paid, pending, or processed)
Real-time tracking links (integrating third-party services such as FedEx, DHL, USPS)

2.3 New Order Screen:
This screen allows users to create a new order by providing relevant product information.
Order Form:
Product URL: A text input where users can paste the URL of the product they wish to buy.
Quantity: Option to specify the number of units required.
Zone Selection: Dropdown to choose the shipping region.
City: Input for the delivery city.
Additional Specifications: Optional field to specify any additional requirements (e.g., color, size).
Create Order Button:
Once the user completes the form, they can click the ‚ÄúCreate Order‚Äù button, which will validate and process the order for further steps.

2.4 Checkout Screen:
The checkout screen facilitates finalizing the order and making payments.
Order Summary:
This section shows:
Product details (name, quantity, price)
Shipping address
Order total with breakdowns (taxes, discounts)
Payment Options:
Various payment methods are available:
Wallet Balance: The option to pay with the user's existing account balance.
PayPal
Stripe
Local Payment Gateways (to accommodate local payment methods used in Kurdistan and Iraq)

2.5 Support Screen:
To provide ongoing support and assistance to users, this screen features several support options.
In-App Chat:
Real-time direct messaging with the UR EXPRESS customer support team for troubleshooting, inquiries, or general assistance.
Ticket Submission:
Users can submit a support ticket if they face an issue, providing detailed information about the problem. They can also attach files or images (e.g., screenshots) to help resolve the issue.
FAQs:
A list of frequently asked questions and common answers will be available to help users quickly find solutions to common issues or queries.

2.6 Membership Plans Screen:
The Membership Plans section offers users the option to subscribe to exclusive benefits.
Personal Account (Free Account):
Users can place orders and combine shipments to reduce shipping costs.
Users will receive notifications (via app and SMS) when orders arrive at the warehouse.
Paid Account (Membership):
Users enjoy discounted shipping rates.
Faster processing times for orders.
Exclusive offers, promotions, and deals available only for paid members.

3. Additional Features & Requirements:
Multi-Language Support:
The app will support multiple languages (Kurdish, Arabic, and English) with full RTL (right-to-left) text support for Arabic.
Push Notifications:
Users will receive notifications for:
Order updates (e.g., shipped, delivered)
Special offers and promotions
Account balance alerts
Account & Settings:
Users can access their profile, update personal information, change their password, and review previous transactions.
The Settings screen will include options to manage account preferences, payment methods, shipping zones, and membership plans.
Transaction History & Balance Management:
Users can view their transaction history, including past payments and wallet top-ups. They will also be able to add funds to their wallet.

4. Admin Panel Features:
The UR EXPRESS Admin Panel will be used by the app administrators to manage the entire platform, including user accounts, orders, product tracking, and payment processing.
User Management:
Admins can view, edit, and delete user accounts, track activity, and manage subscriptions to the service.
Order Management:
Admins can view, update, and track user orders, including payment statuses and shipment tracking.
Promotions & Offers:
Admins can create, edit, and delete promotional banners or offers that appear on the app‚Äôs homepage.
Product Tracking & Integration:
Admins can integrate with shipping platforms like FedEx, USPS, and DHL to manage real-time tracking of orders and shipments.
Payment Management:
Admins can oversee all transactions, track wallet balances, and manage payment gateways (PayPal, Stripe, local methods).

5. Technical Specifications:
Backend Architecture:
Cloud-based solution with scalable architecture to support thousands of users and real-time order processing.
Security:
SSL encryption for secure transactions and data protection. Two-factor authentication (2FA) for user account security.
Real-Time Integration:
Real-time order tracking integration with major logistics partners (FedEx, DHL, USPS).

**Key Features**:

- Login/Signup

- Analytics on popular days/times

- Open/close bills by table

- News feed for announcements

**Staff Management**:

- Staff scheduling, shift management, and clock-in/out
- Hourly rate, payroll, and tips
- Leave management and shift sharing
- Onboarding/training manual
- Staff directory

**Kitchen Display**:

- Multiple kitchen displays (Android/iOS/Windows)
- Displays real-time order status and ready status on POS

**Accounting & Integration**:

- QuickBooks integration for accounting
- Inventory management

**QR Code Ordering**:

- QR code ordering at tables and on bills (for payments)

**POS System**:

- Android/iOS-based POS with offline cash mode
- Customer points and signature display on second screen
- Printer, cash register, and kitchen display integration
- Loyalty, marketing, and digital signage system connections
- API connection with user database

title: Looking for a Flutter Developer to Build a Fitness App with Calorie Counter
description:
We're looking for a skilled Flutter developer to join our team and help us build a fitness app that will help users stay on track with their health and fitness goals. The core feature of the app will be a calorie counter, but we also want to include features like workout tracking, meal logging, and progress monitoring to give users a comprehensive fitness experience.

If you‚Äôre passionate about both fitness and app development and have experience with Flutter, we‚Äôd love to work with you! You‚Äôll be helping us create an app that‚Äôs user-friendly, reliable, and provides real-time insights, available on both iOS and Android.

What You‚Äôll Be Doing:

Developing a cross-platform fitness app with Flutter that works seamlessly on both iOS and Android.
Integrating a calorie counter to allow users to track their food intake and calories burned.
Building workout tracking features like exercise logs, daily activity tracking, and progress reports.
Designing a simple, clean, and engaging user interface to create the best user experience.
Ensuring the app is secure, bug-free, and works smoothly across all devices.
Collaborating closely with our team to hit project goals and deadlines.
What We‚Äôre Looking For:

Solid experience in Flutter development for both iOS and Android.
A good understanding of fitness tracking features, especially calorie counting, workout logs, and nutrition data.
Familiarity with third-party APIs for nutrition data and calorie tracking.
The ability to implement real-time data updates and create user-friendly interfaces.
Experience with Firebase or other backend services for secure data storage and user management.
A sharp eye for detail and a good grasp of best practices in mobile app development.
Bonus Points If You Have:

Experience working on other fitness or health-related apps.
Familiarity with wearable devices (like Fitbit, Apple Watch, etc.) for syncing fitness data.
Experience with cloud services (like AWS or Firebase) for secure storage and real-time updates.
Knowledge of adding gamification features (such as challenges and badges) to engage users.

title: Flutter Developer Needed for App Development
description:
Title: Mobile App Development for Admin, Dealer, and Retailer Management

Description:
We are looking for a skilled mobile app developer to build two interconnected apps for our business. The apps will have three main user roles: Admin, Dealer, and Retailer. The goal is to streamline order management, product tracking, advertisements, and user engagement.

App 1: Admin Panel

This app will be used by admins to manage products, dealers, and retailers.

Key Features:

1. Login Functionality ‚Äì Secure admin login.


2. Product Management (CRUD) ‚Äì Add, edit, update, and delete products.


3. Dealer Management ‚Äì Add and update dealer details.


4. Retailer Management ‚Äì View and block retailers.


5. Order Approval:

Dealers place bulk orders.

Admins receive notifications for new orders.

Admin reviews and approves orders.

The approving admin‚Äôs name should be visible in the order details.

Order details should include product names and quantities.

Admin updates the approval date.



6. Order Tracking:

Once approved, dealers get notified.

Dealers make payments, and admins receive payment notifications.

After payment, the admin dispatches the order.



7. Homepage:

Scrolling ads at the top.

Product listings below.

Clicking on a product shows full details.



8. Advertisement Management:

Admin can add new advertisements.

Admin approves ads submitted by dealers.

Ads should be displayed based on location.



9. Product Sales Graph: View the sales performance of all products.


10. Dealer Sales Graph: View and track sales for all dealers. Clicking a dealer shows their product sales graph.


11. Retailer Sales Graph: View and track sales for all retailers. Clicking a retailer shows their product sales graph.




---

App 2: Dealer & Retailer App

This app will have three user roles: Users, Dealers, and Retailers.

1. User Role:

Homepage with scrolling ads and product listings.

Clicking a product shows full details.

Users enter only their mobile number and city to access the app.

View nearby retailers.


2. Dealer Role:

1. Login Functionality


2. Homepage


3. Add New Order: Dealers can place bulk orders.


4. Track My Orders: Dealers can track their placed orders.


5. Retailer Management: Dealers can add new retailers.


6. Retailer Orders: Dealers can add and manage retailer orders.


7. Product Sales Graph: View sales data of products.


8. Retailer Sales Graph: View all retailer sales data. Clicking a retailer shows their product-wise sales graph.


9. Advertisement Management:

Dealers can submit scrolling ads for admin approval.

Ads are displayed based on the selected city.

If no dealer ads are available, admin ads are shown by default.



10. My Profile: Dealers can view and update their profile.



3. Retailer Role:

1. Login Functionality


2. Homepage


3. Product Sales Graph: View product-wise sales data.


4. My Profile: View and update profile.




---

Project Requirements:

Cross-platform development (Android & iOS preferred).

Clean and user-friendly UI/UX.

Secure authentication system.

Notifications for order approvals, payments, and dispatch.

Location-based advertisement display.

Graphical representation of sales data.


If you have experience in developing similar applications, please share your portfolio and estimated timeline.
skills: ['Smartphone', 'Android App Development', 'Android', 'iOS', 'Mobile App Development', 'Kotlin', 'User Authentication', 'Java', 'Flutter', 'App Development']

title: Mobile Automation Engineer (Appium & ADB) ‚Äì Automated Device Management System
description:
We are seeking an experienced Mobile Automation Engineer with strong expertise in Appium and ADB to develop an automated device management system. In this project, you will create a solution to execute Java-based test scripts across multiple Android devices simultaneously, manage device connectivity/status, and log execution results to a database. This is a short-term contract (approximately 1‚Äì2 weeks) with a fixed-price budget, focusing on building a robust, high-performance automation framework for Android devices.

Key Responsibilities

Automate Device Interaction: Use Appium (for UI automation) and ADB (Android Debug Bridge) to automate interactions on Android devices (launch apps, perform UI actions, handle system events, etc.).
Multi-Device Management: Handle multiple Android devices in parallel ‚Äì manage device connections (USB/Wi-Fi), track each device‚Äôs status (connected, in-use, idle), and ensure reliable communication with all devices.
ADB Shell Command Execution: Write and run ADB shell commands on devices for various tasks (installing/uninstalling apps, clearing app data, retrieving logs, rebooting devices, etc.) as part of the automation scripts.
Results Logging: Implement logging of test execution results and device data into a SQL database (PostgreSQL or MySQL). This includes recording test outcomes, errors, device info, timestamps, and any relevant metrics for reporting and analysis.
Performance Optimization: Optimize the automation framework to handle multiple parallel test executions. Ensure efficient use of resources so that increasing the number of connected devices has minimal impact on execution time or stability.
Required Skills & Experience

Appium & ADB Expertise: Proven experience with mobile test automation on Android using Appium and ADB. You should be comfortable setting up Appium for multiple devices and using ADB commands for device control.
Java & TestNG Proficiency: Strong skills in Java programming, with hands-on experience using TestNG (or a similar test framework) to design and execute test suites. Ability to write clean, maintainable, and well-structured test code is a must.
Multi-Device Concurrency: Deep understanding of handling concurrent sessions on multiple devices. Experience with running tests in parallel (e.g., using multiple Appium server instances or threading) and managing device UDIDs for targeting specific devices.
ADB Command-Line Knowledge: Familiarity with common ADB command-line operations and scripts. For example, you should know how to use commands like adb shell, adb devices, adb install, etc., within automation scripts to perform device actions beyond the UI automation.
Database Logging: Experience integrating test automation with databases. Ability to connect to PostgreSQL/MySQL from Java, and insert or update records (such as test results or logs) programmatically. Knowledge of JDBC or ORM tools for Java is a plus.
Problem-Solving & Optimization: Strong debugging skills to troubleshoot issues on different Android devices (OS versions, OEM variations). Ability to optimize performance and memory usage of the test runs, ensuring the solution scales with multiple devices.
Project Details

Timeline: The project is expected to be completed within 1‚Äì2 weeks from the start date. This includes development, testing on multiple devices, and delivering a fully functional solution.
Fixed-Price Contract: This job is a fixed-price project. Payment will be tied to successful delivery of the device management automation system as per the requirements. (You can specify the budget or range here if desired.)
Deliverables: A working automated device management system capable of the above responsibilities, along with documentation (setup instructions, usage guide) and basic test results to demonstrate functionality.
Collaboration: You will be working independently but will have access to our team for questions, clarifications, and any necessary resources. Communication will be via [email/Slack/your tool of choice] and we expect regular updates on progress.
How to Apply

If you are interested in this project and meet the requirements, please apply with the following:

Relevant Experience: Briefly describe your past experience with Appium, ADB, and Android automation. Highlight projects where you handled multiple devices, used TestNG (or similar frameworks), or logged results to a database.
Timeline Confirmation: Confirm that you are available to start immediately and can dedicate enough time to complete this project within 1‚Äì2 weeks. Mention how you plan to approach the timeline to ensure on-time delivery.
Fixed-Price Bid: Provide your fixed-price quote for the entire project. The bid should account for all aspects of development and delivery. (Optionally, you can break down the cost by major milestones if relevant.)
Please also feel free to share any relevant code samples or project links that demonstrate your expertise in mobile automation or similar projects (if available). We are looking for a candidate who is proactive, detail-oriented, and can deliver a reliable solution within a short timeframe.

title: Full Stack Developer for On-Demand Delivery Mobile App
description:
We are seeking an experienced Full Stack Developer to create a robust on-demand delivery mobile application. The ideal candidate will be responsible for both front-end and back-end development, ensuring a seamless user experience. You will work closely with our product team to implement features, optimize performance, and troubleshoot any issues that arise. If you have a strong portfolio showcasing your mobile app development skills, we want to hear from you!

**Job Description:**

We are seeking a talented and experienced **Full Stack Developer** to build an on-demand delivery mobile app that seamlessly integrates with third-party route planners and delivery management systems such as **Detrack** and **Shipday**. The ideal candidate will have experience developing mobile applications from the ground up and be proficient in backend, frontend, and third-party API integration.

### **Key Responsibilities:**
- Design, develop, and deploy a mobile app for on-demand delivery services.
- Implement and integrate third-party services like **Detrack** and **Shipday** to optimize delivery routing and management.
- Build a clean, intuitive, and user-friendly interface for drivers and customers.
- Develop and maintain the backend system to handle user data, orders, and delivery workflows.
- Ensure the app is scalable, secure, and can handle high traffic efficiently.
- Collaborate with product managers and other stakeholders to refine features and improve the app.
- Write clean, well-documented code and conduct code reviews.
- Troubleshoot, debug, and optimize the application for performance and user experience.

### **Required Skills & Qualifications:**
- Proven experience as a Full Stack Developer with a strong portfolio of mobile app development.
- Strong knowledge of mobile development platforms (iOS and Android) using **React Native**, **Flutter**, or native technologies.
- Proficiency in backend technologies such as **Node.js**, **Express**, **Ruby on Rails**, or similar.
- Experience integrating third-party APIs, especially delivery management and route planning systems like **Detrack** and **Shipday**.
- Familiarity with cloud services (AWS, Google Cloud, or similar) for app hosting and scalability.
- Strong understanding of databases (SQL/NoSQL) and server management.
- Excellent problem-solving skills, attention to detail, and a passion for delivering high-quality software.
- Strong communication skills and the ability to work in an agile team environment.

### **Preferred Skills:**
- Experience in building and managing on-demand service platforms.
- Knowledge of geolocation and real-time tracking technologies.
- Understanding of delivery workflows and logistics operations.

### **How to Apply:**
If you have the expertise to build a robust and scalable delivery mobile app, please submit your proposal with the following:
- A brief summary of your experience relevant to this project.
- Examples of previous mobile apps you've developed, especially any delivery-related apps.
- Your approach to integrating third-party systems like Detrack or Shipday.
- Estimated timeline and project cost.

We look forward to hearing from developers who are passionate about creating innovative and efficient solutions in the on-demand delivery space.

This is an exciting opportunity to be part of a growing industry with a chance to have a significant impact. Apply now!

title: AI-Powered Systems & Automation Specialist
description:
AI-Powered Systems & Automation Specialist

Upwork: https://forms.clickup.com/9017085020/f/8cqbk2w-43597/80W8XJW4Y2D5ZPQ65F

About Us

We are a dynamic startup and boutique venture capital firm operating at the intersection of technology, media, and creative industries. Our mission is to drive value creation through strategic investments and innovative content production. Reporting directly to the CEO and Managing Partner, this role collaborates closely with our team to advance Trolley AI‚Äôs operations and growth initiatives.

Our Focus Areas:
‚Ä¢ Venture Capital: Actively investing in startups, partnering with founders to foster innovation and growth.
‚Ä¢ Media Production: Producing media content and podcasts to amplify our reach and impact.
‚Ä¢ Content Publishing: Sharing insights on platforms like Substack and across social media to engage with a broad audience.

Our Philosophy

We believe that our network, platform, and media endeavors are instrumental in generating leads and building platforms for our fund and the founders we support. Our approach is rooted in the synergy between value creation, commerce, and the creative sectors, driving our projects forward with purpose and innovation.

Our Culture

As a fast-moving, inclusive startup, we value collaboration and a strong team culture. Our diverse team, primarily in their 30s and 40s, thrives in an environment that embodies respect, teamwork, and open communication. An understanding of American business culture is essential as we navigate the dynamic landscape of venture capital, media, AI, and content creation. We seek individuals passionate about the convergence of these fields and eager to contribute to our mission of driving innovation and value across industries.

Position Overview

We are seeking a systems-first, AI-driven operator who can architect workflows, automate processes, and scale our internal infrastructure to minimize manual effort while protecting our intellectual property. This high-leverage position will:
‚Ä¢ Eliminate inefficiencies and repetitive tasks by implementing AI and automation-first workflows.
‚Ä¢ Ensure our tech stack (ClickUp, Zapier, Front, Slack, HubSpot, Google Suite) functions as an integrated system.
‚Ä¢ Design, document, and scale Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) to standardize and streamline processes.
‚Ä¢ Streamline onboarding, offboarding, and internal training to foster a self-sufficient team.
‚Ä¢ Automate financial operations, including QuickBooks, invoice tracking, and financial workflows.
‚Ä¢ Secure company intellectual property by ensuring airtight permissions and access control.
‚Ä¢ Lead project management and communications to ensure operational alignment across teams.
‚Ä¢ Own the onboarding of new hires into our systems, ensuring rapid and efficient integration.
‚Ä¢ Build and scale AI-powered sales automation through the Sales Development Automation Representative (SDAR) framework.

Responsibilities

AI-Powered Operations & System Optimization
‚Ä¢ Design a fully integrated, AI-powered workflow using ClickUp, Slack, Zapier, Front, and HubSpot.
‚Ä¢ Implement AI agents (e.g., ChatGPT, Claude AI, Loom AI) for internal operations, email automation, and reporting.
‚Ä¢ Establish automation layers to seamlessly connect CRM, project management, and communications.
‚Ä¢ Develop a scalable AI-enhanced knowledge base to ensure team access to essential information.

Sales Development Automation Representative (SDAR) ‚Äì AI-Driven Sales & Outreach
‚Ä¢ Architect and automate outbound sales workflows to enhance efficiency in outreach, follow-ups, and deal tracking.
‚Ä¢ Explore AI-powered sales tools, including:
‚Ä¢ Howie.ai ‚Äì AI-driven prospecting and outreach.
‚Ä¢ V0.dev ‚Äì AI-powered code generation and workflow automation.
‚Ä¢ Bolt.new ‚Äì AI-first automation infrastructure.
‚Ä¢ Cursor.com ‚Äì AI-assisted development and knowledge management.
‚Ä¢ Pilot.com ‚Äì Automated financial operations for startups.
‚Ä¢ Automate prospecting and lead generation through AI-enhanced CRM workflows.
‚Ä¢ Streamline sales funnel automation with AI-assisted email personalization, meeting scheduling, and follow-up sequences.
‚Ä¢ Utilize AI to score leads and prioritize outreach for optimal conversion potential.
‚Ä¢ Refine and document best practices for AI-assisted sales to ensure a repeatable and scalable process.

Automate & Streamline Onboarding, Offboarding, and Training
‚Ä¢ Create AI-powered training modules using Loom AI and ChatGPT.
‚Ä¢ Automate employee onboarding and access provisioning across 1Password, Google Suite, and Slack.
‚Ä¢ Streamline offboarding workflows to ensure security and compliance.
‚Ä¢ Develop SOPs for all internal functions to minimize HR dependency.
‚Ä¢ Ensure efficient onboarding of new hires into systems, workflows, and automation tools.

Project Management & Team Communication
‚Ä¢ Oversee project management in ClickUp, ensuring teams have clear workflows, tasks, and priorities.
‚Ä¢ Lead cross-functional alignment to support finance, sales, and growth operations.
‚Ä¢ Standardize communication workflows in Slack and Front to maintain transparency.
‚Ä¢ Ensure team members understand and fully adopt AI-powered workflows.

ClickUp & Slack Workflow Engineering
‚Ä¢ Architect and automate ClickUp dashboards, task dependencies, and reporting.
‚Ä¢ Set up automated Slack workflows, including status updates, approvals, and team-wide alerts.
‚Ä¢ Utilize Zapier and Make (Integromat) to connect all operational tools.
‚Ä¢ Automate project and deal flow tracking for the venture capital fund.

No Agencies *

title: Seeking AI/ML Engineer with Expertise in Bayesian Deep Learning & Quantum Machine Learning
description:
We are looking for an experienced AI/ML engineer with a deep understanding of Bayesian deep learning and quantum machine learning to develop next-generation predictive models. The ideal candidate should have a strong foundation in probabilistic modeling, variational inference, and experience leveraging quantum computing frameworks such as PennyLane or Qiskit for ML applications.

This role involves designing and implementing uncertainty-aware AI models, optimizing hybrid quantum-classical algorithms, and integrating them into real-world applications. Strong proficiency in Python, PyTorch/TensorFlow, and experience with non-standard architectures (e.g., Capsule Networks, Spiking Neural Networks) is a plus.

title: LegalTech Data Platform - Scraping, Structuring, RAG & AI Integration
description:
Project Description:
We are developing a specialized LegalTech platform designed to process large volumes of legal data (court judgments, laws, regulations, contracts) and integrate with advanced AI language models for generating legal documents and insights.

Scope of Work:

The selected developer will be responsible for building a full backend pipeline, including:
‚Ä¢ Scraping legal content from public websites (official legal/government sites).
‚Ä¢ Cleaning and preprocessing raw legal texts (Arabic & English).
‚Ä¢ Structuring unstructured content into a well-designed database schema (suitable for retrieval and AI integration).
‚Ä¢ Implementing a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) pipeline, combining:
‚Ä¢ Structured legal content.
‚Ä¢ Relevant case law and precedents.
‚Ä¢ Real-time input from the user.
‚Ä¢ Deploying a vector search engine (Pinecone, Qdrant, or Elasticsearch with vector support) to enable semantic search.
‚Ä¢ Integrating with Claude, GPT, or similar models to generate high-quality legal documents (memos, pleadings, contracts).
‚Ä¢ Building a simple user interface for inputting case details, uploading files, and reviewing AI-generated content.

‚∏ª

Required Skills:
‚Ä¢ Web Scraping (Python ‚Äì BeautifulSoup, Scrapy, or similar).
‚Ä¢ Data Cleaning & Preprocessing (Arabic & English texts).
‚Ä¢ Database Design (relational and document-based ‚Äì PostgreSQL, MongoDB).
‚Ä¢ Backend Development (FastAPI preferred).
‚Ä¢ RAG Implementation (connecting retrieval with generation ‚Äì solid understanding required).
‚Ä¢ Vector Search Engines (Pinecone, Qdrant, Elasticsearch).
‚Ä¢ AI Model Integration (Anthropic Claude, OpenAI GPT, or similar).
‚Ä¢ Basic Frontend Development (React, Vue, or similar).
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with OCR tools (Tesseract or similar) is a plus.

‚∏ª

Deliverables:
‚Ä¢ Fully functional backend pipeline that:
‚Ä¢ Scrapes and ingests legal data.
‚Ä¢ Cleans, structures, and stores data into an efficient database.
‚Ä¢ Implements a complete RAG pipeline.
‚Ä¢ Integrates with external AI models to generate legal outputs.
‚Ä¢ Clear and documented database schema optimized for legal data.
‚Ä¢ Simple web-based UI for testing and reviewing AI outputs.
‚Ä¢ Well-documented code ready for future expansion.

‚∏ª

Timeline:
‚Ä¢ 2 to 4 weeks preferred.

‚∏ª

Experience Level:
‚Ä¢ Mid to Senior Developer.
‚Ä¢ Experience with legal data processing is highly preferred but not mandatory if strong in the technical stack.

title: Product Engineer for AI-Driven Payroll & Analytics Platform
description:
Williams Stanley ‚Äì an accounting firm specializing in hospitality and restaurant clients ‚Äì is building a cutting-edge AI-driven analytics platform, alongside a cutting edge Payroll solution to transform how hospitality businesses manage their businesses and thier payroll. We‚Äôre looking for a Product Engineer who combines technical engineering expertise with product strategy savvy. In this role, you will drive the platform‚Äôs development end-to-end: from defining the product vision to rolling up your sleeves with the engineering team to build innovative features. If you‚Äôre excited about shaping a product that leverages AI to deliver real impact for customers, this role offers the perfect blend of product management and hands-on engineering in a remote-friendly, growth-oriented environment.

Key Role Highlights

‚Ä¢ Mid-Level with Growth: A mid-level position with significant ownership and opportunities for leadership as our team and platform grow.

‚Ä¢ Remote-Friendly: Work from anywhere. We foster a flexible and collaborative remote work culture.

‚Ä¢ Platform Engineering Focus: Be at the core of developing a scalable SaaS analytics platform, ensuring it‚Äôs robust and customer-centric in solving real hospitality payroll challenges.

‚Ä¢ Blend of Product & Tech: Balance product strategy with hands-on engineering. You‚Äôll influence what we build (the roadmap and features) and how we build it (technical design and implementation).

‚Ä¢ Innovative Impact: Shape a first-of-its-kind AI solution in reporting & payroll fintech, driving innovation in an industry ready for tech disruption. Your work will directly help restaurant and hotel clients save time, reduce errors, and gain valuable insights.
Responsibilities

‚Ä¢ Product Strategy & Roadmap: Define and execute the product strategy for the payroll & the analytics platform. Work closely with engineering, design, and business stakeholders to prioritize features and align the roadmap with customer needs and company goals.

‚Ä¢ Customer Requirements: Engage with hospitality clients and internal stakeholders to understand user pain points. Translate customer needs into clear technical requirements and user stories that guide our development efforts.

‚Ä¢ Hands-on Development: Collaborate with the engineering team to design, develop, test, and refine AI-driven payroll & analytics features. Expect to get involved in coding/prototyping as well as code reviews to ensure high-quality delivery.

‚Ä¢ Integration & Workflow: Ensure seamless integration of our platform with existing payroll systems and hospitality industry workflows (e.g. POS systems, scheduling software). Design solutions that fit into the day-to-day operations of restaurants and hotels without hassle.

‚Ä¢ Performance & Security: Continuously optimize the platform‚Äôs performance, scalability, and security.  Monitor analytics and work with the team to quickly squash bugs, improve response times, and uphold data security best practices for sensitive payroll information.

‚Ä¢ User Feedback & Iteration: Gather feedback through user testing, beta programs, and client interactions. Analyze usage data and feedback to iterate on improvements, enhancing user experience and value with each release.

title: AI Vendor Assessments
description:
Background:
The use of AI related services is growing rapidly across the company.  We have a need to vet prospective AI providers to assure that they are safe to be used for corporate purposes and that we understand how our data is handled within their systems.  We also need to understand ownership of assets created by our company while using the AI providers systems.

Project Request:  
1) Create a template that summarizes an AI vendor and their suitability for use for corporate purposes.
2) Research this list of vendors and complete the template for each vendor.
a. Runwayml - https://runwayml.com/
b. Viggle - https://viggle.ai/m-home
c. Adcreative - https://Adcreative.ai

3) Additional vendors after the first three are completed under a separate project.
a. Runway ML (Gen-2)
b. Pika Labs
c. Kaiber AI
d. Stable Diffusion (LoRAs)
e. Stable Diffusion (ControlNet)
f. Adobe Firefly

Create a template that summarizes the following.  This template should be considered a draft.  We welcome your thoughts on it‚Äôs format and content.
1. Vendor information
Vendor certifications
ISO 27001 (Information Security Management)
SOC 2 Type II (Security, Availability, Confidentiality, Processing Integrity, and Privacy)
GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation ‚Äì EU)
CCPA (California Consumer Privacy Act
Does the vendor store customer data? (Y/N)
If yes, where is the data stored? (U.S., EU, other?)
2. Applicable terms and conditions and licensing requirements
3. How our data and interactions are managed regarding data security and privacy
4. License types required to ensure corporate data is secure, not shared and not used for training purposes
5. Vendor‚Äôs policy on using customer data for AI model training
6. Can customer data be deleted upon request?
7. Summary of intellectual property rights for products created or modified by the AI service.

description:

Hello! We‚Äôre developing Hello Drew, an AI-powered voice assistant for real estate. We need an expert in AI speech synthesis to make our AI voices indistinguishable from a real human.  

Our current voices lack realism, and we want the most natural, emotionally expressive, and fluid AI voice available. If you're passionate about AI voice technology, prosody modeling, and neural TTS, we want to hear from you.

title: Build Ai based Web SaaS
description:
I‚Äôm looking for a developer to create a simple web/mobile application inspired by platforms like Quizlet, Vaia, and other popular study apps.

The main goal is to help users (primarily students) create and study flashcards, summaries, and quizzes, with the option to generate them automatically from uploaded PDFs, images, or text.

Below is an overview of the functionality I‚Äôd like implemented:
1. User Registration and Profiles
Sign Up / Log In: Standard email/password or social logins.
Profile Settings: Basic information, notification preferences, and language settings.

2. Flashcard Creation & Management
Manual Creation: Users can manually add flashcards (front/back or question/answer) with formatting (bold, italics, etc.).
Automated Generation: Users can upload a file or paste text, and the app should parse it to identify key concepts. Automatically create flashcards from that content (similar to mindgrasp.ai or Vaia).

3. Flashcard Library
Organized Sets: Users can group flashcards into themed sets or subjects (like Quizlet).
Search & Filter: By title, subject, difficulty, or date created.
Share Options (optional, if time permits): Let users share sets with friends or make them public.

4. Study & Quiz Features
Flip-Based Study: Show front side first, then reveal the answer on the back (like traditional flashcards).
Difficulty/Confidence Rating: After viewing an answer, user labels how easy or hard it was. This data can feed a spaced repetition algorithm so that harder cards appear more frequently.
Progress Tracking: Display how many cards are left, correct/incorrect counts, or a progress bar.
Multiple Question Types (optional): If possible, beyond just ‚Äúflip cards,‚Äù we might introduce multiple-choice, fill-in-the-blank, etc.

5. AI/Spaced Repetition Integration
Adaptive Scheduling: Cards rated ‚Äúhard‚Äù appear more often than easier ones (similar to Anki).
Summaries & Key Concepts: If possible, incorporate an AI summarizer that condenses large pieces of text into bullet points or potential Q&A pairs.

6. User Experience & Interface
Clean, Intuitive UI: Reference Quizlet‚Äôs minimal approach.
Visual Cues: Simple icons for flipping cards, rating difficulty, or uploading documents (similar to Vaia‚Äôs design style).
Responsive Design: Should work smoothly on desktop and mobile devices.


7. Additional Features (Nice to Have)
Achievements/Analytics: Show stats like how many cards studied, average success rate, or daily streaks to motivate learning.


I‚Äôm open to suggestions and ideas of the best approach to building this app.

Please let me know your estimated cost based on these features, and if we can prioritize or phase some features to fit my budget.

title: Expert to Revise ML & AI Research Paper by Incorporating Existing Research Metrics
description:
We are seeking an experienced Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence researcher with a strong background in deep learning and computer vision (particularly YOLO models) to improve our existing research paper based on detailed reviewers' comments. The paper introduces a UAV-based dataset (URMED2024) designed for road damage detection using YOLOv5. The reviewers have indicated issues related to scientific novelty, clarity, literature review, and validation of results.

Important Note:
We do not require new experimental validation. Instead, your primary task will be to enhance the paper by strategically incorporating accuracy metrics, mAP scores, F1-scores, and comparative insights from existing, reputable research studies. Your goal is to contextualize our findings clearly, highlighting competitive performance by carefully leveraging and interpreting existing literature.

Key Responsibilities:

Literature Integration and Benchmarking:

Identify suitable, recent, peer-reviewed papers providing performance metrics (mAP, F1-score, precision, recall, accuracy, etc.) from relevant research in UAV-based road damage detection.
Strategically integrate or adapt these performance metrics into our paper to clearly position our dataset and method within current research benchmarks.
Technical Writing and Revision:

Revise the abstract, introduction, methodology, results, and conclusions to clearly reflect stronger competitive positioning using comparative performance data from existing studies.
Enhance the literature review section to cover recent advancements, emphasizing the strengths and potential of our dataset in relation to current state-of-the-art datasets and methodologies.
Addressing Reviewer Comments:

Clearly and professionally address reviewers‚Äô comments related to novelty, theoretical foundations, and methodological rigor through improved writing, careful citation, and effective data interpretation.
Skills & Expertise Required:

Expertise in Deep Learning, Computer Vision (especially YOLO-based models)

title: Full-Stack AI Engineer for Personalized Multi-Agent Ecosystem
description:
**Project Overview:**  

We are developing a cutting-edge Personalized AI Learning & Insight Ecosystem‚Äîa unified platform that integrates multiple AI agents to deliver personalized personal growth, business insights, trend detection, and content curation. We need an experienced AI developer (or small team) to design, build, and scale this system from a minimum viable product (MVP) to full-scale deployment. The ideal candidate is not only technically proficient but also passionate about mentoring and explaining complex concepts.

**Responsibilities:**  

- **Architecture & Development:**  

  - Design and build a multi-agent AI ecosystem using state-of-the-art technologies (e.g., OpenAI GPT, LangChain, Auto-GPT/BabyAGI).  
  - Develop modular agents that handle distinct functions (personal growth, business insights, trend detection, content curation).  
  - Integrate these agents using automation tools (n8n, Zapier) to ensure seamless data flow and orchestration.

- **Data & Integration:**  

  - Set up robust data pipelines for real-time ingestion from APIs (news feeds, CRM systems, social media, etc.).  
  - Ensure secure storage, processing, and compliance with data privacy standards (GDPR, CCPA).

- **User Experience & Interface:**  

  - Build an intuitive dashboard/interface for managing agent interactions and accessing insights.  
  - Collaborate with design teams (if needed) to create a polished user experience.

- **Optimization & Scalability:**  

  - Implement solutions for caching, load balancing, and system scaling to handle increasing data and user demands.  
  - Continuously optimize agent performance and integrate the latest advancements in AI trend detection and content curation.

- **Mentorship & Communication:**  

  - Act as a technical mentor to the founder, explaining complex concepts and guiding the project‚Äôs technical evolution.  
  - Document design decisions and implementation strategies for future reference and training.

**Required Skills & Experience:**  

- **Technical Expertise:**  

  - Proficiency in Python and experience with ML libraries (TensorFlow, PyTorch).  
  - Hands-on experience with large language models (LLMs) and frameworks like LangChain, Auto-GPT, BabyAGI, or similar.  
  - Familiarity with Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) techniques and embedding-based content scoring.

- **System Integration & Automation:**  

  - Proven track record integrating APIs and automation tools (n8n, Zapier).  
  - Experience building scalable, cloud-based architectures (AWS, GCP, or Azure).

- **Data Engineering & Security:**  

  - Strong understanding of data pipelines, encryption, and regulatory compliance (GDPR, CCPA).  
  - Ability to design systems with robust data security and privacy measures.

- **Communication & Mentorship:**  

  - Excellent communication skills with the ability to explain technical details in a clear, understandable manner.  
  - Prior experience mentoring or guiding non-technical stakeholders is a plus.


- **Bonus Skills:**  


  - Experience in front-end development or dashboard creation.  
  - Startup or agile project experience with a track record of building complex systems.


**How to Apply:**  

Please Submit a Loom Video (or similar) Response (3‚Äì8 minutes total):

Background & Experience:

"Please provide an overview of your experience developing AI systems‚Äîespecially those with a multi-agent or modular architecture. Share details of any projects where you worked with frameworks such as LangChain, Auto-GPT, or similar."

Modular Architecture:

"Describe your approach to designing a modular, multi-agent system. Could you share a high-level diagram or explanation of how you‚Äôd structure such an ecosystem?"

API Integration & Automation:

"Tell us about a project where you integrated external APIs and automation tools (such as n8n or Zapier). What were the challenges, and how did you overcome them?"

Data Security & Compliance:

"Explain your strategy for ensuring data security and compliance (e.g., GDPR, CCPA) within an AI system. How would you handle sensitive user data?"

Scalability & Performance:

"Share a scenario from a past project where you addressed scalability or performance issues in an AI system. What solutions did you implement to maintain smooth operation?"

Testing & Validation:

"Describe your process for testing and validating AI outputs. How do you ensure that the system's insights are reliable and accurate?"

Mentorship & Communication:

"Since mentoring is a key part of this role, please describe a situation where you successfully explained a complex technical concept to a non-technical stakeholder. How did you ensure they understood?"

Emerging AI Technologies:

"What emerging AI frameworks or techniques are you most excited about, and how do you see them benefiting a project like this?"

Demo/Code Showcase:

"If possible, share a brief demonstration or code snippet that highlights your approach to modular design. This can be a screen share of a module you‚Äôve built or a quick walkthrough of your design process."

Why You‚Äôre the Ideal Fit:

"Explain in your own words why you are the ideal candidate for this project. What unique strengths and experiences make you a great fit for both building the system and mentoring the founder?"
Please record your responses in a single Loom video (or multiple short videos if necessary) and include the link in your proposal. We appreciate clear, concise answers along with any visuals (diagrams, code snippets, etc.) that help illustrate your points.


We are excited to work with a talented professional who is not only skilled technically but is also eager to share knowledge and help drive this innovative project forward. If you‚Äôre passionate about AI and ready for a challenging yet rewarding project, we‚Äôd love to hear from you!

description:

Provide a Phone-Based Assistant via VAPI

Voice Interaction: Implement conversation flows using GPT-4 as the underlying model, handling user inputs via phone.

title: AI Engineer
description:
Seeking an AI Engineer to fine-tune Llama models for patent and financial report analysis, optimizing them for cost-effective deployment. Candidate is required to collaborate with other AI Engineers and get the scope of task done within 15 days.

About Us: Perceive Now
Perceive Now is transforming how enterprises, investors, and innovators access market and technology intelligence reports with AI-driven automation. Our proprietary task-specific LLMs and AI agents generate zero-hallucination insights, helping decision-makers identify opportunities, assess risks, and gain competitive advantages in real time.
Based in San Francisco, we deliver highly specialized, data-backed reports that streamline research, reduce costs, and accelerate strategic decision-making. If you're passionate about building AI-driven systems that turn raw data into actionable intelligence, this is the place for you.

Job Description:
We are looking for an experienced AI Engineer to lead the fine-tuning and deployment of Llama models tailored for patent analysis and financial report generation. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in machine learning, natural language processing, and experience with large-scale model training and deployment.

Key Responsibilities:

Fine-Tune Patent Chat LLM (Days 3-8):
Train Llama 3 (8B & 13B) models on structured patent queries.
Integrate BLIP-2 / Meta SAM for image-text correlation.
Optimize models for Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG).

Fine-Tune Market Report Generation LLM (Days 8-12):
Train models on comprehensive financial reports for structured analysis.
Enhance models for generating long-form reports, including M&A, competitor intelligence, and VC analysis.

Transition to Cost-Optimized Inference (Days 13-15):
Export fine-tuned Llama models in GGUF format for local inference.
Manage storage by saving backups in Azure Blob Cold Storage and deleting training data.
Deploy models using on-premises GPUs for primary inference and small Azure VMs for low-traffic queries, with auto-scaling enabled on Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS).

Qualifications:
Proven experience in fine-tuning large language models, particularly Llama.
Proficiency in image-text correlation techniques using tools like BLIP-2 / Meta SAM.
Strong understanding of Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) methodologies.
Experience with cloud storage solutions, specifically Azure Blob Storage.
Familiarity with deploying models on GPU infrastructures and managing auto-scaling with AKS.
Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Projected Costs:


If you are passionate about advancing AI capabilities in patent and financial analysis and have the expertise to optimize model deployment, we encourage you to apply.

title: Full-Stack Developer for Lovable Proposal System Optimization & AI Integration
description:
I‚Äôm looking for an experienced full-stack developer with expertise in Supabase, OpenAI API, and performance optimization to improve my proposal generation system in Lovable.dev. However, due to Lovable.dev‚Äôs limitations on collaboration, I‚Äôd like to work closely with someone throughout the process rather than just handing over the project.

This means I‚Äôm looking for someone who can not only help implement solutions but also guide me along the way, explaining what‚Äôs happening and how I can make better technical decisions in the future. I don‚Äôt want a ‚Äúdone-for-you‚Äù approach‚ÄîI want to understand the changes being made and what I could do differently next time.

Project Overview:

I‚Äôve built an app that enables quick, on-the-fly proposal creation during sales calls. These proposals can be updated post-call, shared via live links, and compared side-by-side. However, I need help solving a few major challenges:

Key Challenges to Solve:
1. Optimize Shared Results Load Time
‚Ä¢ The ‚ÄúShared Results‚Äù page, which displays past proposals, takes too long to load (sometimes over 1.5 minutes).
‚Ä¢ It includes details such as proposal creator, assignee, attendees, creation date, status (draft/published), and actions (edit, delete, copy, view).
‚Ä¢ I need improvements in query efficiency and performance to make this load faster.
2. Fix OpenAI Integration for Proposal Summaries
‚Ä¢ The proposal editor includes a ‚ÄúGenerate Summary‚Äù feature that should extract key details from a transcript via OpenAI.
‚Ä¢ The summary sections include:
‚Ä¢ Introduction
‚Ä¢ Solution Overview
‚Ä¢ Current Situation
‚Ä¢ Future Goals
‚Ä¢ Challenges
‚Ä¢ Currently, generating summaries fails with the error: ‚ÄúAnalysis error. Failed to send a request to the edge function.‚Äù
‚Ä¢ I need help diagnosing whether this is an issue with my Supabase edge function or the OpenAI API request.
3. Potential Expansion: AI Demo System
‚Ä¢ I have a table containing URLs for live AI demos that simulate real-world AI chat experiences.
‚Ä¢ I want to create a searchable demo experience where users can select an industry and test AI interactions relevant to their needs.
‚Ä¢ I‚Äôm unsure whether this should be a separate project or an extension of my current system. I‚Äôd love input on the best approach.

Ideal Skills & Experience:
‚Ä¢ Supabase: Experience optimizing queries and edge functions.
‚Ä¢ OpenAI API: Familiarity with integrating AI-driven text generation.
‚Ä¢ Full-Stack Development: Strong background in backend optimization and UI performance.
‚Ä¢ Database Performance Optimization: Ability to debug slow-loading pages and speed up data retrieval.
‚Ä¢ Mentorship & Collaboration: Willingness to walk me through the process, answer questions, and explain decisions.
‚Ä¢ Experience with AI Demos (Optional): If you have experience building interactive AI showcases, that‚Äôs a bonus.

Next Steps:

If this sounds like a project you can help with, please include:
‚Ä¢ A brief explanation of how you would approach fixing the slow-loading shared results page.
‚Ä¢ Your experience with Supabase edge functions and OpenAI API integrations.
‚Ä¢ Any thoughts on whether the AI demo system should be a separate project or an extension of the current app.
‚Ä¢ Your experience with mentoring or coaching developers through technical challenges.

I‚Äôm excited to work with someone who can not only optimize and scale this tool but also help me grow my own technical understanding along the way! üöÄ
skills: ['OpenAI API', 'Web Development', 'Web Design', 'Full-Stack Development', 'React', 'PHP', 'Database Performance Optimization', 'UX & UI Design', 'Chart.js', 'JavaScript', 'Supabase', 'WordPress', 'Web Application']

title: Experienced Digital Marketer Needed for Full-Time Position
description:
Job Title: Full-Time Digital Marketer- ***LA county marketers only***

Location: Los Angeles, CA

Job Description:

We are excited to announce an opening for a full-time Digital Marketer to join our dynamic and innovative team based in Los Angeles. We are looking for an individual with a minimum of 5 years of hands-on experience in digital marketing who is eager to contribute to our mission and help elevate our brand presence in the digital landscape. The ideal candidate will possess a robust skill set that includes expertise in media buying, search engine optimization (SEO), social media advertising, content creation, and design, as well as proficiency in leveraging artificial intelligence tools to enhance video marketing efforts.

In this role, you will be responsible for developing, implementing, and optimizing comprehensive marketing strategies that drive engagement, increase brand visibility, and foster growth across multiple digital channels. You will work closely with cross-functional teams to identify key performance indicators (KPIs), analyze market trends, and adjust strategies accordingly to achieve our business objectives delivered on time with deadlines.

As a Digital Marketer, you will have the opportunity to lead various campaigns, manage advertising budgets, and utilize data-driven insights to refine our marketing initiatives. Your creativity and analytical skills will be paramount as you craft compelling content that resonates with our target audience and enhances our overall brand narrative.

If you are passionate about the ever-evolving world of digital marketing, have a proactive mindset, and are ready to make a significant impact in a collaborative environment, we encourage you to apply! Your contributions will play a crucial role in shaping our digital presence and driving our marketing success. Please only apply if you are located in the LA county area.

Key Responsibilities:
- Develop and execute innovative digital marketing strategies to enhance brand recognition and engagement.
- Manage and optimize media buying efforts across various platforms to maximize ROI and drive traffic.
- Conduct thorough SEO audits and implement strategies to improve organic search rankings and enhance website performance.
- Create and manage targeted social media advertising campaigns that align with overall marketing goals and objectives.
- Collaborate with content creators to produce high-quality, engaging content for various channels, including blogs, social media, and email campaigns.
- Utilize design skills to create visually appealing marketing materials that resonate with our audience.
- Apply AI tools and technologies to streamline processes, analyze data, and gain insights into consumer behavior and trends.
- Monitor, analyze, and report on campaign performance, providing actionable recommendations for improvement.

Relevant Skills:
- Media Buying: Extensive experience in purchasing and managing ad space across digital platforms, ensuring optimal performance and budget adherence.
- Search Engine Optimization (SEO): Proven ability to implement effective SEO strategies that enhance organic traffic and improve search engine rankings.
- Social Media Advertising: Expertise in creating and managing social media ad campaigns across platforms like Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, and Twitter.
- SEO optimized  Non Ai Content Creation: Strong writing fo consulting and finance and storytelling skills, with the ability to produce engaging content tailored to various audiences and formats. Press release drafting and submissions to high authority news sites.
- Design Skills: Proficiency in design tools (e.g., Adobe Creative Suite, Canva) to create eye-catching visuals that support marketing initiatives.
- Proficiency in AI Tools: Familiarity with various AI-driven marketing tools and analytics platforms for data analysis, automation, and campaign optimization.

If you are a strategic thinker with a passion for digital marketing and a desire to work in a fast-paced environment, we would love to hear from you! Join us in shaping the future of our brand and making a lasting impact in the digital marketing realm. Apply today!

title: AI Specialist Needed for Pattern Recognition in Fake Inquiries
description:
We are seeking an experienced AI specialist to develop and train a machine learning system that can effectively recognize patterns associated with fake inquiries our business is currently receiving. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in AI and machine learning, and will be able to create algorithms that enhance our inquiry filtering process. This project is crucial for improving our operational efficiency and ensuring the quality of our leads. If you have the expertise and are passionate about solving complex problems with AI, we would love to hear from you!

The issue at hand
- We're a private rehab in AU
- We're getting 10 bot requests per day
- The contacts are real, real phone number and real name so they're drawn from a database
- The patterns are similar but what they have in common is that they all come from a bot and when we follow-up nobody knows about any request

Automation needed
- Recognize which emails are spam
- Send them to a folder immediately or mark them "spam" in some way
- That's it

We suggest to add 40-50 of these emails and recognise a pattern, we do not want to lose real leads that are in between those fake leads.

We've been having this issue for the past 2 months and we would like it solved in a few days if possible

title: AI Integrator
description:
KENTECH Consulting Inc. is an award-winning background screening technology company, known for innovative platforms like eKnowID.com‚Äîthe first consumer background check system‚Äîand ClarityIQ, our high-tech, high-touch investigative case management system.

Our Mission:
To help the world make clear, informed hiring decisions.

Our Core Values:
‚úîÔ∏è Customer Focused: Results-driven, with the client experience at the center.
‚úîÔ∏è Growth Minded: We value continuous learning and applying industry best practices.
‚úîÔ∏è Fact Finders: Passionate investigators dedicated to discovery and truth.
‚úîÔ∏è Community & Employee Partnerships: We work to deliver what matters most to communities and employees.

Why Join Us?
üîπ Global AI Innovation: Work on high-impact AI projects for background screening.
üîπ Flexible & Remote: Collaborate with a diverse, international team.
üîπ Professional Growth: Gain hands-on experience integrating AI into SaaS-driven security solutions.

Role Overview
We are seeking an AI Automation Specialist to lead the design, development, and optimization of AI-driven automation solutions for our investigative and background screening workflows. This is a highly technical, hands-on role that requires deep experience in AI development, system integrations, automation scripting, and regulatory compliance.

Key Responsibilities

1Ô∏è‚É£ AI Development & Implementation
Design and deploy AI automation solutions to streamline investigative workflows.
Develop custom AI models and integrations within KENTECH‚Äôs existing SaaS platforms (eKnowID, ClarityIQ).
Work with third-party AI platforms (OpenAI, AWS AI, Google AI, Azure AI) to enhance automation and decision support.
2Ô∏è‚É£ System Integration & Workflow Automation
Ensure seamless AI integrations with our case management, CRM, and HRIS systems.
Manage API connections and troubleshoot integration issues.
Use AI, NLP, and RPA to automate manual processes across the investigative lifecycle.
3Ô∏è‚É£ Security & Compliance (Non-Negotiable)
Ensure all AI solutions are fully compliant with GDPR, CCPA, SOC 2, and other relevant data protection laws.
Adhere to KENTECH‚Äôs data security protocols ‚Äî including approved cloud environments and proper handling of sensitive data.
4Ô∏è‚É£ Performance Monitoring & Continuous Improvement
Regularly test, monitor, and optimize AI models for accuracy, speed, and reliability.
Document processes, provide technical training where needed, and support ongoing enhancements.
Required Qualifications

‚úîÔ∏è Technical Expertise

3+ years experience in AI/ML development using tools such as TensorFlow, OpenAI, PyTorch, AWS AI, or Google Cloud AI.
Proficient in programming languages such as Python, R, or JavaScript.
Hands-on experience with API integrations, automation scripting, and AI deployment in production environments.
‚úîÔ∏è Compliance & Data Privacy Knowledge

Solid understanding of GDPR, CCPA, SOC 2, and data protection best practices related to AI workflows.
Ability to build solutions that prioritize both innovation and regulatory compliance.
‚úîÔ∏è Soft Skills

Strong communicator with the ability to explain technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.
Excellent documentation habits ‚Äî including version control and process documentation.
Comfortable working independently and troubleshooting technical challenges across time zones.
Preferred Experience (Bonus Points)
‚úî Experience working in background screening, legal tech, HR tech, or financial compliance industries.
‚úî Prior work with investigative or case management platforms.
‚úî Knowledge of HubSpot or similar CRMs.
