title: Data Analytics
description:
Data Analytics is the process of examining and interpreting data to help organizations make informed decisions. Unlike data entry, which focuses on collecting and entering data into systems, data analytics involves analyzing that data to extract useful insights, identify patterns, and provide actionable recommendations.

Here's a breakdown of what the role typically entails:

Key Responsibilities:
Data Collection & Cleaning: Gathering data from various sources and ensuring it's accurate and usable. This often involves cleaning and transforming data to remove any inconsistencies or errors.

Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA): Analyzing data using statistical and visualization techniques to understand the relationships and patterns within it. This can include summary statistics, distributions, and identifying outliers.

Data Modeling & Analysis: Using techniques such as regression, classification, or clustering to build models that can predict outcomes or classify data. The goal is to create actionable insights that guide decision-making.

Visualization: Creating charts, graphs, and dashboards to present findings in a clear, visual way. This helps stakeholders understand complex data and makes it easier for decision-makers to act on the information.

Reporting & Communication: Presenting insights and recommendations to management or other stakeholders. This often involves writing reports or giving presentations to explain the results of analyses.

Tool Proficiency: Data analysts typically use software and tools like Excel, SQL, R, Python, Tableau, Power BI, or other data visualization and analysis platforms to perform their tasks.

Skills and Qualifications:
Analytical Thinking: Ability to look at data from different perspectives and extract meaningful insights.
Technical Skills: Proficiency in programming languages (like Python or R), data visualization tools (like Tableau), and data manipulation tools (like SQL).
Attention to Detail: Ensuring accuracy and consistency in analysis, as even small errors can lead to misleading conclusions.
Communication Skills: Presenting data and complex findings in a clear and understandable manner.
skills: ['Microsoft Excel', 'Data Analysis', 'Google Analytics', 'IBM SPSS', 'Neo4j', 'Search Engine Optimization', 'Python', 'Data Science']

title: Data Analyst Needed for Mixpanel Experiment Analysis
description:
Objective:

We need a data analyst to perform an in-depth analysis of A/B tests results in Mixpanel (8 experiments). The goal is to identify clear user segments for which one variant performs better than the other and uncover how different user attributes (including combinations) influence test outcomes.




Key Tasks:

A/B Test Segmentation Analysis:

For each A/B test, determine the exact conditions under which one variant should be chosen over the other.

Provide a cohort breakdown, identifying which combinations of user attributes lead to better results for each variant.

If segments are too small, provide two versions of the segmentation:

A more granular segmentation.

A slightly broader segmentation with larger cohorts.

Influence of User Characteristics on A/B Test Results:

Analyze how each user characteristic (e.g., age, weight, goals, etc.) influences the test outcome.

Identify combinations of characteristics that significantly affect which variant performs better.

Provide statistical justification for findings (e.g., confidence levels, effect size).





Expected Deliverables:

Detailed breakdown per A/B test: When to use each variant, based on user characteristics.

Two segmentation models (if necessary): granular and broader segmentation.

Analysis of characteristic influence, including combined factors.







Requirements:

Strong experience in A/B test analysis, data analysis, and segmentation.

Expertise in statistical modeling and cohort analysis.

Ability to present insights in a structured and actionable way.

If you have experience in user segmentation and data analysis, we‚Äôd love to hear from you!
skills: ['Microsoft Excel', 'Statistics', 'Data Analysis', 'IBM SPSS', 'Neo4j', 'Search Engine Optimization', 'Python', 'Data Science']

title: Data Analyst & Excel Automation Expert for Price Comparison (Python & Excel)
description:
Job Description:
We are looking for an experienced Data Analyst with expertise in Excel, Python, and data automation to help us refine our price comparison system between our platform and a competitor.

We retrieve competitor pricing data using a Python web scraping script, and your role will be to clean, structure, and automate the comparison process‚Äîadjusting for condition differences, club set variations, and pricing trends.

üîπ Key Challenge: Product names often do not match 1:1 between our data and the competitor‚Äôs. A model name in one source may contain an extension (e.g., shaft type, flex, special edition, etc.) that is missing in the other. We need intelligent matching techniques (such as fuzzy matching) to improve the comparison accuracy.

Key Responsibilities:
Process and clean pricing data retrieved via Python web scraping.
Match comparable products within the same category, ensuring accurate category-based comparisons.
Solve model name discrepancies using fuzzy matching, normalization techniques, or rule-based logic.
Adjust competitor prices based on condition differences and iron set composition (club count).
Develop an Excel-based model with automation for ongoing price comparisons.
Provide insights on pricing discrepancies and optimization opportunities.
Ideal Skills & Experience:
Strong Excel skills (XLOOKUP, INDEX-MATCH, conditional logic, VBA optional).
Python expertise, especially in data cleaning (Pandas), automation, and fuzzy matching (FuzzyWuzzy or similar libraries).
Experience in pricing analysis and competitor comparisons.
Familiarity with web scraping (you won‚Äôt build the scraper, but you must handle scraped data).
Data normalization techniques to handle naming inconsistencies.
Ability to work with CSV, Excel, and automate workflows.
Strong attention to detail and ability to deliver accurate and structured data insights.
Deliverables:
‚úÖ A structured Excel file with price comparisons, automated matching, and adjustments.
‚úÖ A robust methodology for updating pricing periodically.
‚úÖ A refined price comparison model based on data insights.
‚úÖ Suggestions for improving the model name matching process for better accuracy.

Budget & Timeline:
üí∞ Budget: $250-$500 (depending on experience and scope).
‚è≥ Timeline: Expected completion within 5-7 days.

Beyond goal-oriented, must be self-driven and personable. This can lead to a full-time, salary position. It will begin as part-time with about 20-30 hours per week.

Tax

title: Salesforce Administrator & Business Analyst
description:
Salesforce Administrator & Business Analyst

Company: Tasting Kitchen (TK) Media Group

About Us

Tasting Kitchen (TK) Media Group is a leading media brand renowned for our premium content across multiple channels: a high-end print magazine, a global website, dynamic social media platforms, a custom publishing division, a private events space in Hong Kong, and a creative agency. We connect audiences with the best of food, drink, travel, and luxury living.

We‚Äôre seeking a Salesforce Administrator & Business Analyst to own the day-to-day management of our Salesforce environment, focus on data integrity, and create insightful business reports. While some Salesforce development or coding experience is welcome, our primary need is someone who excels at administrative tasks, reporting, and overall CRM optimization.

Role Overview

As our Salesforce Administrator & Business Analyst, you will be responsible for ensuring that Salesforce serves as a single source of truth for all client, prospect, and opportunity data. You will maintain clean records, build and update dashboards, and provide regular reports on sales activities, revenues, and costs. You‚Äôll collaborate with leadership to analyze trends and recommend improvements in our sales and marketing processes.

Key Responsibilities
1. Salesforce Administration
‚Ä¢ Manage all aspects of user setup (profiles, permissions, roles, and licenses).
‚Ä¢ Configure standard Salesforce functionality (page layouts, list views, validation rules, flows).
‚Ä¢ Import new leads and contacts from external sources (e.g., ZoomInfo, LinkedIn Sales Navigator, CamCard).
‚Ä¢ Perform data cleanup and deduplication on a regular basis to ensure accuracy and reliability.
2. Data Analysis & Reporting
‚Ä¢ Design and maintain custom reports and dashboards to track KPIs such as pipeline status, revenue forecasts, and campaign ROI.
‚Ä¢ Generate weekly, monthly, and quarterly reports for leadership‚Äîfocusing on sales trends, revenue by product line, event sponsorships, and other critical metrics.
‚Ä¢ Proactively analyze Salesforce data to identify patterns, opportunities, or areas for improvement.
3. Process Optimization
‚Ä¢ Partner with sales, marketing, and finance teams to streamline workflows and ensure Salesforce aligns with our business objectives.
‚Ä¢ Identify inefficiencies in lead management, opportunity tracking, and reporting; propose solutions for continuous improvement.
‚Ä¢ Maintain documentation of processes and best practices to ensure consistent usage across the organization.
4. User Training & Support
‚Ä¢ Provide day-to-day user support, including basic troubleshooting, password resets, and guidance on best practices.
‚Ä¢ Conduct periodic training sessions or create how-to guides to enhance user proficiency and adoption.
5. Collaboration & Cross-Functional Support
‚Ä¢ Work closely with the finance team to align Salesforce data with cost and revenue reporting.
‚Ä¢ Coordinate with event managers and editorial teams to ensure seamless tracking of event sponsorships and media partnerships.
‚Ä¢ If applicable, assist with or oversee minor system enhancements, integrations, or automations (e.g., custom objects, flows) to improve efficiency.
6. Optional: Salesforce Development (Nice-to-Have, Not Required)
‚Ä¢ If capable and interested, help with minor Apex or Lightning customizations.
‚Ä¢ Partner with external developers (if needed) for more complex or specialized programming tasks.

Qualifications & Skills
‚Ä¢ Essential
‚Ä¢ Proven experience as a Salesforce Administrator (Salesforce Admin certification preferred).
‚Ä¢ Strong skills in report building, dashboard creation, and data management.
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with Sales Cloud features: leads, contacts, opportunities, forecasting, etc.
‚Ä¢ Analytical mindset, capable of turning raw data into actionable insights.
‚Ä¢ Excellent communication and interpersonal skills in English.
‚Ä¢ Preferred
‚Ä¢ Salesforce Advanced Administrator certification or additional Salesforce certs.
‚Ä¢ Basic familiarity with Apex/Lightning Components or willingness to learn (but coding is not the main focus).
‚Ä¢ Previous experience working in media, publishing, or events industries.
‚Ä¢ Exposure to marketing automation tools (e.g., Pardot, Marketing Cloud) or financial software integrations.
‚Ä¢ Soft Skills
‚Ä¢ Highly organized and detail-oriented, with an ability to multitask and prioritize effectively.
‚Ä¢ Problem-solver who can suggest creative solutions to improve data quality and business processes.
‚Ä¢ Self-driven, with the capacity to work independently or in a small team environment.

Engagement & Reporting Structure
‚Ä¢ Work Arrangement: Flexible, ongoing freelance or contract role (with potential for a longer-term engagement).
‚Ä¢ Reporting: You‚Äôll report directly to the Publisher and collaborate with sales, marketing, finance, and events teams.
‚Ä¢ Location: Remote work is acceptable, but availability for real-time communication and regular updates is required.

How to Apply
‚Ä¢ Submit your CV or r√©sum√© detailing relevant Salesforce Admin/Analyst experience.
‚Ä¢ Include specific examples of reports or dashboards you have created, if available.
‚Ä¢ Provide a brief cover letter or summary explaining why you‚Äôre a good fit for a Salesforce Admin-focused role rather than a purely development-based one.
‚Ä¢ If you have certifications, please list them and include any verification links.

Why Join Tasting Kitchen (TK) Media Group?
‚Ä¢ Influence & Impact: You‚Äôll shape our core CRM processes, ensuring data-driven decisions and a high-performing sales operation.
‚Ä¢ Collaboration: Work closely with a dynamic team of creatives, event planners, and executives bringing some of the most exciting culinary and lifestyle experiences to life.
‚Ä¢ Growth Opportunity: We value personal and professional growth‚Äîwhether it‚Äôs through additional certifications or cross-functional projects in media and events.

Ready to Take Our Salesforce to the Next Level?
Apply now and help us create best-in-class sales processes and data-driven insights at Tasting Kitchen Media Group!

title: Data Scientist Engineer Needed for Innovative Projects
description:
**Job Description: Data Scientist Engineer**

We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated Data Scientist Engineer to join our dynamic and innovative team. In this pivotal role, you will have the opportunity to work on a variety of exciting projects that focus on advanced data analysis and machine learning techniques. Our organization values creativity and collaboration, and we are looking for someone who shares our passion for leveraging data to drive meaningful insights and solutions.

The ideal candidate will possess a robust background in statistics, mathematics, and computer science, coupled with hands-on experience in building and deploying predictive models. You should be proficient in programming languages such as Python, R, or SQL, and have experience with data visualization tools and libraries. Familiarity with machine learning frameworks like TensorFlow or PyTorch will be highly advantageous as you develop algorithms that can learn from and make predictions based on complex data sets.

In this role, you will collaborate closely with a team of talented data analysts and software engineers to develop comprehensive, data-driven solutions that enhance our products and services. You will be responsible for understanding and interpreting complex data structures, identifying patterns and trends, and translating your findings into actionable insights. Your work will directly contribute to improving our decision-making processes and driving business outcomes.

As a Data Scientist Engineer, you will also be expected to stay current with the latest advancements in the field of data science and machine learning. This includes keeping up with emerging technologies, best practices, and industry trends. You will have the opportunity to participate in research and development initiatives, allowing you to experiment with new methodologies and approaches to analyze data and solve problems.

In addition to your technical skills, we value strong communication and collaboration abilities. You will be required to present your findings and recommendations to stakeholders at various levels within the organization. Therefore, the ability to convey complex technical concepts in a clear and concise manner is essential.

If you are passionate about data science, driven to make a significant impact, and eager to contribute to a forward-thinking organization, we would love to hear from you! Join us in our mission to harness the power of data and unlock new possibilities for our business and our customers. Apply today to become an integral part of our team and help us shape the future through data-driven innovation.

title: Report Analyst/Designer for PowerBI Report Development and Training
description:
We are seeking an experienced Power BI Consultant to help us transition and build Power BI reports and dashboards based on existing SSRS report templates. Our organization operates on a SQL Server 2019 backend with databases supporting three distinct operating companies. These databases are integral to our use of Microsoft Dynamics GP 2022 as our ERP system, supplemented by Cavallo SalesPad, which integrates directly with Dynamics GP and adds its own tables.

Key Responsibilities:

Design and develop Power BI reports and dashboards using existing SSRS reports as templates.
Optimize connections between our Azure-hosted Windows Server 2022 VM and Power BI Cloud via the On-Premises Data Gateway.
Train our accounting team on the effective use of Power BI, including filtering, customizing views, and exporting data for executive reports.
Provide recommendations for best practices in Power BI, ensuring seamless integration with our current SQL databases.
Prepare the organization for future reporting needs as we transition from Dynamics GP/SalesPad to NetSuite over the next 4‚Äì6 months.
(Optional) If experienced, assist in Tableau integration for broader data visualization options.
Skills and Expertise Required:

Proven expertise in Power BI development, deployment, and training.
Strong understanding of SQL, especially within Microsoft SQL Server 2019 environments.
Familiarity with SSRS (SQL Server Reporting Services) and converting SSRS reports to Power BI.
Experience with Dynamics GP 2022 and Cavallo SalesPad is highly desirable.
Knowledge of cloud infrastructure, particularly Azure, and setting up On-Premises Data Gateways.
Excellent communication skills to provide training and documentation for non-technical users.
Optional: Experience with Tableau for comparative or supplementary reporting solutions.


Additional Details:

This project will focus on the interim use of Power BI to replaces SSRS reports that are pulling data from a SQL Virtual Machine hosted in Azure.  Later, we will need to update these dashboard to connect to the NetSuite environment via API.

Applicants should be able to create robust, scalable immediate solution that connects with our Dynamics ERP while offering flexibility for the change to NetSuite in the next 6 months.

title: Flask Expert Needed
description:
I need a flask expert that can follow the following criteria for my app

Flask App Checklist for High Scalability (1000+ Users Concurrently)
1. Code Structure & Maintainability
(Flask is more lightweight than Django, so we need to structure it well to avoid a messy monolith.)
‚úîÔ∏è Use Flask Blueprints for modularity (e.g., users/, billing/, credits/, api/).
‚úîÔ∏è Separate files for routes, models, authentication, and utilities (Flask doesn‚Äôt enforce structure like Django).
‚úîÔ∏è Follow Flask best practices: Use application factory pattern to allow flexible configurations.
‚úîÔ∏è Avoid monolithic code by keeping reusable functions in utils/ and moving business logic outside routes.
‚úîÔ∏è Decouple services where possible (e.g., separate worker processes for background tasks).
‚úÖ How it helps:
Prevents spaghetti code that slows down scaling efforts.
Ensures new features can be added without breaking existing functionality.

2. Database Optimization (PostgreSQL)
(Using SQLAlchemy ORM instead of Django‚Äôs ORM.)
‚úîÔ∏è Use SQLAlchemy ORM (or Flask-SQLAlchemy) for database interaction.
‚úîÔ∏è Manually create indexes (Index('index_name', Model.field)) since Flask doesn‚Äôt auto-index like Django.
‚úîÔ∏è Use SQLAlchemy connection pooling (pool_pre_ping=True, pool_size=20, max_overflow=0).
‚úîÔ∏è Implement Redis/Memcached caching (e.g., Flask-Caching).
‚úîÔ∏è Prevent N+1 query problems by using joinedload() in SQLAlchemy.
‚úîÔ∏è Read Replicas: Set up read replicas to distribute database read requests.
‚úÖ How it helps:
Optimized queries allow faster responses under high load.
Connection pooling prevents too many open database connections.
Redis caching reduces database calls, improving response times.

3. Multi-User Support (1000+ Concurrent Users)
(Flask handles sessions differently than Django.)
‚úîÔ∏è Use Flask-Session to store session data in Redis instead of the database.
‚úîÔ∏è Generate unique session IDs and store them in Redis for fast lookups.
‚úîÔ∏è Use Celery + Redis for async tasks (e.g., processing outputs, deleting old data).
‚úîÔ∏è Paginate large dataset queries using Flask-SQLAlchemy‚Äôs pagination methods.
‚úîÔ∏è Rate limit requests per user/IP to prevent abuse and API overload.
‚úîÔ∏è Horizontal Scaling: Deploy multiple Flask instances behind a load balancer.
‚úÖ How it helps:
Redis prevents database session overload, making Flask faster under heavy load.
Load balancing distributes traffic evenly across multiple servers.
Rate limiting protects against DDoS attacks and server abuse.

4. AWS S3 Bucket (Input/Output Storage)
‚úîÔ∏è Store all user-generated content in S3 using boto3.
‚úîÔ∏è Use pre-signed URLs for secure file uploads/downloads.
‚úîÔ∏è Implement lifecycle policies for automatic old file deletion.
‚úîÔ∏è Restrict S3 permissions (ensure private access).
‚úîÔ∏è Enable S3 Transfer Acceleration for faster file uploads/downloads globally.
‚úÖ How it helps:
No server storage needed, reducing system load.
Scalable storage solution that handles millions of files.
Faster access to files globally with S3 Transfer Acceleration.

5. Payments & Credit-Based System (Stripe)
‚úîÔ∏è Integrate Stripe API with Flask (stripe-python package).
‚úîÔ∏è Implement credit deduction logic only after successful processing.
‚úîÔ∏è Build a billing history table in PostgreSQL.
‚úîÔ∏è Admin panel for manual credit adjustments (use Flask-Admin or a custom dashboard).
‚úîÔ∏è Log failed payment attempts for debugging.
‚úÖ How it helps:
Prevents fraudulent use of credits.
Ensures users get billed correctly even under high load.

6. Security & Protection
‚úîÔ∏è Enforce HTTPS and secure cookies (SESSION_COOKIE_SECURE = True).
‚úîÔ∏è Use Flask-JWT-Extended for authentication.
‚úîÔ∏è Implement rate limiting using Flask-Limiter.
‚úîÔ∏è Enable CSRF protection using Flask-WTF.
‚úîÔ∏è Store API keys & secrets in .env files using python-dotenv.
‚úîÔ∏è Enable Web Application Firewall (WAF) for extra protection against attacks.
‚úÖ How it helps:
Prevents API abuse with rate limits.
Protects against unauthorized access and session hijacking.

7. Deployment & Infrastructure (Auto-Scaling)
‚úîÔ∏è Use Gunicorn + Nginx for serving Flask in production.
‚úîÔ∏è Containerize with Docker (docker-compose.yml for easy deployment).
‚úîÔ∏è Enable auto-scaling with AWS ECS/Kubernetes/DigitalOcean Apps.
‚úîÔ∏è Set up a load balancer to distribute traffic evenly.
‚úîÔ∏è Use health checks to detect and restart failing instances.
‚úÖ How it helps:
More instances launch automatically when traffic increases.
Load balancing ensures no single server gets overwhelmed.

8. Logging, Monitoring & Error Tracking
‚úîÔ∏è Use Sentry or Rollbar for real-time error tracking.
‚úîÔ∏è Implement logging for failed payments & user actions.
‚úîÔ∏è Monitor app performance using Prometheus + Grafana.
‚úîÔ∏è Set up alerts for high database usage or downtime.
‚úîÔ∏è Log Celery task failures for debugging async jobs.
‚úÖ How it helps:
Detects issues before they cause downtime.
Tracks high-usage areas to optimize performance.

9. Scheduled Cleanup Script (S3)
‚úîÔ∏è Use a cron job or Celery Beat to delete old files daily.
‚úîÔ∏è Store logs of deleted files for debugging.
‚úîÔ∏è Delete inactive user-generated files to save storage costs.
‚úÖ How it helps:
Reduces unnecessary storage costs.
Keeps the system optimized.

10. Documentation & ReadMe
‚úîÔ∏è Write a README explaining setup & usage.
‚úîÔ∏è Generate API documentation using Flask-Swagger/OpenAPI.
‚úîÔ∏è Add code comments for complex logic.
‚úîÔ∏è Create Postman collections for API testing.
‚úÖ How it helps:
Onboards new developers quickly.
Ensures easy API integration for third-party services.

title: Web Designer Needed for Legacy Succession Planning Business
description:
We are seeking a highly skilled and creative Web Designer to develop a professional and user-friendly website for our legacy succession planning business. The ideal candidate will have significant experience designing functional websites. The ideal candidate will send links to websites demonstrate they can design the functionality we need.

One of the primary functions of the website will be an interactive questionnaire designed to guide users through the legacy succession planning process. Additionally, the site must incorporate an AI-powered financial calculator to provide clients with tax and asset planning insights, as well as integrate various service offerings under one platform.

Phase 1 - Key Functions:

1. Form that accepts user information in the form of multiple choice selections, sliding scales, and typed in answers, then analyzes the information in an AI-powered financial calculator, generates a basic Legacy Succession Plan, and emails a customized, branded, PDF of it to the User
2. Interactive Questionnaire that calculates data input by the user and generates an email to the User
3. Interactive Questionnaire of Client‚Äôs current Wealth Health that calculates data input by the User and generates a Wealth Health Score that is immediately visible on the page.
4. Embedded Youtube Video library that links to Youtube
5. User-friendly payment gateway to receive online payments

Phase 2 - Key Functions:

6. User Login to upload documents to a secure portal - Implement secure client portals for document uploads and interactions.
7. Page where User can purchase and view Video Courses on demand.

Key Responsibilities:

- Design and develop a visually appealing, responsive website that aligns with our brand identity.
- Ensure a clean, minimalist, and luxury aesthetic throughout the website that appeals to high net worth individuals.
- Ensure SEO best practices for improved visibility and search ranking.
- Implement UX/UI best practices to create an intuitive and engaging user experience.
- Integrate a functional payment gateway with a simple, one-step process, that makes it easy for Users to purchase products and make payments
- Develop and integrate Develop and integrate an AI-powered financial calculator
- Develop and integrate interactive questionnaires
- Develop and integrate an interactive questionnaire that generates customized solutions for clients.
- Optimize website speed, performance, and mobile responsiveness.
- Be a team player and work collaboratively with our team to timely refine content presentation and website flow.
- Provide ongoing support and maintenance as needed.

Required Experience

- Proven experience in designing high-end, luxury, and professional websites. We will provide brand guidelines. The layout style should be minimalist, spacious, intuitive navigation.
- Strong portfolio demonstrating expertise in minimalist, clean web design.
- Proficiency in web design tools such as Figma, Adobe XD, Sketch, or similar.
- Knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and CMS platforms (e.g., WordPress, Webflow).
- Experience in UX/UI design with a focus on high-net-worth clientele.
- Understanding of SEO principles and best practices.
- Ability to integrate secure online forms, interactive financial tools, video content, and an interactive questionnaire.
- Experience with AI-powered financial tools or the ability to integrate AI-driven plugins for calculations.

Other Qualifications:

- Familiarity with legal or financial industry websites.
- Experience working with CRM or secure client communication platforms.
- Basic knowledge of branding and typography best practices.
- Strong communication and project management skills.

Application Process:

Interested candidates should submit their resume, portfolio, and a brief proposal outlining their approach to designing a luxury estate planning website. Please include links to relevant past work that showcases your ability to create sophisticated, user-friendly web experiences with the functionality required for this job.

title: Backend of a college admissions website.
description:
Need to develop an entire backend of a website with several functionalities. You will likely need a full team to do this. It is a huge project and we need it done as

Here is the IMS documentation: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1luSQNMP7un_4HvmwVZnjx2qqJ4jIW18FM72UNWz01bo/edit?usp=sharing

Here are some key points from a recent meeting we had too.

1. Client Onboarding & Folder Creation
- Automate the onboarding process within the portal.
- Create a structured client folder system within the portal.
- Integrate with Google Drive (or an alternative) to allow document editing & collaboration.
- Ensure controlled access for clients, parents, and staff to different folder sections.

2. University Application Document Management
- Clients should be able to input their finalized university list.
- Automatically generate university-specific folders (e.g., NYU: main essay, supplemental essays, documents).
- Enable collaborative editing of documents within the portal.

3. Milestone Tracking & Progress Dashboard
-Students should have a visual progress tracker displaying:
-Completed applications, essays, and other required tasks.
-Percentage completion of their admissions journey.
-Automated notifications/reminders for upcoming deadlines (e.g., essay drafts, application submission).
-Parents should have access to view progress updates.

4. Scheduling & Session Tracking
-Integrated calendar system (alternative to Calendly or Traft).
-Students should be able to schedule sessions directly with their assigned advisor or tutor.
-The system should automatically match session types to the appropriate advisor/tutor.
-Track the number of sessions used vs. remaining.
-Session progress tracking (Scheduled, Completed, Not Attended).
-Automated email prompts to upsell additional sessions when students complete a package.

5. Internal Notes & Team Assignments
-Private folders for internal employee-only notes.
-Assign students a support team (e.g., Accountability Coach, Family Support Manager).
-Allow students to schedule meetings with their team members.

6. Affiliate & Referral Program Integration
-Integrate with an external affiliate tracking system (e.g., Push Lap Growth).
-Ensure smooth registration & commission tracking.
-Create forms that direct data into the tracking system without using Google Sheets.

7. Payment & Financial Tracking
-Integrate with Hellum for processing payments (preferred over Stripe).
-Track client payments, outstanding balances, and payment history.

8. Task & Workflow Automation
-Integration with Blue (project management tool) to automatically assign follow-ups.
-Automate task delegation for team members.
-Integrate with Active Pieces (Zapier alternative) for workflow automation.

9. CRM & Email Marketing
-Currently using HubSpot (free version) & DinoSend.
-Explore potential API integrations to improve efficiency without incurring high costs.

10. Hosting & Infrastructure
-Current hosting: SiteGround (expires November 1).
-Evaluate alternatives (e.g., Google servers, Hostinger) to reduce costs.

title: (Desarrollador Front-End) Parte Responsiva Revisar y Optimizar
description:
Descripci√≥n del Proyecto:
Contexto: Tengo una plataforma  de productos e inmuebles que ya est√° desarrollada utilizando Python y MDBootstrap. Sin embargo, necesito realizar algunas mejoras en la parte responsiva para asegurarme de que la plataforma funcione correctamente en todos los dispositivos (m√≥viles, tabletas y escritorios).

Objetivo:
El objetivo es optimizar la interfaz de usuario (UI) y mejorar la experiencia de usuario (UX), garantizando que la plataforma sea totalmente responsiva y f√°cil de usar en cualquier dispositivo. La base del sistema ya est√° hecha, y se necesita revisar la implementaci√≥n actual de la parte front-end para ajustarla donde sea necesario.

Tareas Principales:
Revisar y ajustar el dise√±o responsivo:

Asegurarse de que todas las p√°ginas (inicio, listado de productos/inmuebles, detalles de anuncios, etc.) se adapten correctamente a pantallas de m√≥viles, tabletas y escritorios.
Asegurarse de que todos los elementos de la interfaz, como botones, formularios de b√∫squeda, filtros, tablas, etc., sean f√°cilmente accesibles y visualmente atractivos en dispositivos de diferentes tama√±os.
Optimizaci√≥n de las interacciones:

Revisi√≥n y ajuste de la navegaci√≥n, asegurando que el flujo entre las p√°ginas sea fluido y que el dise√±o no interfiera con la experiencia del usuario.
Optimizaci√≥n de formularios de b√∫squeda y filtros para dispositivos m√≥viles.
Pruebas en dispositivos y tama√±os de pantalla:

Realizar pruebas en diversos dispositivos (m√≥viles, tabletas y escritorios) para garantizar que el sistema sea completamente funcional y visualmente coherente en cada uno.
Ajustar cualquier elemento que no se vea bien o no funcione correctamente en estos dispositivos.
Optimizaci√≥n de im√°genes y recursos:

Si es necesario, optimizar las im√°genes y otros recursos para mejorar el rendimiento de la p√°gina en dispositivos m√≥viles, implementando t√©cnicas como lazy loading o compresi√≥n de im√°genes.
Sugerencias de mejora:

Ofrecer recomendaciones adicionales para mejorar la parte visual y funcional de la plataforma, basadas en buenas pr√°cticas de dise√±o responsivo y UX/UI.
Requisitos:
Experiencia en desarrollo front-end utilizando Bootstrap (preferentemente con MDBootstrap).

Project Description:

title: Three.js / react three fiber Developer ‚Äì 3d medical head
description:
We seek a Three.js specialist to refine the rendering and optimization of a 3D human head. The ideal candidate will ensure realistic visualization, smooth interaction, and efficient performance across desktop and mobile devices.
Key Responsibilities

    Enhance 3D Rendering: Improve the realism of anatomical models using Three.js, optimizing textures and materials.
    Optimize Performance: Implement efficient KTX2 texture compression and Draco 3D model optimization to ensure smooth performance.
    Develop Interactive Features:
        Enable zoom, rotate, and pan functionalities.
        Implement opacity controls for anatomical layers (skin, muscles, vascular structures).
        Create clickable hotspots for anatomical labeling with a two-tier structure:
            General areas (cheeks, nose, jawline).
            Detailed structures (zygomaticus major, nasolabial folds).

        Support customizable model views (e.g., age variations, skin textures).
        Integrate pre-set views for medical procedures (e.g., Botox injection sites).

Tech Stack

    React + React Three Fiber for UI integration
    glTF format for efficient 3D model handling
    KTX2 for texture compression & Draco for model optimization

Preferred Experience

    Strong Three.js expertise with a focus on realistic 3D rendering.
    Experience in 3D model optimization for web applications.
    Knowledge of efficient texture handling (KTX2, compressed textures).
    Familiarity with interactive labeling techniques in Three.js.
    Experience integrating Three.js with React via React Three Fiber.

Application Process

To apply, please submit:

        How would you approach implementing an interactive 3D model viewer using Three.js?

title: Developer Needed for Customizing & Integrating a Sudoku Game
description:
I am looking for a developer to customize an existing open-source Sudoku game and integrate it into a larger puzzle game platform. The game should have three difficulty levels (Easy, Medium, Hard) and include a Daily Challenge mode with a new puzzle each day.

Project Details:

- The game should be sourced from an open-source project (GitHub or similar) and modified to meet the required features.
- It must be fully responsive and optimized for both desktop and mobile users.
- The game should be designed to be easily integrated into an existing gaming platform.
- Monetization will be introduced in phases, starting as an ads-free experience, with subscriptions and ads added later.

Key Features & Requirements:

-Customization of an existing Sudoku game
-Three difficulty levels (Easy, Medium, Hard)
-Daily Challenge mode with unique puzzles each day
-Smooth and user-friendly gameplay across all devices
-UI improvements to match the design of the platform
-Performance optimization for fast loading times
-Future support for ads and subscription-based monetization

What I Need From You:

-A quote per feature to assess costs accurately.

-Experience with HTML5/JavaScript-based web games and modifying existing game logic.
-Understanding of game monetization strategies (optional but preferred).

title: Expert Guide for Setting Up a Vue.js SPA with Tailwind CSS & ERPNext Integration
description:
I am seeking an experienced developer or consultant to provide hands-on guidance in setting up an initial development environment for a Vue.js Single Page Application (SPA) using Tailwind CSS in Visual Studio Code. This project involves integrating the SPA with an ERPNext backend. The authentication will be handled via ERPNext, with user data provided through a context script, and all communication with the backend will occur through the ERPNext REST API.

**Responsibilities:**  
- **Development Setup:**  
  - Assist with the initial configuration of a Vue.js SPA in Visual Studio Code.  
  - Guide the integration of Tailwind CSS into the project.

- **Backend Integration:**  
  - Explain the process of integrating ERPNext as the backend.  
  - Set up ERPNext authentication and ensure user data is passed correctly via a context script.
  - Demonstrate how to configure and use the ERPNext REST API for communication.

- **Documentation & Best Practices:**  
  - Provide clear, step-by-step documentation and guidance on the setup process.  
  - Share best practices for development, debugging, and security.

**Required Skills:**  
- Proven expertise in Vue.js and building SPAs.  
- Experience with Tailwind CSS integration.  
- Solid understanding of ERPNext, including its REST API and authentication mechanisms.  
- Proficiency with Visual Studio Code.  
- Excellent communication skills in English, with the ability to clearly explain technical concepts.

**Preferred Qualifications:**  
- Prior experience setting up similar integrations or projects.  
- Familiarity with context scripts and user data management in web applications.  
- Knowledge of best practices for secure API communication and SPA architecture.

**Project Timeline:**  
The initial setup guidance is expected to be completed within a mutually agreed timeframe, with the possibility of follow-up consultations if needed.

**How to Apply:**  
Please submit your proposal detailing your relevant experience with Vue.js, Tailwind CSS, ERPNext, and Visual Studio Code. Include any examples or references from similar projects and a brief outline of your approach to this setup. Looking forward to collaborating with you to get this project off the ground!

title: Need a Chrome Plugin to Auto-fill Web Forms Using AI
description:
I am looking for a talented developer to create a Chrome extension that can automatically complete any web form using data from an input file (like a structured document). The plugin should be able to intelligently extract information from the input file and fill out fields on any website‚Äôs form, regardless of its structure or design.

Requirements:

Input: The plugin should accept an input file (e.g., a resume or structured document) that contains relevant details like name, email, phone number, address, skills, work experience, etc.

AI Integration: The plugin should intelligently scan the document and extract pertinent information. Using AI-powered algorithms, it will then map the extracted details to the appropriate fields in the form (e.g., name, contact details, qualifications).

Cross-Site Functionality: It must be able to handle any form on any website. Whether it's a simple contact form or a detailed job application, the plugin should be flexible and efficient.

Auto-fill Capability: Once the data is extracted from the input file, it should auto-fill the corresponding fields on web forms, making the process seamless for the user.

User Interface: The plugin should be easy to use, with a simple interface where users can upload their input file and initiate the auto-fill process.

Compatibility: Ensure the plugin works with the latest version of Google Chrome and complies with Chrome‚Äôs extension guidelines.

Preferred Skills:

Experience in Chrome extension development.
Strong knowledge of AI/ML for document parsing and data extraction.
Familiarity with web form structures and auto-filling techniques.
Experience with JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.
Knowledge of web scraping and handling dynamic web content.
Bonus Skills:

Experience with NLP (Natural Language Processing) to improve document understanding.
Prior work with resume parsing or similar document-to-form automation.

To Apply, please provide:

Your relevant experience in building Chrome extensions or web automation tools.
Examples of similar projects you‚Äôve worked on (if any).
Your approach to how the AI will extract and map data from the input file to the web form fields.

title: Payment process integration into a nextjs application
description:
Hi,

I have built on Nextjs a platform for actuaries (a niche domain in insurance) and insurance companies,  where actuaries can find missions and insurance companies can find actuaries.
I am now in the phase of implementing the payment process.
Although I already thought about some features like
- the actuary has a interface where he can enter his number of days worked.
- the actuary cannot change his worked day passed a certain time.
- the employer can see how many days the freelancer worked
- the employer can pay the actuary at a fixed frequency, either 2 or 4 weeks (agreed by both the actuary and the employer)
- the employer must send to us some part of the money beforehand. Our platform will act as an escrow payment. This is to ensure trust and reliability to our freelancers. But also for employers who don't pay directly the freelancer even before the mission.
- actuary and employer can dispute and claim refunds

I would like this feature to be built by someone who already implemented this kind of timesheet + payment process as I might have forgotten important things (security issues, features to ensure a smooth ux, etc.)

I'll hire someone only and only if he previously had similar experience and can demonstrate it showing us the website, or his github or anything else.

title: Developer Needed for Cost-Effective Boat Sales Display Program
description:
We are seeking a talented developer to create a program to display boats for sale, modeled after The Jet Business‚Äôs approach but optimized for lower cost. The solution should offer two options: one with a dedicated app and one without, both controllable via HDMI from a laptop. The program must include robust search functionality to filter boats and RHIBs based on material, size, price, engine HP, and maximum people capacity.

Key Requirements:

Development Options:
Option 1: Dedicated App - Build a custom mobile app (e.g., for iPad or Android) to search and display boats.

Option 2: Web-Based Solution - Develop a responsive
web application accessible via a browser, no app required.

HDMI Control: The program must be controllable from a laptop connected to a display via HDMI (e.g., through screen mirroring for the app or direct browser output for the web solution).

Functionality:

Implement a search feature to filter boats and RHIBs by:
Material (e.g., fibreglass, aluminium)
Size (e.g., length in feet or meters)
Price (e.g., range in USD)
Engine HP (e.g., horsepower range)
Max People (e.g., passenger capacity)

- Experience in mobile app development (e.g., Swift, Kotlin, Flutter) and/or web development (e.g., React, Angular, HTML/CSS/JavaScript).
- Proficiency in backend development and database management (e.g., MySQL, MongoDB).
- Familiarity with API integration for data retrieval.
- Understanding of HDMI connectivity and display control from a laptop.

Deliverables:

A fully functional program (either a dedicated app or web application) for searching and displaying boats.
A backend database to store and manage boat data.
Clear setup instructions and documentation for HDMI control and usage.


Deadline: [Please specify your deadline, e.g., 4-6 weeks from project start]

title: Responsive Website Development - 6 Pages
description:
Overview

We are seeking a skilled web designer & developer to create a responsive website consisting of 6 pages. The site should be visually appealing and function seamlessly across all devices. Ideally, you should have experience in front-end development, be proficient in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and understand UX/UI principles. The project requires attention to detail and the ability to work collaboratively to meet our vision and requirements.

Embark Physio is a physiotherapy clinic dedicated to high-quality, patient-centered care. We need a professional, modern, and user-friendly website to showcase our services, provide key information, and facilitate online bookings.

Scope of Work
A 6-page website with the following:

Home ‚Äì Introduction, mission statement, hero image, call-to-action (book an appointment).

Training on how to update content.

IMPORTANT** PLEASE Let us know your preferred platform, timeline, and estimated cost or else you will not be considered.

title: MudBlazor Developer for Small Enhancements in Our Application
description:
We are looking for a skilled MudBlazor developer to assist with small but impactful improvements in our application. The tasks involve working with a database-driven document system, UI enhancements, and document generation in C#.

Tasks:

1. Dynamic File Name Replacement:
We have a database table that stores document file names in the format: ((firstName_lastName))_foo1.pdf
((CompanyName))_foo2.pdf

When a user interacts with a document, we need to replace the information inside brackets with the actual user's details.

Example: If the user is John Doe, the file should be renamed to John_Doe_foo1.pdf.


2. Enhancing the Document Dialog:
We display a list of documents related to an application in a dialog, pulling the data from the database.

We want to add a button that allows users to attach additional documents that were not originally retrieved from the database.


3. Generating Tables in DOCX Files:
We use DOCX template files that are edited dynamically in code.

We need to generate a table within these documents to display a list of services provided to a customer, their prices, and the total amount (similar to a receipt).

All necessary data is stored in a database table.

Requirements:
Experience with MudBlazor and Blazor applications.

Strong knowledge of C# and Entity Framework (or any ORM for database interactions).

Experience working with file handling in .NET (renaming, generating, and modifying documents).

Familiarity with document generation in .NET, particularly working with DOCX templates (e.g., using OpenXML, DocX, or similar libraries).


Additional Information:
This is a short-term project, but we may have additional tasks in the future.

title: Bubble / Thunkable App Development for Investor Tracking App
description:
We are seeking a skilled Bubble developer to rapidly create an application that tracks investor trades utilizing the SEC's EDGAR API, as well as News and RSS feeds.

The app should be built in Bubble, and have a highly intuitive user-friendly interface. It will be organized in three main tabs:

- Investors: an overview with cards view showing the profiles of key investors, which when clicked will provide a detailed view of the profile and their trading history. Users arer able to add investor to their watchlist from both overview and detail views.
- Watchlist Trades: shows the most recent trades by the investors added to the user's watchlist, pulled in / synchronized via the SEC's EDGAR API, and potentially other sources like Alpha Vantage or IEX Cloud for real-time stock data.
- Newsfeed (lower priority) displays real-time news from Google Alerts and RSS feeds, for the investors on the user's watchlist.
- Notifications: where user can manage notification settings. The platform should be able to send notifications based on the Watchlist Trades and Newsfeed via email using Zapier + Twilio (or similar), and using OneSignal or Firebase Cloud Messaging (FCM) or similar for push notifications.

Once the prototype is developed on Bubble, we will create a Mobile App by converting the Bubble app, using a tool like Thunkable or Adalo.

There are a few page templates that we need you to design to display this data and it must be embedded in the HTML in the custom CMS.

https://ibl.sportzonestaging.com/leaders?leagueid=111&seasonid=33911

Our website where we want to display the similar data displayed in the Statistics, Box Score, fields. https://www.theibl.ca

title: [Long term] DeFi Backend Engineer

Who we are

Symmio is redefining onchain derivatives, bringing the liquidity and trading experience of top centralized exchanges like Binance and Bybit to a fully decentralized environment‚Äîwhere users always retain control of their funds. As a pioneer in onchain bilateral OTC since 2021, Symmio powers a growing ecosystem of seven distribution partners, facilitating over $11 billion in trading volume with more than $140 million in available open interest capacity. With options and meme derivatives launching later this year, Symmio is at the forefront of the next evolutions in decentralized finance.

This is pivotal for Symmio's integration of FIX protocols, ETFs, stocks, private onchain fund management, micro-derivatives, interest rate derivatives (IRDs), and, eventually, cross-border settlement of real-world assets (RWAs).

title: Working with APIs in FlutterFlow ‚Äì Facing Some Issues & Looking for Help!
description:
Hey everyone! üëã I‚Äôve been working on integrating APIs into my app using FlutterFlow, and I‚Äôve hit a bit of a roadblock. üôÉ

The Situation:

I‚Äôm using FlutterFlow to connect my app with an API (using API Flow). The setup is mostly done‚ÄîI‚Äôve connected the API, and it seems to be communicating fine. But here‚Äôs the issue:

The Problem:

While the API call is successfully triggered, the data isn‚Äôt showing up on the UI as expected. ü§î
I‚Äôve confirmed the API connection and set up the data flow, but FlutterFlow‚Äôs UI doesn‚Äôt seem to fetch or display the data correctly.

What I‚Äôve Tried:
1. Checked API connection settings: API key and URL seem fine.
2. Used dynamic data sources in FlutterFlow to bind API data to the UI.

What‚Äôs Next:

I‚Äôm thinking of bringing in a FlutterFlow expert to help me with:
1. Fixing the data-binding issue between the API response and the UI.
2. Ensuring the API call is properly mapped to the fields that need to display the data.
3. Debugging any potential CORS or data handling problems that might be causing the issue.

Has anyone dealt with this before? Any tips or suggestions? Would love to hear how you resolved similar issues!

Thanks in advance for any help! üôè Let‚Äôs keep pushing to build amazing apps with FlutterFlow! üí•

title: Build a Live Performance Dashboard for TradingView Strategies with Trading Bot Integration
description:
I'm in need of a developer or company to create a live performance tracking dashboard that will track the performance of my companies tradingview strategies as well as have an automation option. We provide custom strategies for our users, and using TradingViews built in Strategy Backtester metrics, we want a dashboard that tracks that info straight to the dashboard interface. This dashboard would be giving real time trade performance information for every strategy, and there would be a ranking leaderboard for the most profitable strategies the last 7 days, 30 days, and 90 days. Besides the main dashboard itself, each strategy would need to be able to be clicked on to view more detailed strategy performance of each strategy. A user would then have the option to copy that strategy and automate it in a simple copy bot format.

Key requirements:

- We do not know how to integrate the backtest and live forward test performance metrics from TradingView, whether that be through API, webhooks, or web scraping - but we would want a developer that could figure that out.
- The user interface should provide a comprehensive overview of the performance metrics. A ranking leaderboard of the most profitable strategies for different time periods (7 days, 30 days, 90 days)
- Experience with TradingView and its API, Web Scraping, Webhooks.
- Proven track record in developing trading bots.
- Familiarity with the mentioned trading platforms.
- Strong programming skills, preferably in Python or JavaScript.
- Proficiency in web development with experience in creating interactive dashboards.
- A strong understanding of data visualization techniques.
- Prior experience working with TradingView or similar trading platforms is required.


PHASE 1 WOULD INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING:

- Strategy Performance Dashboard with Ranking Leaderboard of Strategies based on net profit % during certain time periods.
- Detailed Performance Page for each individual strategy from the dashboard.
- Admin Panel to add/edit/or remove TradingView strategies.
- Admin Panel to add/edit/ or remove users to use the dashboard platform.
- User Favorites page where users can view the strategies they have favorited from the dashboard. (only if we don't do phase 2)

TradingView Integrations
‚Ä¢ Connect to TradingView backtesting data through API, webhooks, web scraping or however possible. (for live data, strategy tracking) Would need the developer to find the best solution for this.

PHASE 2 WOULD INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING:

Incorporating a Trading Bot (Copy Bot) into the strategy performance tracking dashboard.
Users would be able to select a strategy to automate and copy the signals from.
Would want the following exchanges broker included - Binance, Bybit, Coinbase, Robinhood, Tradovate, Tradestation, MetaTrader, Interactive Brokers.

- Creating the bot dashboard (simple, easy to use system for users)
- Connecting Exchanges/Brokers panel.
- Trade History panel
- User Live Trade Portfolio panel.

We were considering doing phase 1 first and then phase 2, but depending on cost and timeline of the project, we may decide to go ahead and do both 1 and 2 now.

Looking for a developer/team that we can rely on to work with for a very long time.

Will send a video that goes more in depth.
skills: ['C#', 'Automation', 'API', 'TypeScript', 'Scripting', 'Python', 'JavaScript']

title: Full-Stack UI Developer (Fixed - Confidential Project)
description:
We are looking for an experienced Full-Stack UI Developer to build a secure, data-driven web application for a confidential proof of concept (PoC) project. This role involves developing an interactive dashboard with advanced data visualization, role-based access controls, and secure data handling techniques.

The ideal candidate should have expertise in React, Python (Flask/FastAPI), PostgreSQL, and AWS, along with experience in data security, anonymization (MD5/SHA1 hashing), and API integration.
Key Responsibilities:

    Develop a React-based UI with data visualization (charts, heatmaps, drill-down analytics).
    Build a secure backend using Python (Flask/FastAPI) and PostgreSQL.
    Implement data anonymization (MD5/SHA1 hashing) and role-based access control (RBAC).
    Deploy applications securely in AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda, RDS).
    Ensure compliance with best practices for handling sensitive data.

Required Skills & Experience:

‚úî Front-End: React.js, data visualization (D3.js, Chart.js, Recharts).
‚úî Back-End: Python (Flask/FastAPI), PostgreSQL, REST API integration.
‚úî Security: MD5/SHA1 hashing, encryption, role-based access control (RBAC).
‚úî Cloud & DevOps: AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda, RDS), CI/CD, Docker.
Bonus Skills (Nice-to-Have):

‚≠ê Experience with blockchain security, Power BI, fraud detection systems.
Project Details:

    Duration: 3-4 months (remote, flexible hours).
    Deliverables: Secure interactive dashboard, fraud investigation UI, anonymization framework.

How to Apply

To confirm you've read this post, start your application with:
"I am ready to build a secure and interactive UI."

In your cover letter, briefly describe how you have used MD5/SHA1 hashing for data anonymization in a previous project or how you would implement it.

For more details please see the attached document

title: SaaS Development for Building Zoning and Code Compliance Information
description:
Backend / Full-Stack Developer for AI-Powered Zoning & Compliance Platform

We are re building an innovative search platform that helps architects and developers instantly access zoning laws, building codes, and compliance regulations. Our goal is to eliminate manual research and provide location-specific regulatory insights through a smart, AI-driven SaaS platform.

Who We are Looking For
We need an experienced backend or full-stack developer with a strong data-processing mindset to help build the platform‚Äôs core infrastructure. This role involves handling large volumes of regulatory data, ensuring accurate information retrieval, and integrating AI-driven text output component.

Key Responsibilities
Dynamic Data Display ‚Äì Implement a rule-based system that hides or displays zoning details based on address-specific factors (e.g., earthquake regulations only for seismic zones, coastal rules only for coastal areas).
Data Aggregation & Processing ‚Äì Retrieve large datasets from various sources (APIs, PDFs) and process them into structured, searchable data.
AI-Powered output ‚Äì compile specific data tailored to specific addresses.
Contextual Data Mapping ‚Äì Identify and categorize address-specific vs. general regulations (e.g., lot size, floor area ratio vs. regional zoning rules).
GIS & Spatial Data Handling ‚Äì Work with GIS data sources and mapping tools to provide location-based insights.
Scalability & Performance ‚Äì Ensure fast and reliable data retrieval for high-volume queries.

Ideal Skills & Experience:
Backend development expertise (Python, Node.js, etc.).
Experience with databases (PostgreSQL, MongoDB, or equivalent).
Strong API integration skills (RESTful APIs, web scraping).
AI/NLP experience (RAG models, summarization, embeddings) is a huge plus.
Understanding of zoning regulations, parcel data, and hazard zones (seismic, flood, coastal) is a plus but not mandatory.
GIS experience (handling spatial data and maps) is beneficial.
Ability to work full-time on this project is preferred.

Why Join Us?
Work on a cutting-edge AI-driven platform that transforms the architecture industry.
A small, dynamic team where your work directly impacts the product.
If you're passionate about AI, data processing, and solving real-world challenges, we‚Äôd love to hear from you!

title: Audi and Source Code Improvement
description:
I would like to recruit an expert web development provider with a specialization in the Symfony framework. The main mission will be to assess the existing source code, the development methods used, the overall performance of the application, and the quality of the code. The objective is to secure vulnerabilities and security flaws, to respect good Symfony coding practices and techniques, and to prevent potential bugs.

Missions and Responsibilities
1- Source Code Audit

* Analyze the existing source code to identify vulnerabilities and security flaws.

* Evaluate the quality of the code in terms of readability, maintainability, and compliance with Symfony coding standards.

* Identify possible bad development practices.

2- Performance Optimization

* Evaluate the overall performance of the application.

* Propose solutions to optimize loading times, SQL queries, and the use of server resources.

* Unit and functional testing integration

3- Security

* Identify and fix security vulnerabilities (SQL injections, XSS, CSRF, etc.).

* Implement additional security mechanisms if necessary.

* Ensure compliance with the latest security standards.

4- Compliance with Symfony Best Practices

* Check that the code complies with Symfony best practices and coding conventions.

* Suggest improvements to align the code with the latest versions of Symfony.

5- Bug Prevention

* Identify risk areas that could lead to bugs.

* Implement unit and functional tests to prevent regressions.

6- Documentation

* Write a detailed report of the analyses performed, the problems identified, and the proposed solutions.

* Provide technical documentation for the corrections and optimizations made.

7- Required Profile
- Technical Skills

* Advanced mastery of the Symfony 6 framework

* Proven experience in code auditing and performance optimization.

- In-depth knowledge of good security practices in web development.

* Experience in setting up unit and functional tests.

* Knowledge of code and performance analysis tools

8- Experience

* Minimum 7 years of experience in web development with Symfony.

* Experience in auditing and redesigning existing projects.

* Portfolio of similar projects successfully completed.

9- Soft Skills

* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.

* Excellent communication, ability to explain technical concepts to non-technical people.

* Autonomy and rigor in work.

10- Expected Deliverables
- Audit Report

* Complete diagnosis of source code, performance, and security.

* List of identified vulnerabilities and recommendations to correct them.

- Optimized and Secured Code

* Corrected and optimized version of the source code.

* Implementation of unit and functional tests.

- Technical Documentation

* Detailed documentation of the modifications made.

11- Collaboration Terms
* Duration of the Mission: 15 days max

* Workplace: Teleworking possible, with regular videoconference meetings.

* The code will not be made available to you, I will give you access to a virtual machine allowing you to work quietly
skills: ['Code Audit', 'WordPress', 'Web Development', 'MySQL', 'SQL', 'PHP', 'HTML', 'Symfony', 'Web Design', 'Laravel', 'Web Application', 'JavaScript']

title: Web Automation Engineer for Multi-Platform Data Monitoring System
description:
Project Overview:
We're developing a specialized data monitoring system that needs to regularly access and extract information from multiple third-party web platforms. The system will need to authenticate into various secure portals, navigate to specific areas, extract status information, and compile it into consolidated reports.

Technical Requirements:

Core Functionality:
Develop a web automation system that can access 5-7 different secure web portals
Create a process to extract specific status information from standardized locations within each portal
Compile extracted data into consolidated reports for easy review
Implement a user-friendly interface to initiate scans, view historical reports, and manage credentials

Technical Challenges:
Each target platform has a unique structure, login process, and data presentation format
The system must be resilient to changes in the target platforms' layouts and structures
Secure storage and handling of login credentials for multiple platforms
Building a system that can efficiently process multiple platforms within a reasonable timeframe

Technology Stack:
Containerized architecture for deployment (Docker)
Browser automation framework (Playwright/Puppeteer)
Web application for user interaction and reporting
Secure credential management system

Deliverables:
A complete MVP system supporting 5-7 target platforms
Admin interface for managing credentials and viewing reports
Documentation for maintaining and extending the system
Training on system operation and maintenance

Timeline
We're looking to complete an MVP within 1-3 months.

Ideal Candidate Skills
Strong experience with web automation and scraping complex authenticated portals
Experience building resilient systems that can handle target website changes
Knowledge of secure credential management best practices
Experience with containerization and cloud deployment
Strong problem-solving skills and adaptability

Project Details

Please include in your proposal:

Estimated timeline for completion
Pricing structure (fixed price or hourly rate)
Your approach to handling the unique challenges of this project
Examples of similar work you've done with complex web automation

We're looking for a developer who can work independently but communicate regularly about progress and challenges. The right candidate will demonstrate understanding of both the technical aspects and the security considerations of this type of system.

title: AI Mobile App for Restaurant Inventory
description:
We are seeking a skilled developer to build a cutting-edge AI-powered inventory management application tailored for the restaurant industry. The ideal candidate will design and develop an intuitive app that streamlines inventory taking, automates supply ordering recommendations, and provides actionable insights using AI/AR technology. This project is ideal for someone passionate about leveraging artificial intelligence to solve real-world problems in the hospitality sector.

Key Responsibilities:

Collaborate with stakeholders to understand restaurant inventory needs and business requirements
Design and develop a user-friendly mobile/web application that integrates AI for taking inventory via phone camera and AI/ML, demand forecasting, waste reduction, and optimized ordering
Implement features including real-time inventory tracking, low-stock alerts, automated purchase order generation, and detailed analytics dashboards
Integrate with existing restaurant management systems and third-party APIs
Ensure data security, scalability, and smooth performance
Conduct testing and troubleshooting to ensure robust and error-free application performance
Provide ongoing maintenance and support after launch
Required Skills and Experience:

Proven experience in mobile and/or web app development
Strong proficiency in programming languages such as JavaScript, Python, or similar
Experience with AI/ML frameworks and tools (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch, scikit-learn)
Familiarity with database design, cloud services, and API integrations
Ability to write clean, maintainable code and implement effective version control practices
Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail
Strong communication skills and ability to work independently or as part of a team

Preferred Qualifications:

Prior experience working on inventory or restaurant management systems
Knowledge of UX/UI design principles
Experience with agile methodologies and project management tools
A portfolio demonstrating previous app development projects, particularly those involving AI or machine learning
Project Duration:
This is a contract-based project with potential for long-term collaboration. The initial phase includes development and testing, with a timeline to be discussed during the interview process.

How to Apply:
Please submit your proposal detailing your relevant experience, technical expertise, and examples of similar projects you have completed. Include a brief outline of your approach for developing the Restaurant AI Inventory App and any initial thoughts on technology stack and architecture. We look forward to hearing from you!

If you have any questions about the project, feel free to reach out. Thank you for your interest in helping us revolutionize restaurant inventory management with AI.

title: React & JSON Full Stack Developer for Responsive SaaS Platform
description:
SeniorThrive is a bold SaaS platform designed to empower older adults to thrive safely and independently at home. We're seeking an experienced React & JSON developer to collaborate directly with our founder and product lead to bring our vision to life. Our platform is primarily built on Supabase (Postgres) and leverages Google Cloud Platform for scalability, automation, and advanced AI capabilities, including Vision AI (Gemini).

Your Role:

You‚Äôll play a pivotal role in refining, extending, and packaging our existing React-based frontend and JSON-driven backend integrations for launch. Your contributions will enhance the intuitive, responsive user experience tailored for older adults, families, and caregivers.

Key Responsibilities:

Collaborate in real-time (8 AM to 2 PM Los Angeles Time) with the product lead and founder.

Refine and optimize existing React components and JSON integrations (~80% of core development completed).

Manage backend interactions, leveraging Supabase (Postgres) and Google Cloud Platform for automation, scalability, and load balancing.

Implement and manage Auth0 authentication, including user management, social logins, and user metadata verification.

Integrate and optimize Google Vision AI for advanced home safety scans and personalized user recommendations.

Ensure optimal performance, scalability, and security of the SaaS platform.

Troubleshoot and resolve technical challenges to deliver a seamless user experience.

Requirements:

Proven expertise in React and JSON development.

Experience with backend services like Supabase (Postgres) in SaaS contexts.

Familiarity with Auth0 authentication, including social login integration.

Hands-on experience with Google Cloud Platform and Vision AI.

Strong collaborative skills and clear communication, with availability during specified core hours (8 AM to 2 PM Los Angeles Time).

Important Note:

We're looking for an individual developer who can work closely and directly with our small, dedicated team during core hours.

Please watch this brief video outlining our vision and current technical needs: https://www.loom.com/share/ce65f2d66a08436ea6529175793ae831?sid=1ecb117b-9ccf-44dd-bcd1-31d87e0472f4

Additionally, we'd appreciate your thoughtful responses to these questions:

Describe a React-based project where you refined existing code for a SaaS platform. What challenges did you encounter, and how did you overcome them?

Detail your experience with Supabase or similar backend systems in SaaS contexts.

How would you effectively integrate React components with JSON files to deliver responsive SaaS user experiences?

Share specific examples of responsive SaaS platforms you've developed, highlighting the integration of backend services like Supabase, Auth0, and Google Vision AI.

Join SeniorThrive and leverage your development skills to revolutionize aging at home through innovative, empowering technology solutions.

title: Senior Django Developer with Domain-Driven Design Experience
description:
Project description:
We're building Billify, a cash flow management platform for SMEs that centralizes financial data across multiple systems. We need an experienced Django developer with strong Domain-Driven Design skills to review and contribute to our invoice processing system.

About Billify:
Billify helps SMEs get real-time visibility into their cash position by integrating with accounting software (Yuki, Billit, Exact) and banking systems (Ponto). Our application uses a layered architecture following DDD principles, with a Django backend and React frontend.

Current challenge:
We've implemented invoice upload and processing functionality that extracts data from documents, stores files, and maintains invoice records. We require a thorough code review of our most recent PR, which implements our data stored in a relational database.

Required skills and experience:
‚Äî Multiple years of Django development experience
‚Äî Strong understanding of Domain-Driven Design and layered architecture
‚Äî Experience implementing clean interfaces between domain, application, and infrastructure layers
‚Äî Proficiency with PostgreSQL and Django ORM
‚Äî Experience with document processing (PDF parsing, metadata extraction)
‚Äî Understanding of file storage abstractions in web applications
‚Äî Ability to work within an established architecture while maintaining separation of concerns
‚Äî Excellent code review skills with attention to potential performance issues and maintainability

title: Python & Solana Blockchain Developer (Pair Programming)
description:
Job Overview:
Looking for an experienced Python & Solana blockchain developer to collaborate in a pair programming setup. The focus is on debugging, optimizing, and improving an existing Solana trading bot that monitors and copies trades from a target wallet across multiple decentralized exchanges (DEXs).

Main Purpose:
The bot monitors a specific wallet address (the ‚Äúfollowing wallet‚Äù) and automatically replicates its trades on various Solana DEXs, with a focus on Raydium and Pump.fun transactions.

Key functionalities include:
Trade Monitoring & Copy Trading ‚Äì Detects and mirrors trades from a target wallet on Raydium, Pump.fun, Meteora, Jupiter, Moonshot, and Orca.
Transaction Optimization ‚Äì Adjusts compute unit limits, priority fees, and supports Jito MEV bundles for faster execution.
Risk Management ‚Äì Includes liquidity checks, honeypot detection, slippage protection, and trading hour restrictions.
Network Monitoring & Position Tracking ‚Äì Adapts to Solana network conditions and tracks token balances/trade history.

Responsibilities:
Work in pair programming, actively coding, debugging, and optimizing the bot.
Troubleshoot Solana blockchain development challenges using Python.
Implement best practices for performance, reliability, and execution efficiency.
Collaborate in real-time via screen sharing to tackle coding roadblocks.

Requirements:
Strong Python and Solana blockchain experience.
Hands-on debugging and troubleshooting skills.
Ability to work in a pair programming environment.
Availability for 2-4 hours per session (daily or every other day).
Proficient English communication for effective collaboration.

Preferred:
Previous experience in pair programming or collaborative development.

Project & Payment:
This is an ongoing, flexible role. Please provide your hourly rate and availability.

title: Flask Developer Needed to Fix OAuth Session Persistence Issue
description:
I‚Äôm building a web app using Flask (backend) and React (frontend) that allows users to upload syllabi, extract events, and sync them with Google/Outlook Calendars.

I‚Äôm facing an issue with Flask session persistence after the OAuth login flow with Google. When the user logs in and is redirected back to my site, a new session is created, causing the app to lose stored credentials.

Issue Details:
- The Flask app is storing Google OAuth credentials in the session (session["google_credentials"]).
- After the OAuth login redirect (/google/callback), the session is lost and a new session file is created in the flask_session folder.
- Debugging confirms:
   - Cookies are enabled and being set in the browser.
   - Session data exists before redirect but disappears after.
session.keys() only shows ["_permanent"] after the redirect.
- I have tried setting:
   - SESSION_COOKIE_SAMESITE = "None"
   - SESSION_COOKIE_SECURE = True
   - SESSION_TYPE = "filesystem"
- Issue persists despite these fixes.

Project Details:
- Backend: Flask (Python)
- Frontend: React (JavaScript)
- Auth Flow: Google OAuth 2.0

title: Product Engineer for AI-Driven Payroll & Analytics Platform
description:
Williams Stanley ‚Äì an accounting firm specializing in hospitality and restaurant clients ‚Äì is building a cutting-edge AI-driven analytics platform, alongside a cutting edge Payroll solution to transform how hospitality businesses manage their businesses and thier payroll. We‚Äôre looking for a Product Engineer who combines technical engineering expertise with product strategy savvy. In this role, you will drive the platform‚Äôs development end-to-end: from defining the product vision to rolling up your sleeves with the engineering team to build innovative features. If you‚Äôre excited about shaping a product that leverages AI to deliver real impact for customers, this role offers the perfect blend of product management and hands-on engineering in a remote-friendly, growth-oriented environment.

Key Role Highlights

‚Ä¢ Mid-Level with Growth: A mid-level position with significant ownership and opportunities for leadership as our team and platform grow.

‚Ä¢ Remote-Friendly: Work from anywhere. We foster a flexible and collaborative remote work culture.

‚Ä¢ Platform Engineering Focus: Be at the core of developing a scalable SaaS analytics platform, ensuring it‚Äôs robust and customer-centric in solving real hospitality payroll challenges.

‚Ä¢ Blend of Product & Tech: Balance product strategy with hands-on engineering. You‚Äôll influence what we build (the roadmap and features) and how we build it (technical design and implementation).

‚Ä¢ Innovative Impact: Shape a first-of-its-kind AI solution in reporting & payroll fintech, driving innovation in an industry ready for tech disruption. Your work will directly help restaurant and hotel clients save time, reduce errors, and gain valuable insights.
Responsibilities

‚Ä¢ Product Strategy & Roadmap: Define and execute the product strategy for the payroll & the analytics platform. Work closely with engineering, design, and business stakeholders to prioritize features and align the roadmap with customer needs and company goals.

‚Ä¢ Customer Requirements: Engage with hospitality clients and internal stakeholders to understand user pain points. Translate customer needs into clear technical requirements and user stories that guide our development efforts.

‚Ä¢ Hands-on Development: Collaborate with the engineering team to design, develop, test, and refine AI-driven payroll & analytics features. Expect to get involved in coding/prototyping as well as code reviews to ensure high-quality delivery.

‚Ä¢ Integration & Workflow: Ensure seamless integration of our platform with existing payroll systems and hospitality industry workflows (e.g. POS systems, scheduling software). Design solutions that fit into the day-to-day operations of restaurants and hotels without hassle.

‚Ä¢ Performance & Security: Continuously optimize the platform‚Äôs performance, scalability, and security.  Monitor analytics and work with the team to quickly squash bugs, improve response times, and uphold data security best practices for sensitive payroll information.

‚Ä¢ User Feedback & Iteration: Gather feedback through user testing, beta programs, and client interactions. Analyze usage data and feedback to iterate on improvements, enhancing user experience and value with each release.
