title: Custom Web App Migration to CMS
description:
Web Developer Needed for Web App Migration & Audio Player Enhancements

We‚Äôre looking for an experienced web developer to help with a major update to our custom-coded web app. This project involves three key objectives:

1. Web App Migration & CMS Integration
- We need to separate the web app portion from the marketing pages (home page, blog, etc.) while keeping everything on the same domain.
- The web app is currently hosted on the root domain, and we need a solution that allows us to integrate a CMS (like WordPress, Webflow, or another recommended option) for managing marketing content without breaking existing user-generated links.
- URL structure and redirects must be carefully planned to maintain functionality and SEO integrity.

2. Audio Player Engine Optimization
- Our web app includes a custom audio player, but it needs performance improvements to ensure smoother playback and better responsiveness.
- Optimization should address any lag, buffering, or playback inconsistencies across devices and browsers.

3. Enhanced Player Customization Options
We want to introduce additional customization features for the audio player, including (but not limited to):
- Custom branding options (fonts and layout adjustments)

Ideal Candidate
- Strong experience in custom web development, including frontend and backend work.
- Expertise in web app migrations and domain management without breaking existing user-generated URLs.
- Proficiency in React, Ruby on Rails, and AWS (please specify your experience).
- Experience with audio streaming optimization is a big plus.
- Knowledge of CMS integration (WordPress, Webflow, or similar) and how to manage content separately from a web app.
- Strong communication skills and the ability to provide clear recommendations for implementation.

Next Steps

If you‚Äôre interested, please send:
- A brief overview of your experience related to the points above.
- Examples of past work, especially involving web app migrations or audio player development.
- Your proposed approach for handling the migration without disrupting existing links.

Looking forward to working with someone who can help us take our platform to the next level!

title: Website Developer (Shopify Focus)
description:
**Job Posting: Shopify Frontend & Backend Developer (E-commerce Optimization)**  
**Location:** Remote  
**Type:** Contractual with Monthly Retainer  
**Hours:** 2 hours/month for routine updates and maintenance, with additional hours as needed for major updates or optimizations.  
**Compensation:** Competitive hourly rate, to be discussed.  

**About Otherworlds Inc.:**  
Otherworlds Inc. is a creative studio pioneering immersive storytelling in fantasy, sci-fi, and cosmic horror. Our work spans video games, comics, novels, and merchandise, all designed to engage audiences in rich, generational narratives. As we expand our digital marketplace, we need an experienced **Shopify Developer** who can optimize and enhance our online storefront without relying on excessive plugins.  

**Position Overview:**  
We‚Äôre looking for a **Shopify Developer** with deep expertise in both **frontend and backend coding** to refine and maintain our Shopify-based e-commerce store. The ideal candidate understands Shopify‚Äôs native Liquid code, can write custom scripts, optimize performance, and implement custom functionalities **without breaking site stability**.  

**Key Responsibilities:**  
- **Custom Shopify Development:** Write clean, efficient code in **Liquid, JavaScript, and CSS** to enhance Shopify‚Äôs native functionality.  
- **Theme Customization & Performance Optimization:** Modify themes and templates to improve UX/UI while ensuring fast load times and mobile responsiveness.  
- **Plugin Reduction & Optimization:** Remove unnecessary third-party apps by replacing them with **custom-coded solutions** to enhance site efficiency.  
- **Backend Development:** Optimize **Shopify's API, custom scripts, and database structures** to improve site performance and scalability.  
- **Checkout & Cart Enhancements:** Customize Shopify‚Äôs checkout process (within Shopify Plus limitations) to streamline user experience.  
- **SEO & Speed Optimization:** Implement best practices for Shopify SEO and ensure the site loads efficiently.  
- **Security & Maintenance:** Monitor site performance, fix bugs, and implement security patches without disrupting operations.  

**Qualifications:**  
- **Extensive Shopify Experience:** Proven track record working with Shopify‚Äôs backend (Liquid) and frontend (HTML, CSS, JavaScript).  
- **Coding Proficiency:** Strong understanding of Shopify's **Liquid, JSON, JavaScript (Vanilla & jQuery), HTML, and CSS/SASS**.  
- **API Integration Skills:** Experience with Shopify API and third-party integrations.  
- **Performance Optimization:** Ability to reduce reliance on third-party plugins through **custom coding**.  
- **Problem-Solving & Debugging:** Experience troubleshooting and fixing site issues **without breaking core functionality**.  
- **Strong Communication & Documentation Skills:** Ability to explain technical challenges clearly and document custom solutions.  

**Bonus Skills (Preferred but not Required):**  
- **Shopify Plus Experience** (checkout extensibility and API handling).  
- **Experience with Subscription Models** (Recharge, Bold, or custom-built solutions).  
- **Headless Shopify Development** (GraphQL and React/Next.js integrations).  
- **Experience with E-commerce Analytics & CRO (Conversion Rate Optimization).**  

**Communication & Workflow:**  
- Our team communicates via **Discord** for project updates and file sharing.  
- We prefer **asynchronous work** with clear documentation of changes.  

**How to Apply:**  
Interested candidates should submit:  
- A **resume** showcasing relevant Shopify experience.  
- A **cover letter** detailing past Shopify projects and your approach to plugin optimization.  
- Links to **Shopify stores** you have built or optimized.  
- Expected **hourly rate** and availability.  

Join **Otherworlds Inc.** and help us build a **seamless, high-performance e-commerce experience** for our growing community of creators and fans.  

Learn more about us at **[Otherworldsinc.com](https://otherworldsinc.com)** and follow us on social media for updates!

title: Work Order Scan Front End improvements
description:
Project Overview
We are looking for an experienced developer to build a document scanning and editing feature within our SaaS-based fleet management platform. This feature will enable fleet managers to upload, scan, and edit work orders, invoices, and maintenance records with high accuracy and efficiency. The goal is to provide an intuitive interface where users can click on the document to highlight corresponding fields in the form, and vice versa (similar to Nanonets).
The front-end should align with the UX/UI standards of modern SaaS applications, ensuring a seamless, structured workflow for processing scanned work orders. The system should handle large document sets efficiently, validate extracted data, and provide a guided review process for error correction.

https://app.nanonets.com/ is a great example app that does this well. Here is a video showing it:
https://www.loom.com/share/f5aa28ec26e54da49e9ea191f4b1b904

Technical Scope
Document Upload & Processing
File Upload UI:
Drag-and-drop and direct file selection.
Show a real-time progress bar during upload.
Validate file formats and display a preview before submission.
OCR & Data Extraction:
Extract key fields from work orders, invoices, and maintenance logs (e.g., date, vendor, part details, labor costs, total amounts).
Implement error handling and detailed feedback for missing or incorrectly parsed fields.

Interactive Editing & Validation
Two-way document interaction:
Clicking a field in the document highlights the corresponding field in the form, and vice versa.
Allow inline editing of all extracted values.
Editable fields include cost, quantity, unit price, markup, and descriptions.
Bounding Box Coordination:
Each extracted field is visually outlined in the document with a bounding box.
When a user selects a field in the form, the corresponding bounding box in the document is highlighted for better visibility.
Users can drag and resize bounding boxes to correct OCR misalignment if needed.
Implement real-time field linking where adjustments in the bounding box automatically update the extracted value in the form.
Ensure bounding boxes adapt dynamically for multi-page documents and various font styles.
Guided Validation & Review:
Introduce a step-by-step verification process with collapsible sections for labor, parts, and total costs.
Users must check off each section before submitting.
Error-checking bubbles should provide inline hints for verification.
Zoom & Navigation Improvements:
A hand tool should allow smooth movement inside the zoomed document (instead of using scroll bars).
Ensure smooth scrolling behavior where the left panel (document preview) remains fixed, while the right panel (form) scrolls independently.

Expected Deliverables
‚úÖ Fully functional document scanning & editing tool integrated into the fleet management platform.
‚úÖ User-friendly UI/UX for uploading, validating, and editing scanned work orders.
‚úÖ Real-time interactive editing between scanned documents and form fields.
‚úÖ Optimized OCR pipeline that minimizes scan time while maintaining accuracy.
‚úÖ Guided walkthrough validation process with collapsible sections and inline hints.



Skills Required
üü¢ Frontend: React.js, Ant Design (preferred), modern UI frameworks.
üü¢ Backend: Node.js, Python (for OCR/AI processing), SQL (PostgreSQL/MySQL).
üü¢ File Processing: PDF/image parsing, error handling, validation

Project Milestones & Timeline
üìå Developer to provide a quote and estimated timeline for completion.
üìå Proposal should outline:
Relevant experience in document processing apps.
Past projects with document parsing and interactive UI design.
Estimated timeline & budget for completion.

Next Steps
Interested developers should submit a proposal with:
Previous experience with OCR, document parsing, and interactive form design.
Approach for improving scanning speed & UI usability.
Proposed budget & development timeline.
We are excited to collaborate on this AI document scanning and editing tool!

title: Co-Founder & CTO for AI x Web3 Startup
description:
**About Acronym AI**  
Acronym AI is pioneering the next evolution of automation by integrating AI, Web2, and Web3 into a unified intelligence layer. Our platform eliminates complexity, allowing users to automate financial strategies, optimize workflows, and seamlessly interact with digital ecosystems. By bridging AI, blockchain, and traditional web services, Acronym AI is creating autonomous technology that works for you, with you, and without you.  

We‚Äôre looking for a **Co-Founder & Chief Technology Officer (CTO)** to lead the technical vision and help shape the future of Acronym AI. This is a rare opportunity to join an early-stage, high-impact project, with the potential to become a key voice in the AI x Web3 revolution.  

---

### **Role & Responsibilities**  
As the Co-Founder & CTO, you will:  
- **Lead Technical Development** ‚Äì Oversee the integration of AI models, Web2 automation, and Web3 interoperability.  
- **Public Representation** ‚Äì Occasionally speak on podcasts, livestreams, and video-recorded content to share the vision and technology behind Acronym AI.  
- **Community & Ecosystem Engagement** ‚Äì Engage with developers, users, and the broader AI/Web3 space through public platforms.  
- **Collaboration & Strategy** ‚Äì Work alongside the founding team to refine product-market fit, technical execution, and long-term growth.  

---

### **Qualifications**  
We are looking for someone who:  
- Has **strong AI expertise** ‚Äì Deep understanding of LLMs, RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation), and AI orchestration.  
- Understands **crypto fundamentals** ‚Äì Comfortable with Web3, wallets, smart contracts, and DeFi (advanced knowledge is a plus).  
- Is a **confident communicator** ‚Äì Can clearly explain technical concepts in public-facing content.  
- Is familiar with **Web2 & Web3 ecosystems** ‚Äì Experience with APIs, automation tools, and blockchain integrations is preferred.  
- Thrives in **startup environments** ‚Äì Comfortable working with lean teams and evolving roadmaps.  

---

### **Compensation & Hiring Process**  
We‚Äôre offering an initial **1-month trial phase**, with a flexible workload:  
- **15 hours per month**  
- Paid weekly upfront  
- If successful ‚Üí **1-year contract** at 20 hours per month + **2% token equity**  

---

If you‚Äôre passionate about AI, automation, and Web3, and you‚Äôre ready to help shape the future of intelligent technology, we encourage you to apply through this platform.

title: Bubble.io Developer Needed for a Matching Platform (MVP Build)
description:
Build a Tinder-Style Caregiver Matching Platform in Bubble.io (CareMatch)
üîπ Project Overview
We are building CareMatch, a caregiver connection platform that combines the job-search functionality of Care.com with the swipe-based simplicity of Tinder. The goal is to connect caregivers with families, patients, and healthcare providers through an intuitive matching system.

This job is perfect for a Bubble.io expert who can develop a fully functional MVP  with essential features and API integrations. We are starting from scratch in Bubble.io, so the ideal candidate can design, build, and optimize workflows efficiently.

üéØ Target Users
üë©‚Äç‚öïÔ∏è Caregivers ‚Äì Home health aides, nurses, and family caregivers looking for work.
üè° Families & Patients ‚Äì People in need of in-home care or specialized assistance.
üè• Healthcare Providers ‚Äì Agencies and institutions hiring caregivers.

üîë Key Features
1Ô∏è‚É£ Swipe-Based Matching (Tinder-Style)
Profiles with Quick View Cards ‚Äì Caregivers and clients can swipe left (pass) or right (connect) based on profiles.
Mutual Matching ‚Äì If both swipe right, they can chat directly.

2Ô∏è‚É£ Job Listings & Auto-Matching
Employers & families can post job listings with detailed caregiver requirements.
Caregivers can apply directly or get auto-matched to jobs based on preferences.

3Ô∏è‚É£ Secure In-App Messaging
Built-in chat system (Twilio API or Bubble's chat plugin).
Video call option for virtual interviews before hiring (Zoom API or similar).

4Ô∏è‚É£ Caregiver Profile & Verification
Caregivers create detailed profiles with experience, skills, and certifications.
ID Verification & Background Checks (API integration for security).

5Ô∏è‚É£ Payment & Scheduling
Stripe API for secure payments (hourly, weekly, contract-based).
Google Calendar API for scheduling interviews and shifts.

6Ô∏è‚É£ Ratings & Reviews
Employers & caregivers leave ratings & testimonials after each job.
Top-rated caregivers appear higher in search results.

7Ô∏è‚É£ Mobile App & Web-Ready
The MVP must be mobile-responsive and easily convertible into a native app.
We may use Buzzworthy or Natively.io to package it into an iOS/Android app later.

8Ô∏è‚É£ Subscription & Monetization
Freemium Model ‚Äì Basic features free, premium upgrades available.
Employer Subscriptions ‚Äì Agencies pay $99-$299/month for bulk hiring.
Caregiver Featured Listings ‚Äì Boost profile visibility for $10-$50 per listing.

title: WordPress Developer for SSO Integration with Matrix Server

configure the WP Auth Plugin on our WordPress website.

Skills & Experience Required:

Familiarity with OAuth2 and SSO concepts.
Ability to communicate effectively and coordinate with external teams (etke.cc) to ensure smooth integration.

title: Cloud Database Developer for NetSuite & Website Integration
description:
Project Overview
We  are seeking an experienced Cloud Database Developer to build and integrate a scalable cloud database that synchronizes NetSuite, vendor data, and our company website. The ideal candidate will have expertise in cloud database architecture, API development, and NetSuite integration to ensure seamless automation and data flow.

Additionally, We are open to evaluating pre-built cloud-based platforms that can fulfill the same needs with existing tools. The developer will be responsible for assessing whether an off-the-shelf solution (such as Unleashed Software, Coupa, or DCKAP) could be integrated efficiently, or if a fully custom solution is required.

Scope of Work

1. Cloud Database Development (Custom Build Option)

Design and implement a cloud-based database (AWS RDS, Google Cloud SQL, or similar).

Structure data to store vendor parts, inventory data, and drop-ship availability.

Implement data validation and cleaning rules to ensure consistency across vendors.

2. Pre-Built Cloud Platform Evaluation (Alternative Approach)

Research and recommend existing SaaS platforms that handle vendor management, NetSuite integration, and website data syncing.

Assess feasibility and cost comparison between a custom-built cloud database vs. a pre-built SaaS solution.

If a SaaS platform is selected, handle custom integration and API development to fit AMS Parts‚Äô requirements.

3. NetSuite Integration

Develop API connections to sync vendor parts data into NetSuite while protecting inventory records.

Enable two-way sync where NetSuite updates (new parts, inventory levels) reflect in the cloud database or pre-built solution.

Automate import processes for vendor-provided part lists (CSV, Excel, or API feeds).

4. Website Synchronization

Build an API that allows the website to pull live data from the cloud database or SaaS solution.

Ensure website updates include part availability, descriptions, and compatibility information in real-time.

Optimize performance for fast queries and reliable uptime. Eventually we would like to move into ecommerce platform such as Suite commerce or Big Commerce.

5. Error Handling & Reporting

Implement automated checks for duplicate records, missing part descriptions, and pricing mismatches.

Develop an admin dashboard for our team members to review and correct flagged errors before syncing data.

Ideal Candidate Skills & Experience

Cloud Database Management: Experience with AWS RDS, Google Cloud, Firebase, or similar.

API Development & Integration: Proficiency in RESTful APIs, GraphQL, and webhooks.

NetSuite Customization: Knowledge of SuiteScript 2.0, SuiteTalk API, or similar for seamless integration.

Data Processing & ETL: Experience in handling large-scale data imports and transformations.

E-commerce & Website Data Sync: Familiarity with website backend development and performance optimization.

SaaS Evaluation & Integration: Experience working with pre-built ERP, inventory, or supply chain management platforms.

Project Details

Contract Type: Fixed-price or hourly (please provide estimates in your proposal). As well as possible time frame to build.

Budget: Open to quotes based on expertise and project scope.

Start Date: ASAP.

How to Apply

Interested candidates should submit a proposal including:

Relevant experience with cloud databases, SaaS solutions, and NetSuite integrations.

Examples of past projects where they built similar API-driven data sync solutions or integrated pre-built platforms.

Technical approach to handling vendor data, inventory sync, and website updates.

Estimated timeline & budget quote.

We are looking for a highly skilled developer to create an efficient, scalable, and automated data synchronization system. Whether this involves a fully custom build or leveraging an existing SaaS, we seek a solution that best fits our long-term needs. If you have the expertise and experience please let us know similar projects you have completed. We look forward to working with you!

title: Create New Python Library that makes use of datadog-api-client
description:
This is purely python library without frontend/rest work. You can/recommended to extensively make use of LLM with VSCode with clone/roo IDE ( LLM credits will be provided) , basically 80% of the code can be generated through LLM. In this task, we want to create a python based library that basically ingests data from datadog using datadog-api-client and then writes it to the Database ( Using django-ORM library). You need to write integration tests to validate the functionality.  Please expect rigorous code reviews, and changes need to go through PRs.

There are multiple functionalities that needs to be developed:
Milestone 1:
1. Ingest all dashboards/watchers using the Python API Client  . And Process them using the provided library/class, and then write that data to a table in  DB.
2. Now in another class, read all of this data written in # 1 or use Another API. And for each data point, process it through datadog-api  and write the results back to the table.
3. Orchestrate Both #1 and # 2 : Basically calling #1 and then #2 and then write the aggregation of it to the DB.
4. Update Datadog api for each of the row in # 1.    

Milestone 2:

1. We will ingest all the hosts data to DB
2.  Expose some methods that gives insights into this data.
     -  The # of instances that belong to certain instance type.
     -  # of instances that belong to given tags
    -  List of all tags and instance types used by hosts.

Milestone 3:
Get all spans info.  process them. Method to remove spans


ChatGPT O3 model access will be provided. But, You are to use your expertise to complement it

title: Currency Converter Ruby on Rails
description:
We are looking for an experienced Ruby on Rails Developer to build a Currency Converter Web Application with multi-language support and automatic language detection. The ideal candidate should have expertise in Rails I18n, API integrations, and geolocation services.

Key Features & Requirements:

1. Currency Conversion Functionality

A form to input the amount for conversion.

Dropdowns for selecting "From" and "To" currencies.

Fetch real-time exchange rates using an external API (e.g., Open Exchange Rates, Fixer.io ‚Äì free tier for testing).

Display the converted amount with appropriate error handling.


2. Localization & Multi-Language Support (Rails I18n)

Implement Rails I18n to support multiple languages (English, French, Spanish, German, Arabic, etc.).

Store translations in YAML files (e.g., config/locales/en.yml, config/locales/fr.yml).

A dropdown to manually switch languages, updating the UI dynamically.

Store the user‚Äôs language preference in session/local storage for persistence.


3. Automatic Language Detection (Geolocation)

Use the Geocoder gem to detect the user‚Äôs country based on their IP address.

Automatically set the UI language based on the detected country.

Fallback to English if the detected language is not supported.


4. UI & Error Handling

Display flag icons in currency selection dropdowns.

Ensure language selection updates dynamically without requiring a page refresh.

Implement user-friendly error handling for API failures or invalid inputs.

Responsive UI with ERB/HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.


Technology Stack:

Backend: Ruby on Rails

Frontend: ERB, HTML, CSS, JavaScript

Localization: Rails I18n (or any preferred method)

Geolocation: Geocoder gem

Currency Exchange API: Open Exchange Rates / Fixer.io (for free testing)

Read messages from our database, learn from them, and evolve the agent over time. The agent must be capable of understanding conversation topics and tracking who has discussed what.

if you‚Äôre confident in your skills with ElizaOS and can meet our standards for quality and accountability, we‚Äôd love to hear from you.

title: Freelancer Needed: Website Performance Optimization (WordPress + Divi + Hostinger + Cloudflare)
description:
READ: Don't apply if you are going to try to use a caching plug-in to cover-up the issues.  Also, don't apply if you want to sell me on this taking days and weeks to fix to get more hours.  I can show you how to fix this in the allocated timeframe.  See below and attached pagespeed insights and pingdom report. You can also pull a gtmetrix.

Here's a detailed job post you can use to hire a freelancer to fix your website's performance issues.  

---

### **Freelancer Needed: Website Performance Optimization (WordPress + Divi + Hostinger + Cloudflare)**  

We are looking for an experienced web developer to optimize our WordPress website built with **Divi** and hosted on **Hostinger**. We use **Cloudflare CDN** (which has been purged) and the **LiteSpeed Cache plugin**, but we need to fix **the root cause** of our **page and image loading issues**, not just rely on caching plugins.  

#### **Project Overview**  
Our website has **page speed issues** affecting user experience and SEO. Our **Pingdom, GTmetrix, and PageSpeed Insights** reports highlight issues related to **HTML, CSS, and JavaScript**, which we need to fix.  

**Key Metrics (PageSpeed Insights on Mobile, Slow 4G, Moto G Power Emulation):**  
- **First Contentful Paint (FCP):** 3.0s  
- **Largest Contentful Paint (LCP):** 5.2s  
- **Total Blocking Time (TBT):** 120ms  
- **Cumulative Layout Shift (CLS):** 0.509  
- **Speed Index:** 4.0s  

### **What Needs to Be Fixed?**  
We need a developer who can **directly optimize our site** by working on:  

#### **1. Image Optimization (Prevent LCP & CLS Issues)**  
- Ensure **all images have explicit width and height attributes** to prevent layout shifts.  
- Fix **"media element lacking an explicit size"** errors.  
- Implement **lazy loading properly** while maintaining image dimensions.  
- Use **CSS object-fit: cover/contain** to prevent distortion.  

#### **2. Reduce Unused JavaScript & CSS**  
- Identify and remove **unused JavaScript (potential savings: 146 KB)**.  
- Reduce **unused CSS (potential savings: 18 KB)**.  
- Avoid **serving legacy JavaScript** to modern browsers (9 KB savings).  
- Optimize **JavaScript execution and defer unnecessary scripts** to improve FCP/LCP.  

#### **3. Improve Render & Loading Performance**  
- **Fix CLS issues** related to shifting elements, including **Divi modules, carousel images, and navigation elements**.  
- **Minimize HTTP requests** and optimize the **critical rendering path**.  
- Address **long main-thread tasks** and **avoid chaining critical requests**.  
- Serve **static assets with an efficient cache policy** (29 resources identified).  
- **Enable Gzip compression** (F23) to reduce response times by 70%.  

#### **4. Fix Layout & UI Issues**  
- Improve **accessibility** by fixing **contrast issues, navigation order, and viewport settings**.  
- Ensure **consistent heading structure** (h1, h2, h3 should not skip levels).  
- Fix **buttons and text contrast issues** for better readability.  

### **Requirements**  
‚úÖ Strong expertise in **HTML, CSS, and JavaScript**  
‚úÖ Experience with **WordPress, Divi, and Hostinger**  
‚úÖ Familiarity with **Cloudflare, CDN optimization, and LiteSpeed Cache**  
‚úÖ Ability to **debug layout shifts and fix core web vitals issues without relying on plugins**  
‚úÖ Strong understanding of **PageSpeed Insights, Lighthouse, GTmetrix, and Pingdom**  

**Bonus Skills:**  
‚ûï Experience with **WebP images, modern script deployment, and reducing third-party script dependencies**  
‚ûï Familiarity with **Chrome DevTools for code coverage analysis**  

### **How to Apply**  
Please send us:  
1Ô∏è‚É£ A brief overview of your experience with **WordPress performance optimization**.  
2Ô∏è‚É£ Examples of similar **speed optimization projects** you've completed.  
3Ô∏è‚É£ Your estimated **timeline and pricing**.  

We want **real fixes** to the core issues, not just another plugin solution. If you're confident in optimizing our site at the code level, we'd love to hear from you! üöÄ

title: SaaS - Add Feature: Cut Long Video into Short Clips w/AI (Cheaply)
description:
I have an existing SaaS app that I'm building. It does everything I need it to do like captions / subtitles, etc.

I now want to add a feature that ingests a long video (assume 1 hour) and identifies the viral %10% best clips and cuts them into short vids for Tiktok, Reels, YT Shorts, etc.

Therefore, the logic must be SMART enough to figure out which parts of the long video are worth cutting.

** IF YOU HAVE DONE THIS BEFORE, THEN YOU ARE THE PERSON I WANT TO WORK WITH. **

We obviously use:
- NodeJS / Next JS
- FFmpeg
- Remotion
- OpenAI or other AI LLM to do the identification and cutting.

** IF YOU HAVE DONE THIS BEFORE, THEN YOU ARE THE PERSON I WANT TO WORK WITH. **

REQUIREMENTS:
----
1) DELIVERABLE - You present me with working flow. You get paid and a great review.

2) SOLUTION & COST PER VIDEO PROCESSED (cost per video rendering) - the solution must be cheap to create a video -- obviously if it costs $5 to cut a single video, it's NOT marketable. I'm looking for a solution that can get such videos renderered in cents.

3) SMART SELECTION OF CLIPS & CUTTING - the clips chosen by the AI must make sense and be the best clips of the video. Obviously. we can't be perfect all the time but you shouldn't have basic issues like cutting off the voice mid-sentence, choosing completely irrelevant clips, etc.

4) TECH STACK - Must use our tech stack as this feature will be bolted on to an existing app that is built on NodeJS (back-end), NextJS (frontend), MongoDB (database), and Redis for caching. We already use FFmpeg which you will need.

5) TIMELINE - Want this done within 2 weeks or less.

6) COMMENTED CODE - well structured, clean, commented code so that my dev can easily bolt it on to my app.


SIMILAR TOOLS:
They all follow the same simple user flow so there's not much room for misunderstanding.

1) Opus - opus.pro -- model after this one! PLEASE TRY IT TO SEE THE END GOAL.
2) Capcut - https://www.capcut.com/editor-tools/long-video-to-shorts
3) Veed - https://www.veed.io/tools/auto-video-editor/ai-clip-generator
4) Minvo - https://minvo.pro/
5) Klap - https://klap.app/
6) QuickReel - https://www.quickreel.io/

Anyone who can prove they've done this before, or similar functionality, will be given first preference. SHOW ME, DON'T TELL ME.
skills: ['MongoDB', 'Python Script', 'Redis', 'Scala', 'Golang', 'remotion', 'MoviePy', 'NodeJS Framework', 'Python', 'Ruby']

title: Seeking Expert Bubble.io Developer for AI-Powered Meal Planning MVP ‚Äì Ongoing Work Available
description:
Hello,

I am building, an AI-driven meal planning platform that creates personalized nutrition plans based on biometric data, dietary preferences, and real-time wearable integrations (WHOOP, Apple, etc.). The platform will connect users to local cloud/commercial kitchens for meal preparation and delivery.

We are currently developing the MVP, but this will be an ongoing project with continuous feature upgrades and improvements. The best, most competitive bid will have the opportunity for long-term work beyond this initial build.

Project Scope (MVP Development):
Phase 1: Core MVP Buildout
‚úÖ User Data Collection

Structured onboarding using Chat GPT‚Äô API. The flow will replicate that of a nutritionist and collect dietary preferences, and health data etc.
Enable users to upload health documents (PDFs, images).
‚úÖ AI-Powered Meal Plan Generation

Integrate OpenAI API to generate personalized meal plans based on user data.
Display meal plans in a structured format (daily/weekly/monthly view).
Allow users to approve or request modifications.
‚úÖ Chat Interface for AI Nutritionist (Text + Voice)

Build an interactive chat system where users can converse with an AI nutritionist via:
Text-based chat (standard chatbot interaction).
Voice-enabled chat (speech-to-text and text-to-speech).
The AI should guide users in meal planning, dietary choices, and lifestyle adjustments based on their input.
‚úÖ Wearable API Integration (Part of MVP)

Sync real-time health data from Whoop, and other wearables via API.
Pull key metrics such as sleep quality, heart rate variability (HRV), stress levels, and activity levels.
Trigger meal plan adjustments based on lifestyle changes (e.g., poor sleep, increased stress, or high activity levels).
‚úÖ Kitchen Dashboard & Order Routing

Assign customer meal plans to a kitchen partner based on location.
Provide a customer order list for each kitchen, showing meal plans they need to prepare.
Create an aggregated ingredient view that calculates required ingredients across all orders.
‚úÖ Payment & Subscription Setup

Implement Stripe integration for meal plan subscriptions.
Handle tiered pricing (weekly, bi-weekly, monthly plans).
Tech Stack & Requirements:
‚úÖ Bubble.io Expert (Workflows, API Integrations, Backend Data)
‚úÖ OpenAI API Integration (ChatGPT for meal plans)
‚úÖ API Experience (Fitbit, Whoop, Stripe, etc.)
‚úÖ Strong Database Skills (User data, meal plans, kitchens, inventory tracking)
‚úÖ Experience with Responsive UI in Bubble
‚úÖ Experience with Speech-to-Text & Text-to-Speech APIs (for voice chat)
‚úÖ Ability to Automate Wearable Data Processing for Meal Adjustments

Bonus:
‚≠ê Experience in the food-tech, health, or meal delivery industries
‚≠ê Past projects integrating real-time API data (e.g., wearables, health apps)
‚≠ê Knowledge of automation & scheduling workflows in Bubble

Budget & Timeline:
üí∞ Budget: Open to proposals (fixed or hourly rate)
üìÜ Timeline: Looking to build MVP in under 3 weeks

üîπ Ongoing Work: The best, most competitive bid will have the opportunity for continued development and feature enhancements after the MVP launch.

title: Build a No-Code SaaS MVP for CallIQ (AI-Powered Sales Call Insights Platform)
description:
Looking for a Bubble.io Expert to Build an MVP for CallIQ

CallIQ is a SaaS tool that connects to Gong, Jiminny, or Fathom via API and allows users to query their sales calls using AI (OpenAI GPT-4). We are looking for a Bubble.io expert to build an MVP.

Project Requirements

MVP Features:

Allow users to input their API key and fetch sales call transcripts.

Enable AI-powered queries (e.g., ‚ÄúWhat are my top objections?‚Äù).

Create a clean, simple dashboard (Bubble.io preferred).

We aim to launch quickly, validate demand, and expand features later.

Project Details

1. Overview

CallIQ is a low-code SaaS MVP that connects conversation intelligence platforms (Gong, Jiminny, Fathom) and extracts actionable sales insights from calls using AI.

The MVP should be built using Bubble.io (preferred) or Webflow + Make/Zapier if needed.

2. Core Functionality (MVP Scope)

User Authentication (Sign-up/Login):

Email-based sign-up/login (Bubble's built-in authentication is acceptable).

Store user API keys securely (keys must not be visible in the front-end).

API Integration with Gong, Jiminny, Fathom:

Users enter their API key, and the app connects via API.

Fetch recent call transcripts and metadata (title, date, rep name, call duration, etc.).

Display a list of calls.

Show a call transcript preview (first 500 characters).

Handle API errors (e.g., invalid key, no data returned).

AI Query Interface (OpenAI GPT-4):

Users enter natural language queries (e.g., ‚ÄúWhat objections were mentioned?‚Äù).

Call GPT-4 API to analyze call transcripts and return AI-generated insights.

Display text-based insights (bullet points, summaries).

Keep response times fast (~5 seconds per query).

Simple Dashboard (List of Calls + Insights Output):

Display recent calls fetched via API.

Users can click a call to view its transcript and run AI-powered analysis.

Provide simple text-based output (no complex charts for now).

Error Handling (API & User Input):

Invalid API Key: Show a clear error message.

No Calls Found: Display a friendly message.

Failed AI Query: Retry option and error logging.

Minimal, Clean UI (User-Friendly):

Simple, modern Bubble.io layout (clean and easy to navigate).

Pre-built Bubble templates are acceptable if they speed up development.

(Optional) Stripe Payments for Subscriptions:

Free plan: Limited AI queries.

Paid plan: Unlimited queries and more API calls.

Use Bubble.io Stripe Plugin (optional for MVP).

3. Ideal Freelancer Requirements

At least 2 years of experience with Bubble.io, including API integrations.

Familiarity with Make.com/Zapier (preferred but not required).

Experience working with OpenAI API (GPT-4).

Understanding of API authentication, security, and data handling.

Prior experience with SaaS or AI-powered tools is a plus.

4. Timeline

4 Weeks Total (faster delivery is preferred).

Week 1: Set up Bubble.io, authentication, and API input.

Week 2: Connect Gong/Jiminny API, fetch call data.

Week 3: Implement AI queries, test API calls.

Week 4: UI polish, error handling, testing, and launch.

5. Budget

Fixed-Price Project: $750

6. How to Apply

Send examples of Bubble.io projects, particularly those with API integrations.

Explain how you would connect Gong/Jiminny APIs.

Provide an estimated time and cost breakdown.
skills: ['AI-Generated Code', 'Web Application', 'Bubble.io Development', 'Python', 'AI Development', 'AI App Development']

title: Full-Stack Developer needed for implementing features in pre-existing Web Application
description:
Requirement 1: Import New Profile via HTML Upload (add-on to existing functionality by allowing the import of an additional file)
Objective: Implement functionality for importing client dividend transactions from an HTML file.
Details:
Create an alternative flow for ‚ÄúImport Existing Client‚Äù page where agents can input client information: Alias, Birthday, Gender, Smoker Status, Account ID, Product type and Dividend payout type.
Provide an alternative flow for ‚ÄúUpload Historical Transaction‚Äù button that allows the user to upload an additional HTML file.
Upon upload, parse the HTML file and integrate transactions into the client‚Äôs profile.
Update relevant data visualizations and tables, including historical value graphs, invested amount over time, and fund allocation analysis.

Requirement 2: Replace Existing Profile via HTML Upload
Objective: Implement functionality for replacing existing transaction data as well as dividend data with new data from an HTML file.
Details:
On the ‚ÄúView Client Profile‚Äù page, add a ‚ÄúReplace Historical Transaction‚Äù button.
Redirect to the ‚ÄúImport Existing Client‚Äù page with pre-filled client information.
Allow the agent to upload a new HTML file to replace existing transactions.
Ensure the new transactions overwrite all existing product details and transactions.

Requirement 3: Delete Client Product (Ensure feature works for dividend type product as well)
Objective: Provide functionality for deleting a product from a client‚Äôs profile.
Details:
On the ‚ÄúClient Profile‚Äù page, include a ‚ÄúDelete Product‚Äù icon.
Implement a confirmation pop-up window to confirm the deletion.
Upon confirmation, delete the product and all related alerts from the client‚Äôs profile.

Requirement 4: Manually Create Transactions (Allow manual creation of dividend product transactions)
Objective: Enable agents to manually enter dividend transactions for a client‚Äôs product.
Details:
On the ‚ÄúClient Profile‚Äù page, provide a ‚ÄúManually Create Transaction‚Äù button.
Allow agents to enter transaction details in a table format, including row, fund, plan name, payout, effective date, units, bid price/par value, NAV, rate, amount, dividend run rate and allocation method.
Include options to add or delete rows, and confirm the entry via a pop-up window.
Ensure manually entered transactions are added to the client‚Äôs historical data.

Requirement 5: View Audit History
Objective: Allow agents to review the audit history of dividend transactions.
Details:
On the ‚ÄúClient Profile‚Äù page, add a ‚ÄúView Divided Transactions‚Äù button (this button should only be shown for dividend type products).
Display a pop-up window with transaction details, including Date, Agent Name, Transaction Type, and whether the transactions are Imported or Automated.

Requirement 6: Modify Transactions
Objective: Implement an undo feature for manual dividend transactions.
Details:
On the ‚ÄúClient Profile‚Äù page, provide a ‚ÄúView Dividend Transactions‚Äù button for specific products.
Include an ‚ÄúUndo‚Äù option next to the latest transaction in the list.
On selection, show a pop-up window to confirm the undo action.
Allow the agent to revert the most recent manual transaction.

Detailed Description, Figma will be provided upon confirmation - exact design of all features (except the overall UI changes) will be provided.

title: Transitioning from Guesty Open API to Booking Engine API within WordPress - 5* review guaranteed
description:
Dear new coder,

We're facing a situation that requires your expertise and a significant code overhaul. Here's what you need to know:

Current setup: We have a WordPress website with booking functionality built using Guesty's Open API. The code is currently located in the WordPress theme editor.

Existing features: The site displays a search box, listings, and booking options.

Problem: We've realized that we need to add filters to our listings and change from a base price to a calendar-based pricing system. Unfortunately, the Open API isn't ideal for these requirements.

Solution: We need to transition from Guesty's Open API to their Booking Engine API (BE-API).

Your task: You'll need to convert our existing code to work with the BE-API. This involves:

Setting up a new BE-API instance

Rewriting our API calls to use BE-API endpoints

Implementing new filtering functionality

Updating the pricing display to show calendar-based prices

Challenges: This transition will require significant changes to the existing codebase. You'll need to familiarize yourself with both the current implementation and the BE-API documentation.

Additional resources: To help you understand the current setup and requirements better, I have included a Loom video walkthrough and a detailed description in the attached Word document. Please review these materials carefully as they provide crucial context and specifics about our current implementation and desired outcomes.
skills: ['WordPress', 'Web Development', 'PHP', 'API', 'AI-Generated Code', 'JavaScript', 'AI Development']

title: Graphic Designer & Web Developer for Single-Page Application Development
description:
We are looking for experienced Graphic Designers & Web Developers to design and develop a Single-Page Application (SPA) based on an existing prototype.

The application will take user input, send requests to an already developed API, display the results dynamically, and allow users to download a report PDF, with specific information, and to open a contextualized documentation (Endpoint documentation page).  

Project Requirements
The selected candidate will be responsible for:  
1. Design:
   - Creating the visual design and user experience of the SPA, ensuring a modern, clean, and user-friendly interface.  
   - Keeping the design consistent with our existing website‚Äôs aesthetics.  
   - Design of the report PDF
   - Design the Maintenance and Endpoint documentation page
   - Providing design mockups and obtaining approval before development begins.  

2. Development:
   - Implementing the approved design using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.  
   - Using a set of pre-selected JavaScript libraries, including Vue.js, jsPDF, and others.
   - Integrating the front-end with the existing API for data retrieval (JSON).  
   - Ensuring the application is responsive and works seamlessly across devices.  
   - Implementing a PDF generation feature using jsPDF.  

3. Technical Requirements:
   - Strong front-end development skills (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Vue.js).  
   - Familiarity with PHP (no PHP development required, but a basic understanding is needed).
   - Ability to work on a personal development server (e.g., XAMPP, or other suitable environment).  

Work Phases
  - Phase 1: Design of UI/UX and PDF (approval required before proceeding).
  - Phase 2: Implementation and development of the SPA based on the approved design.  

Who We‚Äôre Looking For
  - At least 2 years of experience in front-end development and UI/UX design.  
  - Expertise in Vue.js, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and jsPDF.  
  - Strong graphic design skills to create a visually appealing and intuitive user interface.  
  - Experience in developing interactive SPAs.  
  - Basic understanding of PHP to ensure compatibility with the existing back-end.  
  - Experience with API integration in front-end applications.  
  - Ability to maintain clean, well-documented, and efficient code.  
  - Fluent in English, both written and spoken.  

Deliverable
The selected developer will provide:
  - A fully functional and responsive SPA that meets the specified requirements.
  - The SPA comprises a set of HTML (PHP), JavaScript, and CSS files.
  - The code should be well-structured and thoroughly documented, with clear English comments to ensure readability and ease of future maintenance.

How to Apply
If you're interested in this opportunity, please apply by:  
  1. Starting your application with "alvascience-2025" to confirm you've read the full description.  
  2. Providing previous work samples related to UI/UX design and SPA development.  
  3. Including a short explanation of your experience with Vue.js and jsPDF.  

Selected applicants will be contacted for a brief interview.

title: Webflow & Memberstack Expert Needed to Build a Secure Membership System
description:
**Job Title:** Webflow & Memberstack Expert Needed to Build a Secure Membership System

**Job Description:**  
We are looking for an experienced Webflow and Memberstack expert to help us build a **secure, paywalled membership system** that integrates with **Skool**. The goal is to protect our workflows from unauthorized sharing while ensuring only **active, paying members** can access them.

### **Scope of Work:**
- **Webflow Development:** Set up a private Webflow membership site where our workflows will be hosted.
- **Memberstack Integration:** Implement Memberstack to restrict access based on active subscriptions.
- **Skool Embedding:** Ensure seamless embedding of the Webflow pages inside Skool‚Äôs **Classroom** section.
- **Access Control:** Prevent users from saving or sharing workflow links by enforcing login-based authentication.
- **Automated Subscription Management:** Integrate **Stripe + Zapier** to automatically remove access when a user cancels their membership.
- **Usage Tracking:** Implement a system to track usage and potentially limit workflow executions if needed.

### **Requirements:**
- Proven experience with **Webflow** (portfolio required)
- Expertise in **Memberstack** for membership gating
- Experience with **Stripe & Zapier** for automation
- Familiarity with **Skool** or other community platforms is a plus
- Strong understanding of security best practices for protecting digital content

### **Bonus Skills:**
- Experience with AI-powered workflows and API integrations
- Ability to create a scalable system for future growth

### **Project Timeline & Budget:**
- We are aiming for an **MVP launch within 3-4 weeks**.
- Budget: **Open to discussion based on experience & deliverables**.

If you are confident in your ability to build this **secure, seamless membership system**, please apply with:  
‚úÖ Your portfolio showcasing relevant projects  
‚úÖ Your estimated timeline for completion  
‚úÖ Your pricing structure  

We look forward to working with you!

title: Experienced Android developer for comprehensive review of my Application ‚Äì Feedback & Suggestions
description:
Hey devs,

I‚Äôve built an Android app but I am not an android developer by trade, back-end end Java developer. The application works, but I know there‚Äôs plenty of room to write better, cleaner, and more efficient code‚Äîand that‚Äôs where you come in.
What I Need:

I‚Äôm looking for a developer with strong Android/Kotlin expertise to do a deep dive into my code and give actionable feedback on:

    Code Structure & Architecture ‚Äì Is it well-organized? Any refactoring needed?
    Best Practices ‚Äì Am I following MVVM, Jetpack Compose, and other modern patterns correctly?
    Performance Optimization ‚Äì Any inefficiencies that could slow things down?
    Error Handling & Stability ‚Äì Any weak points that might cause crashes or bad user experiences?
    Scalability & Maintainability ‚Äì Would this codebase be easy to expand and maintain long-term?

I don‚Äôt need vague feedback‚ÄîI need specific recommendations. If something can be done in a better way, tell me how. If there are anti-patterns, unnecessary complexity, or missing optimizations, call them out.
Who I‚Äôm Looking For:

    Strong Kotlin & Android experience (Jetpack Compose, MVVM, Coroutines, etc.)
    Someone who‚Äôs worked on real-world production apps and knows what scales well
    Comfortable reviewing someone else‚Äôs code and explaining how to improve it

I‚Äôll provide access to the repo, and ideally, I‚Äôd like a written report or a video walkthrough with your suggestions.

If this sounds like something you can do, drop a message with your experience and how you‚Äôd approach the review. Looking forward to working with you!

title: Web developer with expertise in API integration (Social channels, Analytics platforms)
description:
Our marketing team is building a Data dashboard in Looker Studio. To allow this, they are looking to pull data from all our marketing channels (Socials, Web Analytics tools etc) into Google sheets using Rest API calls. This will then connect to a Looker Studio dashboard

The Data sources include:
1. Posthog - website analytics + events
2. TWIPLA - website analytics + events
3. Fathom - website analytics + events
4. Umami - website analytics + events
5. LinkedIn (company page data)
6. X (company page data)
7. Facebook  (company page data)
8. YouTube (company profile data)

We need a web developer's assistance to review the documentation of each data source, advise what data is available and then assist us with pulling data from each source. We would also like assistance in creating a template for each API call for us to refer to for ongoing data collection.

This is not a big project and would suit anyone with experience in Rest API or data analytics. It would be great if the web developer has experience in Looker Studio but this is not mandatory.

We would request the job be split into 2 milestone payments - the first for helping us pull data from each source. The second milestone will be for creating a template for each API - this can just be a simple google doc or even a .txt file.

We have not set-up our full analytics stack so if the winning candidate has experience in setting-up event tracking in tools like Posthog, Umami etc there might be an opportunity to expand this project scope into a bigger project

title: Build Ai based Web SaaS
description:
I‚Äôm looking for a developer to create a simple web/mobile application inspired by platforms like Quizlet, Vaia, and other popular study apps.

The main goal is to help users (primarily students) create and study flashcards, summaries, and quizzes, with the option to generate them automatically from uploaded PDFs, images, or text.

Below is an overview of the functionality I‚Äôd like implemented:
1. User Registration and Profiles
Sign Up / Log In: Standard email/password or social logins.
Profile Settings: Basic information, notification preferences, and language settings.

2. Flashcard Creation & Management
Manual Creation: Users can manually add flashcards (front/back or question/answer) with formatting (bold, italics, etc.).
Automated Generation: Users can upload a file or paste text, and the app should parse it to identify key concepts. Automatically create flashcards from that content (similar to mindgrasp.ai or Vaia).

3. Flashcard Library
Organized Sets: Users can group flashcards into themed sets or subjects (like Quizlet).
Search & Filter: By title, subject, difficulty, or date created.
Share Options (optional, if time permits): Let users share sets with friends or make them public.

4. Study & Quiz Features
Flip-Based Study: Show front side first, then reveal the answer on the back (like traditional flashcards).
Difficulty/Confidence Rating: After viewing an answer, user labels how easy or hard it was. This data can feed a spaced repetition algorithm so that harder cards appear more frequently.
Progress Tracking: Display how many cards are left, correct/incorrect counts, or a progress bar.
Multiple Question Types (optional): If possible, beyond just ‚Äúflip cards,‚Äù we might introduce multiple-choice, fill-in-the-blank, etc.

5. AI/Spaced Repetition Integration
Adaptive Scheduling: Cards rated ‚Äúhard‚Äù appear more often than easier ones (similar to Anki).
Summaries & Key Concepts: If possible, incorporate an AI summarizer that condenses large pieces of text into bullet points or potential Q&A pairs.

6. User Experience & Interface
Clean, Intuitive UI: Reference Quizlet‚Äôs minimal approach.
Visual Cues: Simple icons for flipping cards, rating difficulty, or uploading documents (similar to Vaia‚Äôs design style).
Responsive Design: Should work smoothly on desktop and mobile devices.


7. Additional Features (Nice to Have)
Achievements/Analytics: Show stats like how many cards studied, average success rate, or daily streaks to motivate learning.


I‚Äôm open to suggestions and ideas of the best approach to building this app.

Please let me know your estimated cost based on these features, and if we can prioritize or phase some features to fit my budget.

title: WordPress Plugin Developer Needed for Forest Inventory App
description:
I need a plugin designed for forest landowners, foresters, and timber management professionals to manage and analyze forest inventory data. It will provide tools for uploading cruise sheets (forestry measurement data), calculating various timber volume metrics (calculations provided), and visualizing forest composition with basic graphs.

-Core Capabilities-

Property and Stand Management

Create and manage multiple forest properties
Organize forests into logical "stands" (management units)
Track data by geographic region to apply appropriate regional conversion factors
Delete properties and stands when no longer needed


Data Import and Processing

Upload Microsoft Excel (.xlsx) timber cruise sheets
Process raw data into standardized metrics
Store data in a structured database for analysis


Volume Calculations

Calculate key forestry metrics from basal area measurements:

Basal area per acre (ft¬≤)
Stems per acre
Cords per acre
Cubic feet per acre
Tons per acre
MBF (thousand board feet) per acre




Region-Specific Calculations

Apply different conversion factors (provided) for various US regions:

Northeast
Southeast
Midwest
West
Pacific Northwest


Account for regional differences in tree growth patterns and measurement standards


Species-Specific Factors

Apply species-specific modifiers (provided) to account for differences in:

Wood density
Tree form
Growth patterns

Support for numerous tree species including:

Softwoods (Red Spruce, White Pine, Balsam Fir, etc.)
Hardwoods (Oak, Maple, Birch, etc.)


Visualization Tools

Generate charts and graphs including:

Species composition pie charts
Volume distribution bar charts


Display summary statistics in tabular format
Compare data across stands and properties


Data Export

Export data to PDF for reports and documentation
Print capability as a fallback for PDF generation


User Access Control

User-specific data management (each user can only see their own properties)


Administration Features

Shortcode integration ([forest_inventory]) for embedding the tool on any page


Technical Implementation
The plugin follows WordPress plugin architecture best practices:

Separate admin and public-facing components
Database tables for properties, stands, and inventory data
AJAX-based data processing for a responsive user experience
Integration with Chart.js for data visualization
Dependency management for required libraries (PhpSpreadsheet for Excel processing)
Internationalization support

Data Processing Methodology
The plugin employs a sophisticated two-factor approach to calculate timber volumes:

Regional base factors specific to different parts of the country
Species-specific modifiers that account for differences in wood properties

This approach provides more accurate volume estimates than a one-size-fits-all calculation method and allows for professional-grade timber inventory management directly within WordPress.
User Interface
The interface is divided into four main tabs:

Properties - View and manage existing properties and stands
Create Property - Add new forest properties to the system

title: GitHub Actions Integration for React App
description:
I need an experienced DevOps engineer or developer to set up GitHub Actions for my React (Vite + TypeScript) app to automate deployment to my VPS server on Hostinger. Every time I push code to the main branch, the website should automatically update without manual intervention.

Key Tasks
‚úÖ Set up GitHub Actions to trigger on every push to the main branch.
‚úÖ Run build process:

Install dependencies using npm install.
Build production-ready files with npm run build.
‚úÖ Deploy to Hostinger VPS:
Upload the dist (or build) folder to public_html/your-app-folder/ using FTP/SFTP.
‚úÖ Error Logging:
Ensure any deployment errors are logged but do not halt the process.
What I Will Provide
? GitHub repository access (so you can set up GitHub Actions).
? Hostinger FTP/SFTP credentials (hostname, username, password).

Post-Setup Expectations
After successful setup, the deployment should:
? Automatically update the live website when code is pushed to GitHub.
? Be fully automated (no manual steps required).
? Log errors for debugging without stopping the deployment.

Technical Details
Hosting: VPS Hosting (Hostinger).
Build Tool: Vite (React + TypeScript).
Deployment Method: FTP/SFTP (Hostinger does not support direct GitHub deployments).
No extra environment variables are required for the build.
Ideal Freelancer Profile
‚úîÔ∏è Proficient in GitHub Actions & CI/CD pipelines.
‚úîÔ∏è Strong DevOps background, familiar with automating deployments.
‚úîÔ∏è Experience with React, Vite, and TypeScript.
‚úîÔ∏è Comfortable working with FTP/SFTP & server management.
‚úîÔ∏è Ability to troubleshoot deployment issues and optimize performance.

Description:
We are the DSTV Team, a small group behind cleanyoursol.com, a Solana-based tool that helps users recover SOL by managing SPL tokens. We‚Äôre looking for an experienced Solana developer with a strong presence in the Solana community to assist us with project support and community engagement.

Help us connect with the Solana community by mentioning our project in your network (e.g., a short Twitter DM or chat to acknowledge you‚Äôve interacted with us or seen our work).

No complex coding required‚Äîjust a quick interaction to boost our visibility among Solana devs.

Requirements:  
Proven experience in Solana development (e.g., dApps, Rust/Node.js).  

Established presence in the Solana community (please share links to your GitHub, Twitter, or relevant profiles).  

Not an influencer‚Äîmust be a technical contributor.

Budget:  
$50-$100 USD (fixed price, paid after task completion). Negotiable based on your experience.

How to Apply:  
Submit a short proposal with:  
Links to your Solana-related work (GitHub, projects, forum posts).  

Your Twitter handle or community profiles showing Solana activity.  

A note on your experience in the Solana ecosystem.

Best regards,
Justin

title: Custom Live Video Streaming Bot Development
description:
Custom streaming bot LLM project.
End Goal:
1. A user logs into our website, pays for the service, uploads an image for their custom avatar,
2. Select a pre configured voice, or a custom voice
3. Establish custom rules for their custom LLM agent, load it with training data and a voice to speak in
4. Connect a twitter account
5. Bot live video streams on twitter
6. Will respond to a public twitter @ or a live stream message, as well as text post response.

Assumptions:
1. Assume we already have access to LLM text agent software
2. Assume we will use an existing speech AI tool (something like  https://docs.fish.audio/introduction )
3. Assume the video model already exists, we have a few options
   a. 3d unreal engine model, we have a UE designer already https://build.nvidia.com/nvidia/audio2face-3d
   b. heygen has a streaming API / avatar software https://labs.heygen.com/guest/interactive-avatar?tab=demo https://docs.heygen.com/docs/streaming-api

Requirements

Your developer role will build the framework that will send a twitter comment to the LLM, retrieve the text output, post to twitter via text, also send LLM text through a voice API model, and then send it to the live streaming video model. Will also need to setup the model to live video stream to twitter.

title: Sr. Full Stack Developer needed for an AI Startup
description:
WE ARE LOOKING FOR INDIVIDUAL DEVELOPERS, NOT AGENCIES.

# Senior Full Stack Developer Needed for Global Tech Team

We're seeking an experienced Senior Full Stack Developer to join our global engineering team, working with colleagues across California (HQ) and India. This role offers an exciting opportunity to bridge technical leadership with hands-on development while working with modern technologies.

## Core Hours
- 6:00 AM to 2:00 PM Pacific Time
- Position designed to facilitate collaboration across global time zones

## Primary Responsibilities
- Lead full stack development initiatives using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js)
- Build and maintain applications using Next.js
- Mentor and manage developers in India, including code reviews and technical guidance
- Collaborate with business stakeholders to gather requirements and translate them into technical solutions
- Contribute to DevOps practices and CI/CD pipeline maintenance
- Ensure high-quality code delivery and adherence to best practices
- Explore and implement AI technologies to enhance development workflows and solutions

## Required Skills & Experience
- 5+ years of full stack development experience
- Expert knowledge of:
  - MongoDB
  - Express.js
  - React.js
  - Node.js
  - Next.js
- Experience with DevOps practices and CI/CD pipelines
- Strong understanding of software development life cycle
- Excellence in code review and technical mentorship
- Proven ability to manage distributed teams
- Strong communication skills across different time zones and cultures
- Demonstrated ability to learn and implement new technologies quickly
- Experience integrating AI tools into development workflows

## Desired Qualities
- Self-motivated with excellent time management skills
- Problem-solving mindset with strong analytical abilities
- Experience working with global teams
- Ability to balance technical leadership with hands-on development
- Track record of delivering complex projects on schedule
- Enthusiasm for experimenting with and adopting new technologies
- Proficiency in leveraging AI tools for development efficiency

## Required for Application
Please include:
1. Your portfolio featuring MERN stack applications you've built
2. Specific examples of projects where you've:
   - Implemented full-stack solutions using MongoDB, Express, React, and Node.js
   - Utilized Next.js in production environments
   - Integrated AI tools into your development workflow
3. Evidence of your experience managing distributed teams
4. Links to GitHub repositories or live applications you've developed
5. Your approach to learning and implementing new technologies

title: Develop an mentoring app with a small social network
description:
Job Title: Full-Stack Developer for AI-Powered Career Networking Platform
Job Overview:
We are looking for a full-stack developer to help enhance and scale CareerHop, a semi-anonymous social networking platform designed for engineering students. The goal is to bridge the gap between university education and professional employment through AI-driven recommendations, industry mentorship, and job matching.

The ideal candidate should have experience with AI-based recommendation systems, social networking features, and scalable web applications.

Key Responsibilities:
Develop and improve CareerHop‚Äôs web application with React.js, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS.
Enhance backend functionality using Node.js, Express.js, and GraphQL.
Optimize database performance with MongoDB, PostgreSQL, and Redis.
Implement secure authentication using OAuth 2.0, Firebase Authentication, and AES-256 encryption.
Improve the AI-driven recommendation system using TensorFlow and Scikit-Learn for job and mentor matching.
Deploy scalable infrastructure with Docker, Kubernetes, and DigitalOcean.
Integrate real-time notifications and user engagement analytics.
Conduct unit, integration, security, and usability testing.
Collaborate with stakeholders to refine UI/UX and platform scalability.
Required Skills & Technologies:
‚úÖ Frontend: React.js, Next.js, Tailwind CSS
‚úÖ Backend: Node.js, Express.js, GraphQL
‚úÖ Databases: MongoDB, PostgreSQL, Redis
‚úÖ AI/ML: TensorFlow, Scikit-Learn, FastAPI
‚úÖ Authentication & Security: OAuth 2.0, Firebase, AES-256
‚úÖ DevOps: Docker, Kubernetes, DigitalOcean, GitHub Actions (CI/CD)
‚úÖ Testing: Jest, Postman, OWASP ZAP (Security Testing)
‚úÖ Agile Workflow: Scrum-Kanban (Jira, GitHub Projects)

Nice to Have:
Experience with career platforms or social networking apps.
Knowledge of predictive analytics and NLP for career recommendations.
Familiarity with microservices architecture and event-driven systems (RabbitMQ, Kafka).
Project Milestones:
Refinement of CareerHop MVP: Improve frontend and backend performance.
Enhancement of AI-based job and mentor recommendations.
Deployment of CareerHop Beta 2.0 with real-time notifications and AI optimization.
Security and Scalability Enhancements: Ensure system stability for 1,000+ concurrent users.

title: Title: Full Branding, Website Design, and SEO for MaidFlex ‚Äì Cleaning Business

About Us

MaidFlex is a home cleaning service looking for a skilled Angular developer with SEO expertise to build and optimize our website. The ideal candidate will be able to develop a fully functional, SEO-optimized site in Angular while ensuring strong search rankings, Core Web Vitals performance, and lead generation capabilities.

This role requires expertise in both web development and technical SEO, particularly for dynamic content and service-based businesses.


---

Responsibilities

Website Development (Angular)

Build a responsive, fast-loading, and mobile-friendly website in Angular

Develop a seamless online booking system that integrates with our scheduling platform (Housecall Pro or similar)

Implement a clean, conversion-focused UI/UX for lead generation

Ensure schema markup, meta tags, and SEO-friendly URLs are implemented correctly

Set up a dashboard or CMS for content management (if applicable)


SEO & Performance Optimization

Ensure full SEO compatibility for Angular (indexing, structured data, pre-rendering, crawlability)

Implement server-side rendering (SSR) or pre-rendering to improve search visibility

Optimize Core Web Vitals (LCP, CLS, page speed, and mobile usability)

Set up Google Search Console, Analytics, and Looker Studio reports

Optimize Google Business Profile and local SEO citations for ranking improvement

Develop a link-building strategy (high-authority directories, guest posts, outreach)



---

Requirements

Proven experience developing Angular websites from scratch (must provide examples)

title: I need an Automation Bot Made for X (Twitter)
description:
Twitter Bot Brief
1. Finds twitter users that use specific hashtags
2. Monitors and stores their accounts and user names in a database based on the following requirements:
A. They fall under a targeted hashtag
B. They have at least 50 followers
C. Their Profile is at least 30 days old
D. They have more than 20 tweets
E. They have likes or retweeted a post within the last 7 days
3. The bot the searches and does the same for keyword written in their tweets such as "Kickstarter campaign" ect.
4. The bot then likes, and retweets their post, also the bot makes comments from a pool of different comment lines. (Chat gpt analyses the tweet and writes the comment line on their tweet).
5. The bot goes through different individual files and if there is only one file then it searches that single file and automatically tweets a tweet with a picture from that file and it uses chat gpt to generate text for the tweet relevant to the picture. In the file there is a summary of the pictures and chat gpt will use the summary as well as analyze a single picture and make a relevant and accurate post.

6. Dm automation, with chat gpt discussing things that are relevant in another text file.


There needs to be delays within this automation system so that twitter is not flaggin the account as spammy.
This needs to be cloud based and the ability to update the source picture and text needs to be easy.

title: Solana Blockchain Website Development
description:
I‚Äôm building LumexAI, a cutting-edge AI-powered Solana trading platform that‚Äôs designed to be a full-screen, real-time trading experience. This is not just another trading app‚Äîit‚Äôs a complete trader‚Äôs command center with powerful features that make it easier to track wallets, analyze market movements, and execute trades with zero delay.

Key Features & Functionality:
‚úÖ Full-Screen Trading Interface ‚Äì The entire screen should be dedicated to trading, with real-time price charts, live orders, and instant execution. No distractions.
‚úÖ Wallet Tracker ‚Äì Tracks real-time holdings, PNL (profit & loss), and transaction history for any connected Solana wallet. Users can see all their assets in one place, with AI-generated insights.
‚úÖ Live Buy & Sell Feed ‚Äì Real-time order flow tracking to show exactly who‚Äôs buying, who‚Äôs selling, and how much Solana is moving at any given second.
‚úÖ Trading Volume Monitor ‚Äì Tracks the 24-hour volume, liquidity, and market depth for different meme coins and tokens on Pump.fun, MoonShot, and Solana DEXs.
‚úÖ Meme Coin Sniper ‚Äì AI-powered tool that tracks trending meme coins before they pump. This feature scans Pump.fun, MoonShot, GitHub activity, Discord mentions, and whale buys to spot the next big moonshot.
‚úÖ Instant Swap & Trade Execution ‚Äì Users should be able to buy and sell directly within the platform, integrating Solana‚Äôs top DEXs for the best rates and lowest slippage.
‚úÖ Transaction Breakdown & Analytics ‚Äì Every buy, sell, and swap should be categorized and visualized so users know exactly how they‚Äôre trading and what‚Äôs making (or losing) them money.
‚úÖ Sniper Bot Integration ‚Äì Users should have an AI-assisted sniper tool to place limit orders before launch, ensuring they get in early on hyped tokens.
‚úÖ AI Trade Copilot ‚Äì The AI should analyze historical trades, predict market trends, and provide users with smart buy/sell suggestions based on volume, liquidity, and sentiment data.
‚úÖ Leaderboard & Community Stats ‚Äì A ‚ÄúTop Traders‚Äù board showing the best-performing wallets, their trades, and strategies (anonymized for privacy).

Design Notes:
Reference: Take inspiration from BullX Neo, but don‚Äôt copy it. We‚Äôre focusing on functionality first.
Ultra-Fast UI ‚Äì The interface needs to be smooth, zero lag, and fully optimized for desktop & mobile trading.
No Clutter ‚Äì Everything should be clear, intuitive, and designed for efficiency. Traders don‚Äôt want to waste time clicking through menus.
Next Steps:
Get the wallet tracker + live trade data + volume tracker working first.
Integrate DEX swaps & sniper bot functionalities.
Optimize the AI trading assistant to analyze trading patterns, sentiment, and volume surges.
This platform is designed to dominate the Solana trading space‚Äîfast, data-rich, and AI-driven. Let‚Äôs get started and make this the ultimate trading hub. üöÄ

Our mission is to revolutionize the online shopping experience, and we are looking for someone who shares our vision and is committed to delivering top-notch products and services to our customers.

The ideal candidate will possess extensive experience in building secure eCommerce platforms that prioritize user safety and data protection. The role will involve incorporating advanced security features into the website, including but not limited to two-device authentication and cutting-edge facial recognition technology. These features are essential in providing an extra layer of security for our users, ensuring that their personal and financial information is safeguarded against potential threats.

In addition to technical expertise, we are looking for someone with a strong understanding of user experience (UX) and user interface (UI) design principles. Your ability to create a seamless and intuitive user experience will be critical in retaining customers and encouraging them to return to our platform. You will work closely with our design and marketing teams to ensure that the aesthetic and functional aspects of the website align with our brand identity and appeal to our target audience.

Qualifications:

title: Full Stack Developer with AI and LLM Experience for Cross-Platform App
description:
Your task is to develop a functional prototype for both the device and app, integrating conversational AI, voice interaction, and cloud syncing. This is a ground-up build, but you can leverage existing APIs and frameworks to speed development. If you love blending hardware, software, and AI‚Äîand have a knack for intuitive design‚Äîthis is for you!

---

### Project Scope
Mobile App:  
   - Develop a cross-platform app (iOS/Android) with a retro-inspired UI.  
   - Include three core features: ‚ÄúTalk‚Äù (AI chat), ‚ÄúRemind‚Äù (notifications), ‚ÄúPlay Story‚Äù (audio playback).  
   - Sync data (stories, reminders) with the device via cloud.  

AI Integration:  
   - Use a pre-trained LLM (e.g., xAI, OpenAI, or similar via API) for conversation.  
   - Fine-tune with provided Boomer-era data (e.g., 50s-70s culture transcripts).  
   - Add voice interaction with TTS (e.g., ElevenLabs) and STT (e.g., Google Speech).  

Sync & Privacy:  
   - Set up cloud syncing (AWS/Firebase) with encryption.  
   - Ensure offline modes for both device and app.  

---

### Deliverables
- Mobile App: Deployable APK/IPA files, with a simple UI and sync features.  
- Source Code: Clean, commented code for both device and app (Python, React Native, etc.).  
- Documentation: Basic setup guide and API integration notes.  
- Demo: 2-3 minute video showing Rosie in action (chat, reminder, story playback) across device and app.

---

### Skills Required
- Full-Stack Development:  
  - Python (for device/AI logic).  
  - React Native or Flutter (for app).  
  - RESTful API integration (e.g., Spotify, LLM APIs).  
- Hardware:  
  - Experience with Raspberry Pi or similar (GPIO, screen integration).  
  - Basic prototyping (speaker/mic setup).  
- AI/NLP:  
  - Familiarity with LLMs (e.g., Hugging Face, OpenAI, xAI).  
  - Voice tech (TTS/STT implementation).  
- Cloud:  
  - AWS/Firebase for syncing.  
  - Encryption basics for privacy.  
- UI/UX:  
  - Ability to design simple, senior-friendly interfaces (big fonts, clear buttons).  
- Bonus: Experience with retro aesthetics or targeting older demographic

---

### Project Timeline
- Timeline: 4-6 weeks for MVP

---

### Who You Are
- Proven experience with hardware-software projects (portfolio links a must).  
- Comfortable working with AI APIs and voice interfaces.  
- Strong communicator‚Äîable to explain progress and suggest improvements.  
- Passionate about user-focused tech (bonus if you‚Äôve built for seniors before).  

---

### How to Apply
Please submit:  
1. A brief intro and why you‚Äôre a fit.  
2. Links to relevant projects (AI, hardware, apps).  
3. Your proposed timeline and budget.  
4. Any questions about the project.

Project Overview:

I‚Äôve built an app that enables quick, on-the-fly proposal creation during sales calls. These proposals can be updated post-call, shared via live links, and compared side-by-side. However, I need help solving a few major challenges:

Key Challenges to Solve:
1. Optimize Shared Results Load Time
‚Ä¢ The ‚ÄúShared Results‚Äù page, which displays past proposals, takes too long to load (sometimes over 1.5 minutes).
‚Ä¢ It includes details such as proposal creator, assignee, attendees, creation date, status (draft/published), and actions (edit, delete, copy, view).
‚Ä¢ I need improvements in query efficiency and performance to make this load faster.
2. Fix OpenAI Integration for Proposal Summaries
‚Ä¢ The proposal editor includes a ‚ÄúGenerate Summary‚Äù feature that should extract key details from a transcript via OpenAI.
‚Ä¢ The summary sections include:
‚Ä¢ Introduction
‚Ä¢ Solution Overview
‚Ä¢ Current Situation

‚Ä¢ Challenges
‚Ä¢ Currently, generating summaries fails with the error: ‚ÄúAnalysis error. Failed to send a request to the edge function.‚Äù

3. Potential Expansion: AI Demo System

‚Ä¢ I want to create a searchable demo experience where users can select an industry and test AI interactions relevant to their needs.

Ideal Skills & Experience:

title: Full Stack Development for Inventory Management Software
description:
We are seeking an experienced Full Stack Developer to build a web application for our business to manage sales data, inventory, raw materials, and cost of goods sold (COGS). The website will consist of multiple interactive pages, pulling data via API and allowing user input. Below is the project scope based on provided specifications:

Dashboard: Display global sales data by ASIN with interactive graphs (filterable by date range, e.g., last 7 days) and inventory levels (US, Canada, UK, EU, Australia) via dropdowns.

Product Formulas: Manage product details (e.g., SKU, ASIN, ingredients, lead times) with options to add/upload new products via CSV.

Suppliers/Manufacturers: Input and manage supplier and manufacturer info (e.g., email, lead times) with add/edit functionality.

Raw Materials: Track raw material inventory (quantity, supplier, lead time) with API-driven updates from FBA shipments and low stock warnings based on sales forecasts.

Cost of Goods Sold (COGS): Input raw material costs (date, invoice, quantity, cost) to calculate weighted average cost annually; store data in a database.

Settings: Configure business details (e.g., shipping times per marketplace) and manage navigation.

Features:
API integration for sales and inventory data.

Dynamic calculations (e.g., suggested purchase orders, days of inventory).

CSV upload/download for bulk data management.
User-friendly UI with dropdowns, buttons (e.g., "Add New"), and checkboxes.

Requirements:

Proficiency in front-end (e.g., React, Angular) and back-end (e.g., Node.js, Python) development.

Experience with database design (e.g., SQL) for storing COGS and inventory data.

Familiarity with API integration and interactive data visualization (e.g., Chart.js).

Ability to implement secure user input and file handling (CSV).

Deliverables: A fully functional website with all pages and features outlined in the attached Excel mockup. Please review the document for detailed specs.

title: Softr.io project
description:
Hi,

We need to make an easy client portal based on an excel sheet, in that client portal they can onboard and need to accept changes.

Project Title:
Build a Customer-Facing Portal in Softr for Airbnb Optimization Agency

Project Overview:
We run an agency that optimizes listings. We need a customer-facing portal built in Softr, integrated with our Google Sheet (link to sheet).

This portal should allow our clients to:

Approve the first optimization before it goes live.
View a graph displaying the number of optimizations done over time.
Attach feedback to a listing (feedback should be stored in a new row in the Google Sheet).
Onboard new listings through a form submission.
Key Features & Requirements:
1. Authentication & Client Access
Clients should log in using email authentication.
Each client should only see their own listings (filtered by email).
2. Approval System for First Optimization
If a listing has not been optimized before, the client should see a "Pending Approval" status.
The client clicks "Approve", and the status updates in the Google Sheet.
3. Graph of Optimizations Done
A chart should visualize the number of optimizations done per client over time.
This data should be pulled dynamically from the Google Sheet.
4. Client Feedback Submission

Submitted listings should be added as a new row in the Google Sheet.
